Kul emo nder duuniyaaruno faa jo'oni, daa o laatataako aardiiɗo diina koo seɗɗa, gam e woodi aardiiɓe diina hokkooɓe Allah kokke kama no *Tawreeta vi'i.

Kuugal ngal ɓen ɗoon aardiiɓe diina kuwata e laatii misaalu e mbeelu ko woni toon dow asama. Noon boo ɗum laatii e *Muusa, ko hokka o fuɗɗa tiggugo *Suudu Fottirde, Jawmiraawo vi'ii mo: « Tabbitin a waɗii koo ɗume fuu deydey e misaalu ɗum kolleɗaa dow vaamnde. »
Ammaa jo'oni Yeesu hokkaama kuugal aardiiɗo diina ɓurngal ngal maɓɓe. Amaana ka o siryii hakkunde Allah e yimɓe ɓurii vooɗgo, gam ka darnaama dow alkawalji ɓurɗi vooɗgo.
Kul *alkawal aranal walaano ko ŋakki e muuɗum, daa walaa bukaata alkawal ɗiɗaɓal.
Ammaa Allah felii yimɓe muuɗum, noon no *Deftere Seniinde vi'i: « Miin Jawmiraawo emi vi'a on: balɗe e ngara ɗe kaɓɓeymi alkawal kesal e *yimɓe Isiraa'iila e *Yahuuda.

Ngal nanndataa e alkawal ngal kaɓɓunoomi e maamiraaɓe maɓɓe nyalaande nde nanngumi ɓe junngo mburtimmi ɓe lesdi *Misira. Nde laatii ɓe njogaaki alkawal am ngaal, waɗi kokkitmi ɓe ɓaawo. Miin Jawmiraawo vi'i noon. »

O ɓesdi vi'igo: « Raa alkawal ngal mba'adeymi e *yimɓe Isiraa'iila nder balɗe gareyɗe: Mi waɗey dookaaji am nder ɓerɗe maɓɓe, mi vinnda ɗi nder nyumooji maɓɓe. Mi laatoto Allah maɓɓe, kamɓe boo ɓe laatoto yimɓe am.
Naa sey to goɗɗo ekkitinii mo jooɗodii, koo vi'a banndum: Anndu Jawmiraawo, gam ɓe fuu ɓe anndey yam, gada famarɓe maɓɓe faa yahago mawɓe maɓɓe.
Gam mi ya'afanto ɓe halleende maɓɓe, mi fuɗɗitataa limgo hakkeeji ɗi ɓe mbaɗi sam. »
Gada e volvugo haala alkawal kesal Allah hihiɗiniri alkawal aranal. To noon ko hihiɗi naywi ɓadake majjugo.
Alkawal aranal e woonnoo dookaaji e Suudu to ɗum sujjidanta Allah nder duuniyaaru.

Suudu nduun ɗum suudu laral senndaandu cuuɗi ɗiɗi. Suudu arandu e vi'ee *yaayre seniinde. Nder ma'aru e woodi to ɗum resata fitila ka ɗemɗe joveeɗiɗi e danki e buroodi gonɗum dow ma'aki, cakkanaaɗum Allah.
Ɓaawo wudere senndunde cuuɗi ɗiɗi ɗiin, e woodi suudu gaɗaaru vi'eteendu *yaayre ɓurnde senaago.

Nder ma'aru e woodi wuldude urdi mbelndi wa'araande jiinaariya, e woodi boo *akootiiwa alkawal molmanaanga jiinaariya. Nder ma'aga e woodi gaheeyel jiinaariya, nder ma'agel e woodi nyaamdu vi'eteendu *manna. Nder akootiiwa ngaan e woodi sawru *Haruuna vilitndu e alluwaaje kaaƴe ɗiɗi ɗe ɗum vinndi dookaaji Allah sappo dow muuɗum.

Dow akootiiwa ngaan e woodi nanndi malaa'ika'en vi'eteeɓe *keruba'en, laatiiɓe alaama teddungal Allah. Biyeeli maɓɓe e kuuri omndoode akootiiwa to ɗum rufata ƴiiƴam gam ya'afaago hakkeeji. Ammaa jo'oni en ngalaa wakkaci nde ndarotooɗen linngiten koo ɗume fuu noon no wontirnoo.
Ku'uje ɗeen fuu ciryoraama noon, gam koo ndeye nyalaande *aardiiɓe diina natta suudu arandu, ɓe kuwa kuugal maɓɓe ngal ɓe kuwanta Allah.

Ammaa *aardiiɗo diina mawɗo tan nattata suudu gaɗaaru, nde wo'ore nder hitaande. O nattataa boo to o jogaaki ƴiiƴam bisaaji ɗam o wa'arata sadaka, gam ya'afuye hakkeeji ma'ako e ɗi yimɓe mbaɗi nder ciya anndal mu''en.
Gada e ma'ajum *Ruhu Ceniiɗo holliri, to faa suudu arandu e ɗoon dari, laawol nattugo *yaayre ɓurnde senaago omtaaka tawo.
Ɗum fuu ɗum misaalu kolleyɗum ko woodi hannde, e ɗum holla hokkugo Allah sadakaaji nyaamdu e sadakaaji kirseteeɗi mbaawataa laɓɓingo *nyumooji ɓernde kokkoowo ɗi, faa hakkiilo ma'ako waalto.
Dookaaji nyaamdu e jarki e loote-loote feere-feere, ɗum fuu ɗum dookaaji ko yaalani ɓanndu tan, ɗum nafey faa yottoo wakkaci nde Allah waylitata ɗum.

Ammaa jo'oni Almasiifu vanngii, o *Aardiiɗo diina mawɗo dow ku'uje booɗɗe garanɗe en jo'oni. O nattii suudu laral seniindu ɓurndu manngu e darajja, ndu junngo neɗɗo tiggaay, waato ndu ivaay nder ndu'u duuniyaaru tagaandu.

Almasiifu nattii nder *yaayre ɓurnde senaago nde wo'ore tan faa abadaa. Nde o natti gam sakkango Allah, o nattidaay e ƴiiƴam ilohon e nga'on, ammaa o nattidii e ƴiiƴam ma'ako. Noon o soottorii en faa abadaa.
Ƴiiƴam ilohon e nga'on e tooka viige nge ɗum wuli meccaama dow yimɓe ɓe laaɓaay fodde diina, gam ɗum laatina ɓe laaɓɓe.

To noon kam, ƴiiƴam Almasiifu no waɗey ko ɓuri noon. Gam e baawɗe Ruhu goonɗo faa abadaa, Almasiifu hokkiri Allah hoore muuɗum, o laatii cakkiri ndi walaa liddaari. Ƴiiƴam ma'ako boo no laɓɓiney *nyumooji ɓerɗe meeɗen gada e kuuɗe jahareyɗe en e maayde, gam faa kuwanen Allah mo yonki.

Kanjum waɗi Almasiifu laatii hakkundeejo Allah e yimɓe nder *alkawal kesal. O waɗii ɗum gam faa yimɓe ɓe Allah noddi keɓa ndonu ngu faa abadaa, ngu Allah waɗi alkawal muuɗum. Maayde ma'ako rimɗinii yimɓe gada e boofi ɗi ɓe mbaɗnoo wakkaci ɓe ngonnoo nder alkawal aranal.
To goɗɗo waɗii alkawal ronnugo, sey to ɗum saaydake baɗɗo alkawal ngaal maayi.
Gam alkawal ndonu tabbitataa, sey to baɗɗo ngal maayii, to faa baɗɗo ngal e foofa ngal huwataa.
Kanjum waɗi, faa e alkawal aranal fuɗɗaay huugo, sey nde ƴiiƴam rufaa.

Nde Muusa yeccinoo yimɓe keerol dookaaji Allah gonɗi nder *Tawreeta fuu, o hooƴi ƴiiƴam ga'i e ilooji hawtaade e ndiyam, o hooƴi haako *hisop e gaasa baali mbo'ojinaaka, o suuvi ɗum nder ma'ajam, o mecci ɗam dow Deftere Tawreeta e dow yimɓe fuu.
O vi'i: « Ɗa'am woni ƴiiƴam tabbitinoojam alkawal ngal Allah vi'i on tokkon. »
Noon boo, o mecciri ƴiiƴam ɗaam dow *Suudu Fottirde e ku'uje gonɗe nder ma'aru fuu, kuutirteeɗe gam sujjidango Allah.
Dow e Tawreeta, ko ɓuri ɗuuɗgo fuu ƴiiƴam laɓɓinirte. Gam to naa ƴiiƴam rufaa, hakkeeji nja'afataake.
To ɗe'e ku'uje laatiiɗe misaalu ku'uje goongaaje gonɗe toon dow e laaɓniree ƴiiƴam bisaaji, ndeen ku'uje gonɗe toon dow doole laaɓniree e kirseteeɗi ɓurɗi ɗin toon darajja.
Gam wanaa nder *yaayre seniinde nde yimɓe nyiɓi Almasiifu natti, laatiinde nanndi yaayre goongaare wonnde toon dow. Ammaa asama e hoore muuɗum o natti. Jo'oni emo toon yeeso Allah, gam o heedana en.
*Mawɓe aardiiɓe diina *Yahuudu'en e nattida e ƴiiƴam bisaaji nder yaayre seniinde nde wo'ore nder koo ndeye hitaande. Ammaa Almasiifu nattaay nde ɗuuɗɗum gam o sakka hoore ma'ako kama no ɓe mbaɗata.

Kul ɗum laatakeno noon, daa Almasiifu torranooma nde ɗuuɗɗum ila fuɗɗam duuniyaaru. Ammaa jo'oni faro timmoode jaamanuuji, o vanngii nde wo'ore tan faa abadaa, gam o itta hakkeeji gada e sakkugo hoore ma'ako.
Neɗɗo fuu no maayey nde wo'ore, ɓaawo ma'ajum Allah sernana mo.
Noon boo Almasiifu sakkiri hoore muuɗum nde wo'ore, gam o itta hakkeeji yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe. O vanngey ɗiɗaɓre naa gam o itta hakkeeji, ammaa gam o hisna ɓeen reentuɓe kisndam ma'ako.

*Tawreeta Muusa e laatii mbeelu ku'uje booɗɗe gareyɗe ɗo'o yeeso tan, naa ɗum ku'uje ɗeen goongaaje e hoore muuɗum. Gam ma'ajum, ka waawataa laatingo ɓattotooɓe Allah heeɓɓe, gada e waɗgo sadakaaji koo ndeye hitaande.
Kul e ka waawnoo laatingo ɓe heeɓɓe, daa ɓe ngooriino waɗgo sadakaaji. *Nyumooji ɓerɗe maɓɓe boo pelataa ɓe dow hakkeeji ɗi ɓe mbaɗi, gam ɓe laɓɓinaama nde wo'ore heynde faa abadaa.
Ammaa sadakaaji ɗiin e kiimtina yimɓe hakkeeji mu''en hitan-hiti fuu.
Gam ƴiiƴam ga'i e ilooji waawataa ittugo hakkeeji yimɓe sam.
Kanjum waɗi, nde Almasiifu wari nattugo duuniyaaru, o vi'i Allah: « Wanaa sadakaaji e kirseteeɗi ngiɗɗaa, ammaa a waɗanii yam ɓanndu.
Wanaa kirseteeɗi guleteeɗi e kirseteeɗi gam ittugo hakke mbelaney maa ɓernde. »
Ndeen Almasiifu vi'i: « Yaa Allah, rammi: Mi warii gam mi waɗa ko ngiɗɗaa, noon no ɗum vinndiraa dow am nder Tawreeta. »

Aran o vi'i: « A yiɗaa sadakaaji e kirseteeɗi, a yiɗaa kirseteeɗi guleteeɗi e kirseteeɗi gam ittugo hakke, a nanataa belɗum ma'ajum. » O vi'ii ɗum, koo nde laatii sadakaaji ɗiin fuu cakkiraama noon no Tawreeta vi'i.
Ɓaawo ma'ajum, o vi'i: « Rammi, mi warii gam mi waɗa ko ngiɗɗaa. » Noon o ittiri kirseteeɗi arani, gam o jo''ina hoore ma'ako mbattudi ma'aji.
Nde Yeesu *Almasiifu waɗi ɗuum ko Allah yiɗi, o laɓɓinii en gada e hakkeeji. O sakkii ɓanndu ma'ako gam meeɗen, o sakkii ndu nde wo'ore faa abadaa.
Koo moye *aardiiɗo diina e daranii kuugal muuɗum koo ndeye nyalaande, emo sakka cakketeeɗi go'oti ɗiin dum, ammaa ɗi mbaawataa ittugo hakke.
Ammaa Almasiifu kam, nde wo'ore sakki hoore muuɗum faa abadaa, gam ittugo hakkeeji. Ɓaawo ma'ajum, o jooɗii e junngo Allah nyaamo.
Ila wakkaci ɗuum, emo reenti faa Allah laatina wanywanyɓe ma'ako to o yowata kosɗe ma'ako.
E sadaka ngo'ota kaan, o laatiniri ɓeen ɓe o laɓɓinta gada e hakkeeji mu''en heeɓɓe faa abadaa.
*Ruhu Allah boo e saaydina en dow ma'ajum, nde o vi'i:
« Allah vi'i: raa alkawal ngal mba'adeymi e *yimɓe Isiraa'iila nder balɗe gareyɗe: Mi waɗey dookaaji am nder ɓerɗe maɓɓe, mi vinnda ɗi nder nyumooji maɓɓe. »
Ndeen o ɓesdi vi'igo: « Mi fuɗɗitataa limgo hakkeeji ɗi ɓe mbaɗi e kuuɗe kalluɗe ɗe ɓe kuwi. »
Ndeen to hakke ya'afaama, walaa bukaata cakkuki feere gam ittugo hakke kadin.
Gam ma'ajum banndiraaɓe, ƴiiƴam Yeesu ndufaaɗam ɗaam hokkii en laawol nattugo nder *yaayre ɓurnde senaago, e ɓerɗe baaltiiɗe.
O omtanii en laawol kesol kokkeyngol yonki, kuultirgol wudere senndunde *Suudu Jawmiraawo, waato ɓanndu ma'ako.
En ngoodi *aardiiɗo diina mawɗo, aardinaaɗo dow yimɓe *Wuro Seniingo.

Gam ma'ajum, sey ɓaditooɗen Allah e ɓerɗe goongaaje e goonɗinki cemmbiɗki. En mbaawi waɗgo ɗum, sabu *nyumooji ɓerɗe meeɗen laɓɓinaama, ɗi peldataa en ko halli, ɓalli meeɗen boo lootraama ndiyam laaɓɗam.
Tammunde nde mbolveten haala muuɗum, sey njogooɗen nde booɗɗum, gam Allah baɗanɗo en alkawal o koolniiɗo.
En ti'ino leggindirgo hakkunde meeɗen nder hollugo yiɗde e kuuɗe booɗɗe.
To' en ngoor hawritgo kama no woɓɓe ngoordi hawritgo. Ammaa enen en cemmbiɗindir, hakko maa jo'oni nde ngiiɗen nyalaande bittoyki Jawmiraawo ɓadake.
To en njahii yeeso e waɗgo hakke da gangaan, ɓaawo en anndii goonga, ndeen ngoɗka sadaka itteyka hakkeeji meeɗen walaa.
Ko horii woni reentugo ceri'a Allah kulniika, e yiite hallunge nyaamoyeynge wanyɓe Allah.
Koo moye huulti *Tawreeta Muusa, o bareteeɗo dow e caaydaaku yimɓe ɗiɗo koo tato, naa e yurmeende.
To noon, javiiɗo *Ɓiɗɗo Allah no heɓey ceri'a ɓurka naawgo, koo naa noon? Gam neɗɗo oon meheriɗinii ƴiiƴam *alkawal Allah laɓɓinɗam mo, huɗii Ruhu gaddoowo yiɗde.
En anndi Allah biiɗo: « Mba'ataari ndi am, miin wa'atotoo koo moye. » Kadimaa o vi'ii: « Jawmiraawo no sernaney yimɓe muuɗum. »
Ɗum fii kulniiɗum fa, neɗɗo yana nder junngo Allah mo yonki !
Kiimtee no njooɗorinooɗon naane. Nder balɗe ɗeen, ɓaawo on keɓii jayngol Allah, on ndurvidii e torraaji naawɗi, ammaa on ndarake e semmbee.
Wakkaci go'o on kuɗaama, on njaltiniraama yeeso yimɓe. Wakkaci feere boo on njaɓii vallugo woɓɓe torriraaɓe kama mooɗon.
On njurminanii omndaaɓe nder kaso. Nde te'etaaɗon ko ngoonɗon, on njaɓii ɗum e velvelo, gam on anndi on ngoodi goɗɗum ko ɓuri ɗum vooɗgo, tabbiteyɗum faa abadaa.
Gam ma'ajum, to' on kibin goonɗinki mooɗon, gam eki waddana on laada makka.
On ngoodi bukaata munyal, gam faa mbaɗon ko Allah yiɗi, keɓon ko o waɗani on alkawal.
Gam *Deftere Seniinde vi'i: « Horii wakkaci seɗɗa kaanɗo wara oon no warey, o neeɓataa.
Aadaliijo no foofrey e goonɗinki, ammaa to o hokkitii yam ɓaawo, mi nanataa belɗum ma'ako. »
Enen kam, en ngalaa nder hokkitooɓe ɓaawo yahago halkere, ammaa en nder goonɗinɓe Allah yahago kisndam yonkiiji meeɗen.
Goonɗinki woni tabbitingo heɓgo ko tammoto, e tabbitingo ku'uje ɗe en ngi'ataa eɗe ngoodi.
Gada e ma'aki yimɓe ndeenno laatorii yerdaaɓe Allah.
Gada e goonɗinki pahamirɗen ko woni dow e lees fuu tagiraama voliinde Allah. Ko yi'etee boo ivii gada e ko yi'ataake.

Habiila goonɗinii Allah, kanjum waɗi o hokki Allah sadaka ɓurka ka Kaayinu. Sabu goonɗinki ma'ako Allah yerdii mo, nde e jaɓi kokkal ma'ako. Habiila maayi, ammaa goonɗinki ma'ako e volvana en faa hannde.

Enok goonɗinii Allah, kanjum waɗi Allah ƴeentini mo dow asama, o maayaay. Walaa puɗɗitɗo yi'igo mo, gam Allah hooyrii mo dow. Ko hokka o ƴeentinee dow, *Deftere Seniinde saaydinii vi'igo o velii Allah.
En anndi to neɗɗo walaa goonɗinki waawataa velgo Allah, gam giɗɗo ɓattaago Allah fuu doole goonɗina Allah e woodi, emo hokka yillotooɓe mo laada.

Nuhu goonɗinii Allah, kanjum waɗi o jaɓi vagginoore Allah dow hu'unde ko waɗoyta ɗo'o yeeso, ɗum o yi'aay tawo. O ɗowtanii Allah, o sehi akali ndiyam gam o hisna wuro ma'ako. Noon o do''iri yimɓe duuniyaaru ceri'a. Sabu goonɗinki ma'ako Allah yerdii mo.
*Ibraahim goonɗinii Allah, kanjum waɗi o ɗowtanii Allah, nde Allah vi'i mo o yaha lesdi ndi waɗi *alkawal hokkugo mo. Ibraahim dillii koo nde laatii anndaa to fa'i.
Goonɗinki ma'ako waɗi o jooɗii kama jananno nder lesdi ndi Allah waɗi alkawal hokkugo mo. O jooɗii nder cuuɗi lare, kanko e *Iciyaaku e *Yaakuubu ɓe o rondata alkawal ngaal.
Ibraahim waɗii ɗum, gam o haaɓii o yi'a si'ire nde caɓɓawal tabbitngal, nde Allah diidi, nyiɓi.
Gada e goonɗinki Ibraahim heɓri ɓiɗɗo, koo nde laatii o naywii rugum, Saaratu debbo ma'ako boo e laatinoo dimaro. O heɓii ɓiɗɗo oon gam o tabbitinii Allah baɗanɗo mo alkawal no koolniiɗo.
Gam ma'ajum gada e o'o neɗɗo go'oto nayeejo ɓadiiɗo maaygo, ɗum heɓi lenyol ɗuuɗngol kama koode, ngol limataako kama njaareendi regorde maayo.
Ɓe'e yimɓe fuu maayii nder goonɗinki. Ɓe keɓaay ko Allah waɗani ɓe alkawal, ammaa ɓe teeynii ɗum to woɗɗi, ɓe njaɓɓii ɗum, ɓe mbi'i e njaayri ɓe hoɗɓe e jananɓe nder duuniyaaru.
Ko ɓe mbolvi ɗuum hollii laaɓɗum eɓe ndaara lesdi halal maɓɓe.
Kul ɓe nyumtuno dow lesdi ndi ɓe mburtoyii, daa ɓe keɓiino laawol so''aago.
Ammaa eɓe ngilloo lesdi ɓurndi vooɗgo, waato lesdi ngonndi toon dow. Gam ma'ajum Allah nanaay cemtuɗum noddireego Allah maɓɓe, o siryanake ɓe si'ire.
Ibraahim goonɗinii Allah, gam ma'ajum nde Allah godii mo, o siryii hokkugo ɓiyiiko Iciyaaku kama cakkiri. Kanko baɗanaaɗo alkawal lenyol ɗuuɗngol, emo siryii sakkango Allah ɓiyiiko bajjo,
koo nde Allah vi'iino mo: « Gada e Iciyaaku keɓrataa lenyol noddirteengol innde maaɗa. »
Ibraahim nyumii Allah e woodi baawɗe ummitingo maayɗo. Gam ma'ajum o hokkitaa ɓiyiiko kama ummitinaaɗo nder maayde.
Iciyaaku goonɗinii Allah, kanjum waɗi o barkiɗini Yaakuubu e Isuwa, gam ko warata yeeso.
Yaakuubu goonɗinii Allah, kanjum waɗi nde o ɓadii maaygo, o barkiɗini ɓiɓɓe Yusufu. O tuggi sawru ma'ako o turii o sujjidani Allah.
Yusufu goonɗinii Allah, kanjum waɗi nde o ɓadii maaygo, o volvi haala burtaaki yimɓe Isiraa'iila nder lesdi *Misira, o yeccii ɓe no ɓe mbaɗanta ƴi'e ma'ako.
Danyooɓe *Muusa ngoonɗinii Allah, kanjum waɗi ɓe cuuɗi mo lebbi tati ɓaawo danyeeki ma'ako, gam ɓe ngi'ii o ɓinngel booɗngel. Ɓe kulaay huultugo dooka laamiiɗo.
Muusa goonɗinii Allah, kanjum waɗi nde o mawni, o salii noddireego ɓinngel ɓii *Fira'awna debbo.
O iggitinii o yarda torraa e yimɓe Allah dow o nana belɗum nder hakke wakkaci seɗɗa.
O fahamii jaltinireego gam Almasiifu e laatii risku ɓurngu ngu lesdi Misira darajja, gam o raarii laada ka o heɓata ɗo'o yeeso.
Muusa goonɗinii Allah, kanjum waɗi o vurtii lesdi Misira, o hulaay huunƴere laamiiɗo. O darii e semmbee kama gi'oowo Allah mo yi'ataake.
O goonɗinii Allah, kanjum waɗi o jo'ini finaatawaa *juulɗe Kuultol. O vi'i yimɓe Isiraa'iila molmana dammuɗe mu''en ƴiiƴam, gam to' kalkoowo meem ɓiɓɓe maɓɓe afɓe.
Isiraa'iila'en ngoonɗinii Allah, kanjum waɗi ɓe mbaawi huultugo Maayo Voɗeewo kama dow lesdi njo'orndi. Ammaa ngo nyaami Misira'en tokkoyɓe ɓaawo maɓɓe.
Isiraa'iila'en ngoonɗinii Allah, kanjum waɗi mahagol piliingol si'ire Jeriiko yibbi ɓaawo ɓe mbaɗii balɗe joveeɗiɗi eɓe piloo ngol.
Rahab furdu goonɗinii Allah, o jaɓɓake Isiraa'iila'en horooɓe lesdi nder jam. Kanjum waɗi o halkidaaka e ɓeen saliiɓe ɗowtanaago Allah.
Kaye ɓesdeymi vi'igo? Wakkaci heƴataa yam mi volva dow Gidiyoon e Barak e Samson e Yefta e *Dawda e Samaa'iila e annabo'en horiiɓe.
Ɓe fuu gada e goonɗinki ɓe konri lesɗe ɗuuɗɗe, ɓe njaalii ɗe, ɓe kuwi goonga, ɓe keɓi ko Allah vi'i no waɗaney ɓe, ɓe omndi konnduɗe mawɗi,
ɓe nyifi baawɗe yiite, ɓe ndaɗi mbelndi kaafahi. Ɓe ngalaa semmbee, ammaa ɓe cemmbiɗinaama. Ɓe laatii semmbiɗɓe nder konu, ɓe ndiiwi soojeeji lesɗe jananne.
Woɓɓe rewɓe keɓii maayɓe mu''en ummitinaama nder maayde. Woɓɓe boo torraama faa maayii, ɓe njaɓaay hisneego gam faa ɓe keɓa ummitineego nder foofaango ɓurngo vooɗgo.
Woɓɓe njaltiniraama, piiraama buulaalaaji, woɓɓe kaɓɓiraa geƴƴelle peraa nder kaso.
Woɓɓe perdaa kaaƴe faa maayii, woɓɓe taƴaa cende ɗiɗi, woɓɓe mbardaa kaafahi. Woɓɓe e ngiiloo koo toye e ɓornii lare baali e be'i, ɓe talkiɗi, ɓe torraama, ɓe pitinaama.
Ndu'u duuniyaaru fotanaay aadali'en ɓeen. Ɓe ngiilii nder ladde e nder baamle, ɓe njooɗii nder luurooji kaaƴe e nder gasɗe.
Yimɓe ɓeen fuu Allah manii ɓe gam goonɗinki maɓɓe, ammaa e noon fuu nder maɓɓe walaa keɓɗo ko Allah vi'i no hokkey ɓe.
Allah siryake goɗɗum ɓurɗum vooɗgo sabu meeɗen, gam to naa hawtaade e meeɗen ɓe laatataako heeɓɓe.

Caaydu'en goonɗinki ɗuuɗɓe e pilii en kama duule. Gam ma'ajum, enen maa sey kibinen koo ɗume ko teddanta jahal meeɗen, e hakke koyɗum taaraago e meeɗen. Sey nyaaren nyaardu ndu ndesanaaɗen e munyal kama daɗootirooɓe.

To' en ngoor raargo Yeesu omtanɗo en laawol goonɗingo Allah e kebbinoowo goonɗinki meeɗen. Kanko o munyanii maayde dow *gaafagal, o yavii cemtuɗum ma'agal, gam o yi'ii belɗum mawɗum e reenti mo. Jo'oni emo toon jooɗii e junngo nyaamo jooɗorgal *laamu Allah.
Nyumee dow ma'ako, kanko munyanɗo nganyaandi ndi waɗooɓe hakke kolli mo, gam to' on com, njoofon tammunde mooɗon.
Nder haɓre nde kaɓoton e hakke, on ndartaaki faa ƴiiƴam mooɗon rufi tawo.
Na on njeggitii bolle cemmbiɗinooje ɗe Allah volvani on kama ɓiɓɓe muuɗum? O vi'i: Ɓinngel am, ta'a yavo elto Jawmiraawo, to' ɓernde maaɗa mettu to o felii maa.
Gam Jawmiraawo e elta mo yiɗi, emo fiya koo moye mo o jaɓi kama ɓiyiiko.
Munyanee elto Allah ngoon, gam kango hollata Allah resii on ɓiɓɓe muuɗum. E woodi ɓiɗɗo mo baaba muuɗum eltataa ɗum naa?
Kul on eltaaka, noon no baaba eltirta ɓiɓɓe muuɗum fuu, ndeen on laataaki ɓiɓɓe halal, on njaalu'en.
Baabiraaɓe meeɗen ɓe ɗo'o duuniyaaru e elta en, en mawnina ɓe boo. To noon, ɗume haɗata en ɓurgo jaɓgo elto Baaba meeɗen mo asama, gam poofen?
Baabiraaɓe meeɗen e elta en wakkaci seɗɗa, kama no fotani ɓe. Ammaa Allah e elta en gam nafuuda meeɗen, faa kawten e ma'ako senaare.
Wakkaci elto, belɗum walaa, sey naawɗum. Ammaa ɓaawo ma'ajum ngo waddey jam e aadilaaku nder jo'onde eltaaɓe.
Gam ma'ajum cemmbiɗinee juuɗe mooɗon ŋooɗɗe, e koppi mooɗon ɗi ngalaa semmbee.
Tokkee laabi poortiiɗi, gam to' kosngal laƴoowal vonnito, ammaa ngal hoya.
Ngillee jam hakkunde mooɗon e yimɓe fuu, ngillooɗon senaare boo, gam to naa e ma'are walaa gi'eyɗo Jawmiraawo.
Kakkilanee ko'e mooɗon, gam to' goɗɗo vittu ɓaawo sooya barkaa Allah. To' on ngoor ɗaɗol kaaɗngol fuɗa, wadda torraa, ngol nyiddinira yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe e tooke ma'agol.
To' goɗɗo mooɗon laato baɗoowo njeenu, koo javiiɗo barkaa Allah, kama Isuwa coorruɗo darajja afaaku muuɗum, gam heɓa nyaama nde wo'ore tan.
On anndi ɓaawo ma'ajum, nde o yiɗi baaba ma'ako barkiɗina mo, o salaama. O yillake dabaree faa e gonɗi, no baaba ma'ako waylitirta nyumooji muuɗum, ammaa o waawaay.
Onon, on ngaraay to vaamnde meemeteende, kama *Sinaay huɓɓunde yiite bolbolteynge, e to cuddi niɓɓundi, e niɓre, e henndu semmbiɗndu,
e duudaango luwal, e to olko voliinde woni. Nde yimɓe Isiraa'iila nani voliinde ndeen, ɓe torake to' ɗum ɓesdu volvango ɓe koo voliinde wo'ore,
gam ɓe mbaawaay munyango ko voliinde ndeen vi'i. Nde vi'i: « Koo to ɗum bisaa meemi vaamnde ndeen, ɗum ferdee kaaƴe faa ɗum waata. »
Goonga, ko yi'aa ɗuum e hulnii, faa Muusa e hoore muuɗum vi'i: « Mi hulii korey, faa emi diwna. »
Ammaa onon, on ngarii *Vaamnde Siyoona e si'ire Allah mo yonki, waato si'ire Urusaliima nde dow, e to malaa'ika'en dubuuje dubuuje kawriti e mbelmbelta.
On ngarii to kawtal ɓiɓɓe Allah afɓe, ɓe ɗum vinndi inɗe mu''en toon dow. On ɓattake Allah cernaneyɗo yimɓe fuu, on ɓattake yonkiiji aadali'en laatinaaɓe heeɓɓe.
On ɓattake Yeesu narrinoowo yimɓe e Allah nder *alkawal kesal. On ɓattake ƴiiƴam ma'ako misaaɗam mbolveyɗam haala mbooɗka ɓurka ka ƴiiƴam Habiila.

Gam ma'ajum kakkilee, to' on calo yewanaago bolvaneyɗo on. Gam to ɓeen saliiɓe yewanaago bagginɗo ɗum'en nder duuniyaaru kisaay, ndeen noye enen kisreten to en calake yewanaago baggineyɗo en gada dow?
Wakkaci ɗuum voliinde ma'ako dimmbii lesdi, ammaa jo'oni o waɗii alkawal o vi'i: « Mi ɓesdey dimmbugo lesdi nde wo'ore tan. Wanaa lesdi tan ndimmbeymi, ammaa faa e dow. »
Bolle « nde wo'ore tan » ɗeen, e kolla ko tagaa fuu no dimmbete, ɗum ittee, faa horoo ko dimmbataako.
Gam ma'ajum, ngettemma Allah, sabu en keɓey laamu ngu dimmbataako. En kuuran mo nder teddinki e kulol, noon no o yiɗiri,
gam Allah meeɗen o yiite nyaamooye.
Njahee yeeso e yiɗyiɗtirgo, sabu on banndiraaɓe.
To' on ngeebo dooka jaɓɓaago hoɗɓe, gam woɓɓe waɗɓe noon njaɓɓake malaa'ika'en, naa e anndugo ɓe malaa'ika'en.
To' on ngeggitan haɓɓaaɓe nder kaso, kama on kaɓɓidaama e maɓɓe. To' on ngeggitan torreteeɓe, kama on torridee e maɓɓe.
Sey koo moye fuu teddina koobgal, jogoroo *alkawal ma'agal e senaare, gam Allah no sernaney lalwotooɓe e yeenooɓe fuu.
To' on ngoor yiɗde ceede aardanoo foofaango mooɗon, ammaa ndannganee dow ko ngoonɗon, gam Allah e hoore muuɗum vi'i: « Mi yeebataako ma, mi hibintaa ma faa abadaa. »
Gam ma'ajum, en mbaawi vi'igo e ngorgu: « Jawmiraawo woni balloowo yam, mi hulataa koo ɗume ! Ɗume neɗɗo waɗanta yam. »
Kiimtee aardiiɓe on, wa'ajinɓe on voliinde Allah. Ndaaree no foofaango maɓɓe heyniri, ngemminee goonɗinki maɓɓe.
Yeesu *Almasiifu waylataako. Noon no o va'anoo keenya, noon o va'i hannde, e faa abadaa.
To' on njaɓ ekkitinooje jananne celna on laawol goonga. Gam ko ɓuri vooɗgo woni, semmbee ɓerɗe mooɗon iva e yiɗde Allah, wanaa gada e dookaaji dow nyaamdu ɗi nafaay tokkooɓe ɗi.
En ngoodi sakkirde nde huwooɓe nder *Suudu Fottirde kokkaaka laawol nyaamgo ko woni dow muuɗum.
*Aardiiɗo diina mawɗo *Yahuudu'en e nattida *yaayre ɓurnde senaago e ƴiiƴam bisaaji cakkaaɗi gam ittugo hakke, ammaa emo wula ɓalli bisaaji ɗiin yaasi koɗolle.
Kanjum waɗi Yeesu boo torraa yaasi si'ire, gam faa o laɓɓinira yimɓe gada e hakkeeji mu''en ƴiiƴam ma'ako.
Gam ma'ajum en njah to ma'ako yaasi koɗolle, nanden e ma'ako cemtuɗum ɗum o semtinaa.
Gam nder ndu'u duuniyaaru en ngalaa si'ire tabbitnde, ammaa en ngilloo si'ire wareynde.
Barkaa Yeesu en kokku Allah maaltooje meeɗen wakkaci fuu kama sadaka, waato caaydinen innde Yeesu e konnduɗe meeɗen.
To' on ngeebo waɗgo ko vooɗi e senndugo e woɓɓe ko ngoonɗon, gam iri sadakaaji ɗiin e mbeloo Allah.

Ɗowtanee aardiiɓe on, reenɓe yonkiiji mooɗon. Tokkee ko ɓe mbi'i on, gam ɓe toontoto Allah dow kuugal ngal ɓe kuwi. Ɗowtanee ɓe, gam faa ɓe kuwa kuugal maɓɓe nder velvelo, naa e mettam ɓeram, gam to ɓe kuwii nder mettam ɓeram ɗum nafataa on.
Mbaɗee do'aare gam amin. Min tabbitinii nyumooji ɓerɗe amin e laaɓi, emin ngoodi anniya waɗgo ko haani nder koo ɗume.
Ɓurna muuɗum, emi toroo on mbaɗon do'aare gam Allah hokka yam laawol so''oyaago to mooɗon jaawɗum.
Allah mo jam ummitinii Jawmiraawo meeɗen Yeesu nder maayde. Yeesu woni gaynaako baali mawɗo, tabbitinirɗo alkawal ngal faa abadaa gada e ƴiiƴam muuɗum.

Allah oon laatina on heeɓɓe nder ko vooɗi fuu, ko ngoonɗon bukaata muuɗum, gam faa mbaɗon ko o yiɗi. O waɗa ko velata mo nder meeɗen gada e Yeesu Almasiifu. Teddungal laatanoo Yeesu faa abadaa abadin. Aamiin.
Banndiraaɓe am, emi toroo on njaɓee ɗe'e bolle cemmbiɗinooje e munyal. Seɗɗa tan mbinndanmi on.
Emi yiɗi anndingo on banndii en Timote vurtinaama nder kaso. To o warlayii to am, mi wardey e ma'ako to mooɗon.
Kinnanee min aardiiɓe on fuu, faa e seniiɓe Allah horiiɓe. Goonɗinɓe wonɓe lesdi Itaaliya e kinna on.
Barkaa Allah wondu e mooɗon on fuu !
Miin Yaakuubu maccuɗo Allah e Jawmiraawo Yeesu *Almasiifu, emi hinna on, onon leƴƴi sappo e ɗiɗi cankitiiɗi nder duuniyaaru.
Banndiraaɓe am, nanee belɗum nder torraaji feere-feere gareyɗi to mooɗon, njaɓee ɗi e velvelo manngo,
gam eɗon anndi to goonɗinki mooɗon godaama, ki rimey munyal.
Sey to munyal hebbinii kuugal muuɗum nder mooɗon, ndeen laatotooɗon heeɓɓe, ɓe ndullaay koo ɗume.
To goɗɗo nder mooɗon walaa hikima, sey o toroo Allah hokka mo ka, gam Allah o kokkoowo ko ɗuuɗɗi, mo vajataa.
Ammaa torotooɗo sey goonɗina, to' o waɗ ɓerɗe ɗiɗi, gam baɗeyɗo ɓerɗe ɗiɗi e nanndi e ɓoggi ndiyam ɗi henndu soggirta to ndu yiɗiri fuu.
Neɗɗo muuɗum, to' tammo e woodi ko heɓata to Jawmiraawo.
Nyumooji ma'ako cenndiri. Mo ɓerɗe ɗiɗi waawataa daraago e wo'ore.
Sey goonɗinɗo cooyɗo nana belɗum, to Allah mawninii ɗum.
Goonɗinɗo diskuɗo boo no nan belɗum to Allah leestinii ɗum. Gam diskuɗo nanndii e pihindi geene ndi neeɓataa.
To naange wulnge ummake, no yo'oriney geene ɗeen, pihindi ndiin ndi saamey, booɗal ma'ari fuu no halkey. Noon diskuɗo oon halkirta wakkaci o huufti kuuɗe ma'ako.
Barkaa laatanto munyanɗo torraaji, gam to o heɓii jaalorgal dow torraa kaan, Allah no hokkey mo giifol yonki ɗum faa abadaa, ngol o waɗi *alkawal hokkugo yiɗaaɓe ma'ako.
To neɗɗo jarrabaama, to' o vi': Allah jarrabake yam. Gam Allah jarrabataake e halleende, o jarrabataako boo koo moye.
Ammaa jarrabeeji e nannga goɗɗo to suunooji ma'ako kalluɗi estii mo, nanngii mo.
To suunooji kalluɗi caawii, ɗi ndimey hakke. To hakke mawnii no rimey maayde.
Banndiraaɓe am ɓe ngiɗmi, to' on njaɓ majjineego.
Caahu mbooɗngu e kokkal geetal ko kokkaaɗen fuu, gada dow ɗum ivonoyi en, to Allah tagɗo jayli dow. Kanko o waylataako, o nanndaa e ɗowdi ngoseyndi.
E yiɗde ma'ako o danyitorii en e voliinde goongaare, gam laatooɗen afɓe tagle ma'ako.
Banndiraaɓe am ɓe ngiɗmi, pahamee ɗu'um: sey koo moye yaawa nango, ammaa to' o yaaw volvugo, to' o yaaw huunƴugo boo.
Gam huunƴere neɗɗo huwataa aadilaaku ngu Allah yiɗi.
Gam ma'ajum, kibinee kuuɗe nyidduɗe e kalluɗe fuu. Leestinee ko'e mooɗon, njaɓon voliinde nde Allah aawi nder ɓerɗe mooɗon, waaweynde hisnugo on.
To' on estu ko'e mooɗon. Mbaɗee ko voliinde ndeen vi'i on, to' on laato nanooɓe nde tan.
Gam nanɗo voliinde Allah, ammaa waɗaay ko nde vi'i, nanndii e daarɗo yeeso muuɗum nder daarorgal,
yi'i no va'i, dilli, ɗoon e ɗoon yeggiti no va'i.

Ammaa kohoruɗo hakkiilo muuɗum dow dooka keeɓka, ndimɗineyka yimɓe, tokki ka, kanko naa o nanoowo ka tan o yeggita, ammaa emo waɗa ko ka vi'i o waɗa. Neɗɗo oon no heɓey barkaa nder kuugal ngal huwata fuu.
To goɗɗo e tammii no neɗɗo diina e goonga, ammaa o waawtaay ɗemngal ma'ako, o estii hoore ma'ako, diina ma'ako boo laatake mehere.
Diina ngoongaha laaɓka yeeso Allah *Baabiraawo woni, vallugo maraaya'en e rewɓe torrotooɓe ɓe worɓe mu''en maayi, e reengo hoore muuɗum gada e tuhundi duuniyaaru.
Banndiraaɓe am, onon goonɗinɓe Jawmiraawo meeɗen Yeesu *Almasiifu Jawmu teddungal, to' on ɓurɗindir ɓiɓɓe-aadama.
To diskuɗo ɓorniiɗo kolte booɗɗe, mo jamngel jiinaariya e hohondu warii hawriinde mooɗon, cooyɗo ɓorniiɗo kolte ceesɗe boo warii,
to on teddinii ɓorniiɗo kolte booɗɗe, on njaɓɓake mo booɗɗum, on mbi'ii mo: « Jooɗa dow daago heso. » Ammaa on mbi'ii cooyɗo: « Dara toon », koo: « Jooɗa e lesdi. »
To on mbaɗii noon, wanaa on ɓurdindirii yimɓe naa? On laatake sernooɓe ɓe nyumooji kalluɗi.
Banndiraaɓe am ɓe ngiɗmi, ngewanee yam ! Wanaa sooyɓe ɓeen Allah suɓi nder duuniyaaru gam o laatina ɓe riskuɓe nder goonɗinki, ɓe ndona laamu ngu o waɗi *alkawal hokkugo yiɗɓe mo naa?
Ammaa onon, on njamnii cooyɗo oon. Wanaa ɗum riskuɓe torrata on naa? Wanaa ɗum kamɓe njaharata on yeeso ceri'a naa?
Wanaa kamɓe kuɗata innde Almasiifu vooɗnde nde noddirteeɗon naa?
On mbaɗii booɗɗum to on ɗowtanake dooka *laamu Allah ngonka nder *Deftere mbi'ika: « Yiɗ ko'odiɗɗaawo maaɗa noon no ngiɗruɗaa hoore maaɗa. »
Ammaa to on ɓurdindirii yimɓe on mbaɗii hakke, ceri'a boo nanngii on, gam on kuultii dooka.
Gam to neɗɗo ɗowtanake dooka kaan fuu, ammaa o fergake goɗɗum nder ma'aka, o laatake mo hakke dow dooka kaan fuu.
Gam Allah biiɗo: « Ta'a waɗ njeenu. » Kanko boo vi'i: « Ta'a waɗ war-hoore. » To a waɗaay njeenu, ammaa a waɗii war-hoore, a huultii dooka kaan fuu.
Gam ma'ajum, ngooree bolle mooɗon e kuuɗe mooɗon laatoo kama ɗe yimɓe serniranteeɓe dooka ndimɗinooha.
Gam nyannde ceri'a, Allah yurminantaa mo walaa yurmeende. Ammaa kolloowo yurmeende hulataa ceri'a.
Banndiraaɓe am, to goɗɗo vi'ii e woodi goonɗinki, ammaa kuuɗe ma'ako kollataa goonɗinki kiin, ɗume ki nafi? Iri ki'i goonɗinki waawataa hisnugo mo.
To tawii a woodi banndiraawo goonɗinɗo gorko koo debbo kolɗo koo dolɗo,
to goɗɗo mooɗon vi'ii mo: « Yah jam, holtu, yar », ammaa kul o hokkaay mo kolte koo nyaamdu, ɗume ɗum nafi mo?
Goonɗinki e hoore muuɗum noon laatii, kul ki waldaa e kuuɗe booɗɗe ki baatki.
Goɗɗo e waawi vi'igo: « Aan a woodi goonɗinki, miin emi woodi kuuɗe booɗɗe. » Mi toontoto mo: « Hollam goonɗinki maaɗa ki waldaa e kuuɗe booɗɗe. Miin boo mi hollu maa goonɗinki am nder kuuɗe. »
A goonɗinii Allah no go'oto naa? Booɗɗum ! *Ginnaaji maa ngoonɗinii, faa eɗi ndiwna gam kulol !
Aan kaaŋaaɗo ! A anndaa goonɗinki ki walaa kuuɗe no mehere naa?
Wanaa gada e kuugal booɗngal Allah laatiniri maama meeɗen *Ibraahim aadaliijo, nde o jaɓi sakkugo ɓiyiiko *Iciyaaku dow sakkirde naa?
A yi'ii, goonɗinki ma'ako e kuugal ma'ako njahadi, kadimaa kuugal ngaal hebbitii goonɗinki ma'ako.
Noon ko *Deftere vi'i heeɓri, nde vi'i: « Ibraahim goonɗinii Allah, gam ma'ajum Allah limani mo ɗum aadilaaku, faa o noddiraa higoo Allah. »
To noon on ngi'ii, gada e kuuɗe neɗɗo laatortoo aadaliijo, naa e goonɗinki muuɗum tan.
Noon boo Rahab furdu heɓri aadilaaku gada e kuuɗe booɗɗe ɗe o huwi, nde o jaɓɓii seewtooɓe *Yahuudu'en, o valli ɓe vurtoraago laawol feere.
Noon no ɓanndu laatortoo maayndu to waldaa e poofɗe, noon boo goonɗinki laatortoo maayki to ki waldaa e kuuɗe booɗɗe.
Banndiraaɓe am, to' on ngoor ɗuuɗɓe mooɗon ndaara laataago ekkitinooɓe. Gam eɗon anndi minon ekkitinooɓe, min cernante ceri'a ɓurka ka yimɓe horiiɓe naawgo.
En fuu en mboofa nder laabi ɗuuɗɗi. To e woodi mo voofataa nder bolle muuɗum, o laatake neɗɗo keeɓɗo, baawɗo darvango ɓanndu muuɗum fuu.
Ndaaree, en mbaɗa lagambal nder honnduko puccu gam darvango ngu. Noon mbaawreten yaharugo ɓanndu ma'agu to ngiɗɗen fuu.
Kooƴemma boo misaalu akali ndiyam, no ki mawniri, e no keni cemmbiɗɗi laggirta ki fuu, e leltirgel pamarel pooɗoowo yaharirta ki to o yiɗi fuu.
Noon ɗemngal boo laatii. Ɗemngal no ku'ungel pamarel nder ɓanndu neɗɗo, ammaa engal mantoroo volvugo haalaaji mawɗi. Ndaaree ladde, no nde mawniri fuu, pe'etel yiite e waawi wulgo nde, nde fuu.
Ɗemngal boo no yiite. Engal saawi koo iri ndeye halleende, engal jooɗii nder ɓanndu neɗɗo, engal nyiddina ndu, ndu fuu. E yiite jahannama ngal huɓɓiraa, engal suma foofaango meeɗen.
Yimɓe e mbaawi darvango bisaaji feere-feere, e diiwe ladde e colli e ko dasoto e liƴƴi fuu.
Ammaa ɗemngal, walaa baawɗo darvango ɗum. Ɗemngal no kallungal. Ngal jooɗataako e wo'ore, engal heevi tooke barooje.
E ma'agal maaltirten Allah Jawmiraawo, Baaba meeɗen, e ma'agal boo kuɗreten yimɓe ɓe Allah tagi nder nanndi muuɗum.
Maaltooje e kuɗle nder honnduko wo'oto mburtoto. Banndiraaɓe am, naa noon haani.
Koo ndiyam mbelɗam e kaaɗɗam e mbaawi vurtaago ɓuldude wo'ore naa?
Banndiraaɓe, dabinoohi rimataa jaaɓe. Barkehi boo rimataa dabiinooje. Noon boo, ɓuldude wo'ore waawataa ɓulnugo ndiyam mbelɗam e kaaɗɗam.
Moye nder mooɗon woodi hikima e fahamu? Sey goonɗo ɗum holla ɗum nder jo'onde vooɗnde, e kuuɗe kuuraaɗe leestinki hoore e hikima.
Ammaa to e woodi nalwiiru hallundu e yiɗde hoore nder ɓerɗe mooɗon, to' on manto mbi'on on ngoodi hikima, noon ɗum feɓnugo goonga.
Iri ka'a hikima ivoyaay to Allah, ammaa to duuniyaaru e nyumooji neɗɗo e *Ceyɗaan ka ivi.
Gam to nalwiiru e yiɗde hoore ngoni, ɗoon ciya potal e koo iri ɗeye kuuɗe kalluɗe tawetee.

Ammaa hikima ivoyka to Allah, aran fuu ka laaɓka. Kadimaa ka waddey jam, eka heevi moƴƴeendam, eka hawta enɗam, eka heevi yurmeende e kuuɗe booɗɗe. Iri hikima kaan ɓurdindirtaa yimɓe, munaafukaare boo walaa nder ma'aka.
Gaddoowo jam, aawi jam, no taƴey aadilaaku.
Toye kaɓe e jokkirli gonɗi nder mooɗon ivi? Wanaa ɗi ivii e giɗaaɗi ɓalli kalluɗi kaɓooji nder ɓerɗe mooɗon naa?
On ngiɗi heɓgo goɗɗum, on keɓataa ɗum. On mbaɗa war-hoore. On keevi koɗey, ammaa on keɓataa ko ngiɗɗon. On kaɓa, on njokkira. On keɓaay ɗum, gam on toraaki ɗum Allah.
Koo to on torake Allah on keɓataa, gam nyumooji mooɗon no kalluɗi, eɗon ngilloo ko velata ɓalli mooɗon tan.
Onon nyaamooɓe amaana ! On anndaa yiɗgo duuniyaaru ɗum wanygo Allah naa? Giɗɗo ndu'u duuniyaaru laatinii hoore muuɗum ganyo Allah.
To' on nyum ko *Deftere vi'i no mehere, nde vi'i: « Allah e ha'aji Ruhu mo o waɗi nder meeɗen korey. »
Allah saahanake en caahu ɓurngu koo ɗume. Kanjum waɗi Deftere vi'i: « Allah e wanyi mawnitiiɓe, ammaa emo hokka leestinɓe ko'e mu''en caahu ma'ako. »
Gam ma'ajum ɗowtanee Allah. Ndartee *Ceyɗaan, ndeen o nyaarey on.
Ɓaditee Allah, kanko boo o ɓaditoto on. Laɓɓinee juuɗe mooɗon, onon ɓe hakke ! Laɓɓinee ɓerɗe mooɗon, onon ɓe ɓerɗe ɗiɗi !
Mettinee ɓerɗe mooɗon, mboyee, pahatee. Jaleeɗe mooɗon koota bojji, velvelo mooɗon hoota mettam ɓeram.
Leestinee ko'e mooɗon yeeso Jawmiraawo, ndeen o ɓantey on.
Banndiraaɓe, to' koo moye mooɗon nyo' banndum. Nyo'ɗo banndum fuu, koo sernani mo, o nyo'ii *Tawreeta, o sernanii ka. To o sernanii Tawreeta, naa o ɗowtantooɗo ka, ammaa o laatake cernanoowo ka.
Go'oto tan woni kokkoowo Tawreeta e cernoowo ka, kanko tan woodi baawɗe hisnugo e halkugo. Ammaa aan a moye, faa eɗa sernana banndaa?
Kakkilee, onon vi'ooɓe: Hannde koo jahango, min njahey ci'e feere, min mbaɗa hitaande toon, min mbaɗa luumaaku toon, min keɓa ceede.
On anndaa ko waɗata jahango. Noye yonki mooɗon va'i? Yonki mooɗon e nanndi e cuurga mburtiika wakkaci seɗɗa tan, ka majja.
Raa no haani mbi'on: To Allah jaɓii, yaharii yonki, min mbaɗey nihi e nihi.
Ammaa jo'oni eɗon mawnito, eɗon manto. Iri kan ɗoon manta ka kalluka.
To noon, annduɗo ko vooɗi fuu huwaay ɗum, o waɗii hakke.
Jo'oni ngewanee yam onon riskuɓe. Mboyee, ƴokee gam torraaji kalluɗi garaneyɗi on.
Jawdi mooɗon nyoli, kolte mooɗon mooƴi.
Jiinaariya e ajurfaari mooɗon puuni. Puunirka ma'ajum kam felata on, ka nyaama ɓalli mooɗon kama yiite. On kawritanii ko'e mooɗon jawdi nder ɗe'e balɗe ɗe duuniyaaru ɓadii timmugo.
Biya ka caliiɗon biyaago huwooɓe gese mooɗon wullake on ! Bojji taƴooɓe gese mooɗon ngarii e noppi Jawmiraawo jawmu baawɗe fuu.
On mbelnii jo'onde mooɗon nder duuniyaaru, on kaɗaay ko'e mooɗon koo ɗume. On paynii ko'e mooɗon kama jawɗi turkaaɗi gam nyannde hirseego.
On cernanii goonga'en, on mbarii ɓe, kamɓe boo ɓe ngeddaay on.
Banndiraaɓe, noon no demoowo munyrata gada iyoonde arande faa heltirde o taƴa, noon haani onon maa munyron faa Jawmiraawo vittoya.
Onon boo munyee, cemmbiɗinee ɓerɗe mooɗon, gam bittoyki Jawmiraawo ɓadake.
Banndiraaɓe, to' on mboymboytir, gam to' on cernanee. To' on njeggit Cernoowo woɗɗa, emo ɗoon darii e dammugal !
Banndiraaɓe, kiimtee no annabo'en volvunooɓe e innde Jawmiraawo munyri nder torraaji. Onon boo, tokkee misaalu maɓɓe.
Eɗen mbi'a munyruɓe noon fuu no barkiɗinaaɓe. On nanii habaru munyal Ayyuuba, kadimaa on anndi ko Jawmiraawo hokki mo e timmoode, gam Jawmiraawo o keeɓɗo yurmeende e yiɗde.
Banndiraaɓe am, ko ɓuri fuu woni to' on kunoro dow, koo lees, koo koo ɗume. Ngooree « ee » mooɗon laatoo « ee », « a'aa » mooɗon laatoo « a'aa », gam to' ceri'a Allah nanngu on.
E woodi jareyɗo torraa nder mooɗon naa? Too, o waɗ do'aare. E woodi naneyɗo belɗum nder mooɗon naa? Too, o yim gimi maaltugo Allah.
E woodi mo yamɗaa nder mooɗon naa? Too, o nodda darvanooɓe *ikiliisiya, ɓe mooma mo nebbam e innde Jawmiraawo, ɓe mbaɗana mo do'aare.
Do'aare waɗaande e goonɗinki no hoyney mo yamɗaa oon, Jawmiraawo boo no umminey mo. To o waɗiino hakke maa, o ya'afetee.
Gam ma'ajum banndiraaɓe, ngeccootiree hakkeeji mooɗon, koo moye waɗana banndum do'aare, gam njamɗiton. Do'aare goongaajo e woodi baawɗe, ende huwa.
*Iliya o neɗɗo kama meeɗen. Nde o waɗi do'aare e ti'inaare to' iyoonde toɓ, koo baadel yooftaaki dow lesdi, faa duuɓi tati e lebbi joveego'o.
Ɓaawo ma'ajum o ɓesdi waɗgo do'aare iyoonde toɓa, ndeen ndiyam toɓi, lesdi boo fuɗni barkaaji.
Banndiraaɓe am, to goɗɗo mooɗon selii laawol goonga, goɗɗo boo wartirii mo,
anndee gartirɗo baɗɗo hakke gada e laawol halkere, hisnii yonki ma'ako e maayde, hakkeeji ma'ako ɗuuɗɗi boo no mooytete.
Miin Biiturus *lilaaɗo Yeesu *Almasiifu vinndani on ngo'ol ɗereewol, onon suɓaaɓe Allah, laatiiɓe jananɓe, sankitiiɓe nder lesɗe Pontus e Galaatiya e Kapadookiya e Aasiya e Bitiniya.
Allah *Baabiraawo meeɗen suɓii on dow anndaangal muuɗum. Ruhu ma'ako senii on, gam ɗowtanooɗon Yeesu Almasiifu, laaɓnireeɗon gada e ƴiiƴam ma'ako. Allah hokku on moƴƴere e jam ɗuuɗɗum !

Maaltemma Allah, Baaba Jawmiraawo meeɗen Yeesu *Almasiifu gam o nanii yurmeende meeɗen korey, faa o hokki en yonki kesum gada e ummitineeki Yeesu Almasiifu nder maayɓe. Noon keɓruɗen tammunde goongaare.
En ndeenti heɓgo barkaaji ɗi Allah resani yimɓe muuɗum toon dow, to ɗi mbonataa, ɗi nyolataa, ɗi ngaylataako.
Gam on ngoonɗini Allah, o reenrey on baawɗe ma'ako, faa keɓon kisndam ɗam o siryii vannginango on *nyannde-darngal.
Gam ma'ajum mbelmbeltee velvelo manngo, koo nde laatii ɗum kaanduɗum ɓerɗe mooɗon metta seɗɗa jo'oni, gam torraaji feere-feere ɗi torreteeɗon.

Torraaji ɗiin ngarii gam godaago goonɗinki mooɗon, kul no goongaahi. Koo jiinaariya, fii gutotooɗum, e yiite godortee. Goonɗinki mooɗon boo ɓurii jiinaariya teddungal piw. Sey ki godoree e torraaji ɗi torreteeɗon, gam keɓon yetteego e teddungal e manngu nyannde Yeesu Almasiifu vanngata.
Koo nde laatii on meeɗaay yi'igo Yeesu, eɗon ngiɗi mo. On ngi'ataa mo jo'oni, ammaa e noon fuu eɗon ngoonɗini mo. On keevii velvelo manngo ngo ɗiiftintaako,
gam on puɗɗii hewtugo ko ndaaroton gada e goonɗinki mooɗon, waato kisndam yonkiiji mooɗon.
*Annabo'en waɗnooɓe annabaaku caahu ngu Allah waɗani on *alkawal muuɗum, liinyi kisndam ɗaam, ndaarii ɗam e hakkiilo.
Ɓe ndaari heɓtugo ndeye ɗum waɗata, e noye ɗum wa'arata. Ruhu Almasiifu gonɗo nder maɓɓe anndinii ɓe, doole Yeesu *Almasiifu torree ko hokka o heɓa teddungal.

Allah hollii ɓe habaru ɗuum laataaki gam ko'e maɓɓe, ammaa ɗum gam mooɗon. Jo'oni boo, wa'ajotooɓe *Habaru Belɗum ngari, ngaddiranii on habaru ɗuum e baawɗe *Ruhu Ceniiɗo ivoyɗo gada dow. Faa e malaa'ika'en e ko'e mu''en e ngiɗi fahamugo habaru ɗuum korey.
Gam ma'ajum, sey ciryooɗon nyumooji mooɗon gam kuugal, peeron gite mooɗon, ndeson tammunde mooɗon fuu dow barkaa ka keɓoton nyannde bannguki Yeesu Almasiifu.
Ɗowtanee Allah, to' on tokku suunooji ɗi ngonnooɗon nder muuɗum ila ko on anndaano goonga.
Noon no Allah nodduɗo on o ceniiɗo, onon boo laatee seniiɓe nder ko kuwoton fuu.
Gam ɗum vinndaama nder *Deftere Seniinde: « Laatee seniiɓe, gam miin mi ceniiɗo. »
Nder do'aare eɗon noddira Allah Baaba, kanko sernanta koo moye fuu deydey e kuugal muuɗum, mo senndindirtaa yimɓe. Gam ma'ajum, timminee balɗe koɗaaku koraniiɗe on nder duuniyaaru e kulol Allah.
Eɗon anndi on coottaama e finaatawaaji mehereeji ɗi tawɗon gada e maamiraaɓe mooɗon. On coottoraaka e fii de''oojum, kama ajurfaari koo jiinaariya,
ammaa Yeesu Almasiifu soottorii on e ƴiiƴam muuɗum caɗɗam, kanko nannduɗo e njawdiri laaɓndi, ndi walaa liddaari koo go'otum.
Allah siryake mo ila duuniyaaru tagaaka, ammaa o vannginii mo nder ɗe'e balɗe cakitiiɗe gam mooɗon.
Gam ma'ako ngoonɗinɗon Allah, ummitinɗo mo gada maayde, mawninii mo boo. To noon, goonɗinki mooɗon e tammunde mooɗon fuu e ɗoon resii to Allah.
Gada e tokkugo goonga cenruɗon ko'e mooɗon, faa mbaawɗon yiɗgo banndiraaɓe nder goonɗinki e yiɗde goongaare. Gam ma'ajum ngiɗngiɗtiree korey e ɓernde laaɓnde.
On ndanyaama danyeeki kesi, wanaa gada e lenyol maayoowol, ammaa gada e lenyol ngol maayata, waato voliinde Allah nde yonki ɗum faa abadaa.
Gam ma'ajum *Deftere Seniinde vi'i: Ɓiɓɓe-aadama fuu nanndi e huɗo, teddungal maɓɓe boo nanndi e pihindi. Huɗo e yo'ora, pihindi e saama,
ammaa voliinde Jawmiraawo sottataa faa abadaa. Voliinde ndeen woni *Habaru Belɗum ɗum nga'ajinaaɗon.
Gam ma'ajum, kibinee koo iri ndeye halleende, e fewre, e munaafukaare, e nalwiiru, e nyo'ore fuu.
Kama no ɓikkon keccon ngiɗiri kosam ɗam walaa jillo, noon onon boo haani ngiɗron voliinde Allah laaɓnde, gam faa nde mawnina on, njottooɗon e heɓgo kisndam.
Gam *Deftere Seniinde vi'i: « On meeɗii mbooɗeenga Jawmiraawo. »
Ɓaditee Yeesu, gam kanko woni haayre nde yonki nde mahooɓe kibini, ammaa Allah suɓii nde, nde vooɗnde yeeso muuɗum.
Onon boo, laatee kama kaaƴe ɗe yonki maharuɗe *Wuro Allah Seniingo, laatooɗon kawtal *aardiiɓe diina seniiɓe, waɗanooɓe Allah sadakaaji ruhu, ɗi o jaɓata gada e Yeesu *Almasiifu.
Gam *Deftere Seniinde vi'i: « Mi suɓii haayre ɓurdunde, laatiinde fuɗɗoode mahadi wuro am. Mi resey nde nder si'ire *Siyoona. Goonɗinɗo haayre ndeen fuu semtintaake sam. »
Haayre ndeen e laatii teddunde to mooɗon, onon goonɗinɓe. Ammaa ɓeen ɓe ngoonɗinaay nde, Deftere vi'ii ɓe: « Haayre nde mahooɓe kibini, kayre laatii haayre ɓurnde jogaago mahadi,
ɗum haayre fergoore yimɓe, e haayre do''oore ɓe. » Yimɓe pergake nde, gam ɓe calake tokkugo bolle Allah, kanjum woni ko Allah siryaninoo ɓe.

Ammaa onon ngoni jama'aare suɓaande, kawtal aardiiɓe diina Laamiiɗo, lenyol ceniingol, yimɓe ɓe Allah suɓani hoore muuɗum. O suɓii on gam nga'ajinon habaru kuuɗe ma'ako booɗɗe, kanko nodduɗo on nder niɓre, ngarɗon nder jayngol ma'ako kaayniingol !
Ndeenno wanaa on yimɓe Allah, ammaa jo'oni on laatake lenyol ma'ako. Ndeenno on keɓaayno yurmeende ma'ako, ammaa jo'oni on keɓii yurmeende ma'ako.
Yiɗaaɓe am, on laatii hoɗɓe e jananɓe nder ndu'u duuniyaaru. Gam ma'ajum emi toroo on ceedon e giɗaaɗi ɓerɗe mooɗon, gillotooɗi halkugo yonkiiji mooɗon dum.
Kollee gikku mbooɗngu nder yimɓe heeferɓe, gam koo to ɓe noddirii on halluɓe, e noon fuu doole ɓe ngi'a kuuɗe mooɗon booɗɗe, ɓe teddina Allah nyannde o vanngani ɓe.
Gam daliila Jawmiraawo, ɗowtanee aardiiɓe duuniyaaru: gada laamiiɗo ɓurɗo manngu,
faa e gomna'en ɓe o liloyi, gam ɓe cernana waɗooɓe ko boni, ɓe mana waɗooɓe ko vooɗi.
Gam nyumo Allah woni cuumon konnduɗe yimɓe ɓe ngalaa ƴoyre, volvooɓe bolle mehereeje, gada e kuuɗe mooɗon booɗɗe.
Onon on rimɓe, ammaa to' on ngartir ndimaaku mooɗon laato hujja huugo halleende, sey njooɗooɗon jo'onde holleynde on maccuɓe Allah.
Teddinee yimɓe fuu, ngiɗee banndiraaɓe goonɗinɓe, kulee Allah, teddinee mawɗo lesdi.
Onon maccuɓe, ɗowtanee jawmiraaɓe mooɗon, teddinee ɓe. To' on ɗowtano ɓe gikku mbooɗngu, koo moƴƴuɓe tan, ammaa faa e sa'atuɓe boo.
Jarɗo torraa wanaa gam layfi muuɗum, to o munyii gam Allah, o waɗii ko vooɗi.
To on piyaama gam on mbaɗi layfi, koo to on munyi, ɗume mantortooɗon? Ammaa to on munyii torraaji keɓɗi on nder kuugal mooɗon booɗngal, ndeen Allah no barkiɗiney on.
Iri torraaji ɗiin Allah noddiri on, gam *Almasiifu boo torraama sabu mooɗon. O ɗalanii on misaalu gam tokkon kosɗe ma'ako.
O meeɗaay waɗgo hakke, fewre boo meeɗaay vurtaago e honnduko ma'ako.
Nde ɓe kuɗi mo, o huɗtaaki ɓe, nde ɓe torri mo, o wa'ataaki ɓe. Ammaa o halfini hoore ma'ako Allah, cerniroowo goonga.
Almasiifu roondake hakkeeji meeɗen dow ɓanndu muuɗum wakkaci o ɓilaa dow *gaafagal, gam ceeden e hakke, poofen nder aadilaaku. « Gada e nawnanɗe ma'ako keɓɗon hoyneego. »
On laatinoo kama baali kalkuɗi, ammaa jo'oni on ngartiraama to gaynaako, deeneyɗo yonkiiji mooɗon.
Onon rewɓe ɗowtanee worɓe mooɗon, gam koo to ɓe tokkaay voliinde Allah, gikku mooɗon mbooɗngu e waawi waylitoygo ɓe, koo to on mbolvanaay ɓe voliinde Allah koo wo'ore,
gam ɓe ngi'ey no kuuɗe mooɗon laaɓri e no teddinirton ɓe.
To' mbooɗndam mooɗon laato ɗam ɓanndu tan, kama mooraago, e haɓɓugo koɗi jiinaariya, e ɓornaago kolte booɗɗe,
ammaa ngooree mbooɗndam mooɗon laatoo ɗam ɓernde, waato ɓernde nde munyal e jam. Kanjam woni mbooɗndam tabbitoojam, ɓurɗam yeeso Allah.
Bana nii rewɓe seniiɓe ndeenno kolliri mbooɗndam mu''en e resgo tammunde maɓɓe e Allah, ɓe ɗowtanii worɓe maɓɓe.
Noon Saaratu ɗowtoranii koree muuɗum Ibraahim, faa o noddiri mo jawmiiko. Onon boo, on laatake ɓiɓɓe Saaratu, kul on kuwii ko vooɗi, on kulaay saaydingo goonɗinki mooɗon.

Onon worɓe boo, njooɗodee e rewɓe mooɗon noon no haani. Anndee, semmbee debbo fotaa e ɗum gorko. Teddinee ɓe, gam onon e maɓɓe fuu on keɓii barkaa ngo'ota, waato yonki ɗum faa abadaa. Mbaɗee ɗum, gam to' goɗɗum haɗ do'aaje mooɗon.
Jo'oni kam, sey nyumo mooɗon laatoo wo'oto, njurmindiree, ngiɗngiɗtiree e yiɗde mbanndiraagu, mballindiree, leestinee ko'e mooɗon.
To' on mba'atoro halleende e halleende, koo kuɗdi e kuɗdi, ammaa mba'atoree barkaa, gam ma'ajum Allah noddi on faa keɓon barkaa.
Gam *Deftere Seniinde vi'i: « Giɗɗo foofaango vooɗngo, e velvelo nder balɗe muuɗum, sey o woora bolle kalluɗe, o woora fewre boo.
O woora huugo ko halli, o waɗa ko vooɗi: o yillo jam, o yilloo ɗum e ɓernde ma'ako fuu.
Gam gite Jawmiraawo e cutii goonga'en dum, emo yewanii do'aaje maɓɓe, ammaa emo wanyi waɗooɓe ko halli. »
Moye torrata on kul on ti'inii huugo ko vooɗi?
Ammaa on barkiɗinaaɓe to yimɓe torrii on gam huugo ko vooɗi. To' on kul yimɓe ɓeen, to' hakkiilooji mooɗon njiiɓo !
Teddinee Almasiifu nder ɓerɗe mooɗon, gam o Jawmiraawo mooɗon. Sey wakkaci fuu ciryooɗon toontaago ƴamooɓe on daliila tammunde mooɗon.
Ammaa toontoree ɓe e leestinki hoore, mawninee ɓe, to' *nyumooji ɓerɗe mooɗon pel on. Ndeen yimɓe ɓeen, hallinooɓe kuuɗe mooɗon booɗɗe ɗe kuwoton gam on tokkii laawol Almasiifu, no cemtey.
Torreego gam kuugal booɗngal, to ɗum nyumo Allah, ɓurii torreego gam kuugal kallungal.

Gam *Almasiifu e hoore muuɗum torraama, faa o maayi gam hakkeeji yimɓe fuu, nde wo'ore faa abadaa. Kanko mo walaa hakke, o maayanii yimɓe ɓe hakke, gam o ɓattina on to Allah. O waraama e ɓanndu ma'ako, o ummitinaama e Ruhu.
E Ruhu oon Yeesu yahi, wa'ajiniroyi yonkiiji maayɓe omndaaɗi nder kaso.

Yonkiiji ɗiin ngoni yimɓe salinooɓe tokkugo Allah nder jaamaniiru Nuhu. Wakkaci ɗuum, Allah munyanii ɓe faa Nuhu sehi akali makki. Ammaa yimɓe seɗɗa tan natti akali kiin, waato yimɓe njoveetato, kisi ndiyam ɗaam.

Ndiyam ɗaam e laatii misaalu ko sappinta on *baptisma ila ɗum waraay. Gada e ma'ajum kisɗon jo'oni. Baptisma ɗuum laataaki gam ittugo tuhundi ɓanndu, ammaa gam waɗgo *alkawal tokkugo Allah e nyumo ɓernde laaɓngo. Gada e ummitineeki Yeesu *Almasiifu baptisma hisnirta on.
Kanko ƴeentuɗo dow, emo jooɗii e junngo Allah nyaamo, malaa'ika'en e laamiiɓe e baawɗeeji asama fuu ɗowtanake mo.
Nde laatii *Almasiifu torraama nder ɓanndu, onon boo sey ciryooɗon ɓerɗe mooɗon ndartanooɗon torraaji kama Almasiifu. Gam torriiɗo nder ɓanndu seedi e hakke.
To noon, gada jo'oni faa timmoode balɗe mooɗon nder duuniyaaru, tokkee ko Allah yiɗi, ngooree tokkugo giɗaaɗi ɓanndu.
Jo'onde nde njooɗinooɗon nder ko yimɓe heeferɓe kuwata heƴi. On njooɗakeno nder njeenu e tokkugo giɗaaɗi ɓanndu e yare-yare e pijirle kalluɗe e tokkugo gumkiiji, fii nyidduɗum.
Jo'oni ɗum haaynake ɓe korey gam on ɗalii hawtugo e maɓɓe nder kuuɗe kalluɗe, kanjum waɗi eɓe njaasna on dum.
Ammaa ɓe ndaroyto yeeso Allah, ɓe ngeccoo mo ko ɓe mbaɗi fuu, gam Allah siryake sernango maayɓe e foofooɓe fuu.
Kanjum waɗi faa e maayɓe nga'ajinaa *Habaru Belɗum, koo nde laatii ɓe maayi, kama no yimɓe fuu maayrata, e noon fuu ɓe poofey noon no Allah foofrata.
Timmoode ku'uje fuu ɓadake. Gam ma'ajum, kakkilee, ndeenee ko'e mooɗon, gam mbaawon waɗgo do'aare.
Ko ɓuri manngu fuu woni, ngiɗngiɗtiron e ɓernde wo'ore, gam yiɗde e ya'afoo hakkeeji ɗuuɗɗi.
Njaɓɓee hoɗɓe nder gure mooɗon e velvelo, naa e hissa.
Allah hokkii koo moye mooɗon fuu kokkal muuɗum. Kuutiniree kokke ɗeen gam nafron ɗe woɓɓe, ndeen on laatake reennaaɓe kokke Allah vooɗɓe.

Ga'ajotooɗo, sey wa'ajina bolle Allah tan. Balloowo woɓɓe boo, sey vallira ɓe e semmbee ɗum Allah hokki ɗum. Gam Allah teddinee nder kuuɗe ɗeen fuu gada e Yeesu *Almasiifu. Teddungal e baawɗe laatanoo mo faa abadaa ! Aamiin !
Yiɗaaɓe am, to' torraa ngareyka to mooɗon gam godaago on, haayno on. Koo to ka naawri ba yiite, to' on ndaar ka kama ka haanaa heɓgo on.
Ammaa nanee belɗum to on kawtii e Yeesu *Almasiifu nder torraaji, faa keevon velvelo ngo walaa keerol to teddungal ma'ako vanngi.
Barkaa laatanto on, to yimɓe njaltinirii on gam innde Yeesu Almasiifu, gam e ɗum holla Ruhu tedduɗo, waato *Ruhu Allah, e wondi e mooɗon.
To' koo go'oto nder mooɗon yar torraa gam o baɗoowo war-hoore, koo gujjo, koo kuwoowo ko vooɗaa, koo nattoowo ko walanaa ɗum.
Ammaa to goɗɗo mooɗon torraama gam o tokkuɗo Yeesu, to' o nan cemtuɗum, ammaa sey o yetta Allah gam o raaraama tokkuɗo Almasiifu.
Wakkaci Allah sernanta yimɓe ɓadake, o fuɗɗirey yimɓe ma'ako tawo. To o fuɗɗirii en, enen, ndeen ɗume laatanto ɓeen saliiɓe jaɓgo Habaru Allah Belɗum?
Gam *Deftere vi'i: « To kisndam saɗanii goongaajo, ndeen ɗume laatantoo yimɓe ɓe ngoonɗinaay Allah e waɗooɓe hakke? »
Gam ma'ajum, torraaɓe dow nyumo Allah fuu, sey ɓe ti'inoo waɗgo kuuɗe booɗɗe, nder halfingo ko'e maɓɓe e Allah tagoowo, kebbinoowo *alkawal muuɗum.

Miin Biiturus, emi toroo on, onon darvanooɓe goonɗinɓe, gam miin boo mi aardiiɗo goonɗinɓe, caayduujo torraaji Yeesu *Almasiifu. Kadimaa boo, ɗo'o yeeso mi heɓey geɗal nder teddungal ma'ako nyannde o vittoyi. Gam ma'ajum, emi toroo on:

ndeenee *ikiliisiya ka Allah reenni on, kama no gaynaako reenrata baali muuɗum. To' on ndeenru ka doole, ammaa e ɓernde laaɓnde kama no Allah yiɗiri. To' on kuu ɗum gam heɓgo ceede e laabi leliiɗi, ammaa kuuree ɗum e ɓernde laaɓnde.
To' on kollu manngu dow yimɓe ɓe Allah hokki on, ammaa laatanee ɓe misaalu ɗum ɓe tokkata.
Ndeen to Gaynaako Mawɗo oon vanngi, on keɓey giifol manngu ngol waylataako faa abadaa.
Onon boo kaye'en, ɗowtanee mawɓe. On fuu, kollindiree leestinaare nder kuuɗe mooɗon, gam *Deftere Seniinde vi'i: « Allah e wanyi mawnitiiɓe, ammaa emo hokka leestinɓe ko'e mu''en caahu ma'ako. »
Gam ma'ajum leestinee ko'e mooɗon yeeso Allah Jawmu baawɗe, gam o ɓanta on nder wakkaci ɗum o suɓi.
Kokkee Allah ɓillaaje mooɗon fuu, gam emo reeni on.
Kakkilee, ndeenee ko'e mooɗon gam ganyo mooɗon *Ceyɗaan e ɗoon yiiloo kama mawndu veelaandu, o ɗoon yilloo mo o nyaami.
Ndartee mo, cemmbiɗee nder goonɗinki mooɗon, gam eɗon anndi banndiraaɓe goonɗinɓe nder duuniyaaru fuu e ɗoon njara torraaji iri ɗi torreteeɗon.

To on torraama wakkaci seɗɗa fuu, ndeen Allah mo yiɗde nodduɗo on, gam natton teddungal muuɗum tabbitngal nder kawtal e Yeesu *Almasiifu, kanko o laatiney on timmuɓe, o semmbiɗiney on, o tabbitina on, o waɗa ndarooɗon e semmbee.
Baawɗe tabbitana mo faa abadaa ! Aamiin.
Siilas mo ndesmi no banndiraawo koolniiɗo, valli yam vinndango on ngo'ol ɗereewol damungol. Mi vinndii ngol gam mi holla on ko woni caahu Allah goongajum. Cemmbiɗee nder caahu nguun !
Jama'aare goonɗinɓe wonɓe lesdi Babiila, ɓe Allah suɓi noon no o suɓri on, kinnii on. Markus boo laatiiɗo ɓiyam nder goonɗinki hinnii on.
Kinnindiree e hinnoore kama nde yiɗruɓe. Jam wondu e mooɗon, onon hawtuɓe e Yeesu *Almasiifu !

Ngo'ol ɗereewol ivii to am, miin Simon Biiturus, maccuɗo Yeesu *Almasiifu e *lilaaɗo ma'ako. Emi hinna on, onon heɓɓe goonɗinki ki darajja iri ki min keɓi. En keɓrii goonɗinki kiin gada e aadilaaku Yeesu Almasiifu, Allah meeɗen e kisnoowo en.
Anndal ngal annduɗon Allah e Yeesu Jawmiraawo meeɗen ɓesdan on barkaa e jam.
Allah hokkii en koo ɗume ko nafata en nder foofaango meeɗen iri ngo ɗowtaniiɓe mo. O hokkirii en ɗum e baawɗe ma'ako e anndugo mo, kanko nodduɗo en kawten e ma'ako teddungal e mbooɗirka.
Noon o wa'arani en *alkawalji mawɗi booɗɗi. O waɗii ɗi gam laatooɗon hawtuɓe e ma'ako nder tabiya ma'ako, kison suunooji kalluɗi gonɗi nder duuniyaaru.
Gam ma'ajum, ti'inee ɓesdon mbooɗirka dow goonɗinki mooɗon, dow mbooɗirka ɓesdon anndugo Allah,
dow anndal ɓesdon reengo hoore, dow reengo hoore ɓesdon munyal, dow munyal ɓesdon ɗowtanaago Allah,
dow ɗowtanaago Allah ɓesdon yiɗgo banndiraaɓe, dow yiɗgo banndiraaɓe boo, ɓesdon yiɗde goongaare.
To faa iri ɗi'i gikkuuji e ngoodi nder mooɗon, to faa eɗi ɓesdoo nder mooɗon dum, ɗi laatiney on ti'iniiɓe, yahooɓe yeeso nder anndugo Jawmiraawo meeɗen Yeesu *Almasiifu.
Ammaa mo walaa iri ngun ɗoon gikku fuu, laatake bumɗo mo yi'ataa to woɗɗi. O yeggitii Allah laɓɓiniino mo gada e hakkeeji ma'ako kihiɗi.
Gam ma'ajum onon banndiraaɓe, ti'inee jogaago noddoore nde Allah noddi on, e cuɓol ngol o suɓi on. To on mbaɗii noon, on ndo''ataako sam !
Noon keɓroton laawol nattugo *laamu tabbitngu ngu Jawmiraawo meeɗen Yeesu Almasiifu kisnoowo en.
Mi tokkey hiimtingo on habaru ɗuum wakkaci fuu, koo nde laatii on anndi ɗum, on tabbitii boo nder goonga ka njaɓɗon.
To faa emi foofa, mi nyumii e haani mi findina hakkiilooji mooɗon gada e hiimtingo on habaru ɗuum.
Emi anndi mi ɓadake ɗalgo duuniyaaru, kama ko Jawmiraawo meeɗen Yeesu Almasiifu anndinnoo yam.
Gam ma'ajum mi waɗey ko mbaawmi fuu gam kiimtooɗon habaru ɗuum ɓaawo maayde am.
Nde min anndini on garol Jawmiraawo meeɗen Yeesu *Almasiifu e baawɗe muuɗum, min anndiniraay on ɗum e tahaleeji yimɓe. Ammaa min ngi'ii teddungal ma'ako e gite amin.
Daahir, Allah *Baabiraawo hokkii mo teddungal e manngu. Wakkaci ɗuum Allah mo teddungal manngal vi'i: « O'o woni Ɓiyam giɗaaɗo mo naneymi belɗum muuɗum. »
Minon e ko'e amin, min nanii voliinde ndeen ivoynde dow, nde min ngondunoo e ma'ako dow vaamnde seniinde.

Ɗum semmbiɗinii goonɗinki meeɗen dow ko annabo'en mbi'inoo ndeenno. E haani ngewanooɗon bolle maɓɓe, gam ɗe laatanoo on kama fitila njaynotooka nder niɓre. Tokkee ka faa veeta. Ndeen hoodere fajiri no ɗelkey nder ɓerɗe mooɗon.
Emi yiɗi anndon laaɓɗum, walaa baawɗo fassaraago defte *annabo'en e hoore muuɗum noon no yiɗiri.
Gam walaa annabaaku meeɗi iɓgo e nyumo neɗɗo, ammaa *Ruhu Ceniiɗo, kam hokki annabo'en baawɗe volvugo ko Allah vi'i ɓe.

Noon no *annabo'en fevooɓe ngardunoo nder lenyol *Isiraa'iila ndeenno, noon boo ekkitinooɓe fevooɓe mbanngirta nder mooɗon. Ɓe ngaddaney on ekkitinol fewre kalkoowol, faa ɓe njedda Jawmiraawo coottiiɗo ɓe. Noon ɓe pooɗranta ko'e maɓɓe halkere yaawnde.
Yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe no tokkey kuuɗe maɓɓe kalluɗe. Ɓe laatoto daliila hallingo laawol goonga.
Koɗey ceede no waɗey ɓe ekkitina on habaruuji peve gam ɓe nyaamra on riiba. Ammaa ceri'a maɓɓe taƴaama ilaa, halkere boo e ɗoon reenti ɓe.
Koo malaa'ika'en ndeenno waɗɓe hakke maa, Allah wooraay ɓe ɓe eltaaka. O ferii ɓe nder yiite jahannama. O haɓɓirii ɓe sarkaaji nder niɓre. Eɓe ndeenti nyannde ceri'a.
Koo yimɓe duuniyaaru ndeenno boo, Allah wooraay ɓe, ɓe eltaaka. Ammaa o rufii ndiyam ƴufaana dow yedduɓe Allah, o hisni Nuhu ga'ajinoowo goonga, kam e yimɓe njoveeɗiɗo tan.
Kadimaa Allah sernanii ci'e Sodoma e Gomora, halkirii ɗe yiite, ɗe laatii ndo'oka, gam halluɓe fuu ngi'a ko tammii heɓgo ɗum'en.
O hisnii Luutu neɗɗo goongaajo, gam halleende yimɓe ci'e ɗeen mettinii ɓernde Luutu korey.
Luutu goongaajo oon, jooɗake nder yimɓe halluɓe. Nyalaande fuu ɓernde ma'ako e naawa korey, gam kuuɗe maɓɓe kalluɗe ɗe o yi'ata e ɗe o nanata.
To noon, Jawmiraawo e anndi no hisnirta ɗowtaniiɓe mo e torraaji mu''en. Emo anndi boo no o jogortoo halluɓe faa nyannde ceri'a,
ɓurna muuɗum ɓeen tokkuɓe giɗaaɗi ɓalli mu''en e yaviiɓe manngu Jawmiraawo. Ɓe'e ekkitinooɓe fevooɓe, ɓe cemtataa sam, ɓe mawnitii ɓe, ɓe kulataa huɗgo koo mawɓe asama.
Koo malaa'ika'en ɓurɓe ekkitinooɓe ɓeen semmbee e baawɗe, kuɗataa mawɓe ɓeen yeeso Jawmiraawo.
Ammaa ɓe'e yimɓe, ɓe tokkii tabiya maɓɓe, ɓe ngalaa hakkiilo kama diiwe ladde dimaaɗe gam nanngee mbaree. Eɓe ɗoon kuɗa ɗuum ko ɓe pahamaay. Allah no halkey ɓe kama diiwe ladde.

Ɓe mbiyorte halleende nde ɓe kallirannoo woɓɓe. Eɓe nana belɗum waɗgo giɗaaɗi ɓalli maɓɓe kalluɗi, faa e yeeso gite yimɓe. Eɓe nyaamda e mooɗon, eɓe nana belɗum majjingo on. Jo'onde maɓɓe e laatii semtunde.
Raartugo rewɓe yeenooɓe tan woni nyumo maɓɓe dum, ɓe comataa waɗgo hakke sam. Eɓe majjina ɓe goonɗinki mu''en semmbiɗaa. Ɓerɗe maɓɓe keevii koɗey ceede. Daahir eɓe nder la'anoore Allah.
Ɓe celii laawol goonga, ɓe kalki, ɓe tokkii laawol Balaama ɓii Beyor, giɗɗo waɗgo halleende gam heɓa ceede.
Ammaa o felaama dow boofol ma'ako. Njaakiwa nga meeɗaay volvugo, volvanii mo e voliinde neɗɗo, nga haɗi mo waɗgo vemmbere ndeen.
Ɓe'e ekkitinooɓe fevooɓee nanndi e ɓulli ɗi ngalaa ndiyam, e duule ɗe henndu soggata. Allah siryake niɓre ɓaleere kurum gam maɓɓe.
Eɓe mantoroo bolle mehereeje. Eɓe ngilloo huutinirgo suunooji kalluɗi gam ɓe esta yimɓe vurtoynooɓe nder ɓe anndaa Allah ko neeɓaay.
Eɓe mbi'a, ɓe'e yimɓe no laatoto rimɓe, ammaa kamɓe e ko'e maɓɓe ɓe maccuɓe hakke, gam ko jaalii neɗɗo fuu, laatinii mo maccuɗo ma'ajum.

To goɗɗo e anndi Jawmiraawo meeɗen Yeesu *Almasiifu, faa o heɓii hisneego e baawɗeeji duuniyaaru kalkooji. Ndeen o vittii nder ma'aji, faa ɗi njaalii mo. Daahir timmoode ma'ako no ɓurey fuɗɗoode ma'ako hallugo.
Kul iri ɓe'e yimɓe anndaayno laawol goonga maa, daa ɗum ɓuraniino ɓe, dow e anndugo ngol, ndeen vitta ɓaawo, woora tokkugo dooka ceniika ka ɓe kokkaa.
Ko ɓe mbaɗi, fotii deydey e balndol bi'ingol: « Kareeru tuuti, so''ake tahii tuutam muuɗum. » E bi'ingol kadimaa: « Ngaduwa lootaanga so''ake tallake nder loɓokke. »
Yiɗaaɓe am, ngo'ol woni ɗereewol am ɗiɗaɓol ngol mbinndanmi on. Nder ɗereeji am ɗiɗi ɗiin fuu, mi raari hiimtingo on ko ekkitinooɗon, gam mi findina nyumooji mooɗon booɗɗi.
Emi yiɗi kiimtooɗon bolle ɗe *annabo'en seniiɓe mbolvunoo ila ndeenno. Kiimtee boo ekkitinol Jawmiraawo meeɗen kisnoowo ngol lilaaɓe ngaddani on.
Aran fuu emi yiɗi anndon: Nder balɗe timmoode duuniyaaru, tokkuɓe giɗaaɗi ɓalli mu''en no ngarey. Ɓe njaltinira on,
ɓe mbi'ey: « Yeesu waɗaniino on alkawal no wartey, ee toye mo? Goonɗinɓe aartuɓe en maayii ilaa, ammaa fii fuu e ɗoon noon no wontiri, ila fuɗɗam duuniyaaru faa hannde. »
Yimɓe ɓeen calake anndugo ka'a goonga: Ndeenno, Allah tagirii dow e lees e voliinde muuɗum. O tagiri lesdi e ndiyam, o vurtini ndi e ndiyam.
Gada e ndiyam ƴufaana boo, Allah halkirnoo duuniyaaru ndeenno.
Jo'oni boo, dow e lees ko ngi'oton, voliinde Allah ndeen kam jogii ɗum tawo, faa nyannde ɗum wuletee e yiite, nyalaande nde ɗum sernanta halluɓe.
Yiɗaaɓe am, to' on njeggit ɗu'um: to Jawmiraawo, nyalaande wo'ore e nanndani mo e duuɓi dubuu, duuɓi dubuu boo e nanndani mo e nyalaande wo'ore.
Woɓɓe e ɗoon mbi'a Jawmiraawo neeɓii hebbinaay alkawal muuɗum, ammaa naa ɗum noon. O munyanii yimɓe, gam o yiɗaa koo go'oto halka, ammaa emo yiɗi yimɓe fuu tuuba.

E noon fuu, Jawmiraawo no wartey daahir. O warey kama no gujjo wardata. Nyanndeere ndeen, assamaaji no majjey e olko semmbiɗngo. Ku'uje ko woni asama fuu no nguletee e yiite. Duuniyaaru e ko woni nder ma'aru fuu no majjey.
Nde laatii ku'uje ɗe'e fuu no kalkirey kama nii, on anndi no haani njooɗorooɗon. Sey njooɗooɗon jo'onde seniinde, tokkon Allah e goonga nder koo ɗume fuu.
Sey on laatoo reentuɓe nyalaande Allah. Ti'inee huugo ila nde waraay, gam nde wara jaawɗum. Nyalaande ndeen assamaaji no nguletee ɗi kalkee. Ko woni dow fuu no narkoto nder yiite.
Ammaa, Allah waɗanii en alkawal no hokkey en asama kesa e lesdi kesri, toon to aadilaaku woni dum. Kanjum ndeentuɗen.
Gam ma'ajum yiɗaaɓe am, nde laatii on ndeenti nyalaande bittoyki Jawmiraawo, ti'inee jooɗaago jo'onde laaɓnde, nde walaa feloore yeeso Allah, gam njooɗooɗon jam hakkunde mooɗon e ma'ako.
To' on njeggit munyal ngal Jawmiraawo meeɗen waɗani en, ngal omtanii on laawol hisgo. Bulus, banndii'en giɗaaɗo boo, vinndani on haala kaan gada e hikima ka Allah hokki mo.

Nder ɗereeji ma'ako ɗi o vinndi fuu, emo volva dow haala kaan. Ɗereeji ma'ako boo e ngoodi bolle caɗɗe heɓtaago. Yimɓe ɓe ngalaa anndal, ɓe goonɗinki mu''en cemmbiɗaa, e mbonna ma'ana ma'aje, kama noon no ɓe mboovi bonnirgo goɗɗe aayaaje Allah. Gam ma'ajum, eɓe pooɗana ko'e maɓɓe halkere.
Ammaa onon yiɗaaɓe am, nde laatii on aartii on anndinaama ku'uje ɗeen, ndeenee ko'e mooɗon gam to' saliiɓe tokkugo Allah estir on peve mu''en, ɓe cottina on to ndarinooɗon e semmbee.
Mawniree caahu e anndugo Jawmiraawo meeɗen Yeesu *Almasiifu kisnoowo en. Teddungal laatanoo mo gada jo'oni faa abadaa ! Aamiin !

Emin mbinndana on habaru goɗɗo bi'eteeɗo Voliinde, goonɗo ila fuɗɗam. Min nanii habaru ma'ako, min ngi'ii mo e gite amin, min ndaarii mo, min meemii mo e juuɗe amin. Kanko woni voliinde hokkoore yimɓe yonki.
Yonki kiin vannginaama. Min ngi'ii ki, min caaydii dow ma'aki. Min caaydinii on kanki woni yonki ɗum faa abadaa, gonnooki to *Baabiraawo, bannginaaki e amin.
Ko min ngi'i e ko min nani, kanjum min ngeccotoo on, gam onon boo kawton e amin, minon hawtuɓe e *Baabiraawo e Ɓiyum Yeesu *Almasiifu.
Emin mbinndana on ɗum, gam faa velvelo meeɗen heeva.
Habaru ɗum min nani to *Almasiifu, kanjum min ngeccotoo on, waato Allah o jayngol, niɓre walaa to ma'ako sam.
To en mbi'ii en kawti e ma'ako, ammaa en njooɗii nder niɓre, en pevii, en tokkaay goonga.

Ammaa to en njooɗii nder jayngol, noon no Allah e hoore muuɗum jooɗorii nder ma'agol, ndeen kam en laatoto hawtuɓe hakkunde meeɗen. Ƴiiƴam Ɓiyiiko Yeesu boo, no laɓɓiney en gada e hakkeeji meeɗen fuu.
To en mbi'ii en ngalaa hakke, en pevanii ko'e meeɗen, goonga boo walaa nder meeɗen.
Ammaa to en ngeccake Allah hakkeeji meeɗen, kanko o koolniiɗo, kebbinoowo *alkawal ma'ako, o ya'afanto en, o laɓɓina en gada e koo ndeye halleende meeɗen fuu.
To en mbi'ii en mbaɗaay hakke, en laatinii Allah pevoowo, voliinde ma'ako boo walaa nder ɓerɗe meeɗen.
Ɓikkon am, mi vinndanii on ɗum gam to' on mbaɗ hakke. Ammaa to goɗɗo waɗii hakke, en ngoodi keedanoowo en yeeso *Baabiraawo, waato Yeesu *Almasiifu goongaajo.
Kanko sakki yonki ma'ako gam hakkeeji meeɗen nja'afee. Wanaa gam hakkeeji meeɗen tan, ammaa gam hakkeeji yimɓe duuniyaaru fuu.
To en ɗowtanake dookaaji Allah, kanjum hollata en anndi mo.
Biiɗo e anndi Allah, ammaa ɗowtanaaki dookaaji ma'ako, o pevoowo, goonga walaa nder ma'ako.
Ammaa to neɗɗo tokkii voliinde Allah, daahir yiɗde Allah heevii nder muuɗum. Noon anndirten en njooɗii nder kawtal e Allah.
Biiɗo e wondi e Allah, sey jooɗoroo noon no *Almasiifu jooɗori.
Banndiraaɓe am ɓe ngiɗmi, ko mbinndanmi on wanaa ɗum dooka kesa, ammaa ɗum dooka neeɓka ka annduɗon ilaa. Dooka neeɓka kaan woni habaru ɗum nannooɗon.
Ammaa e noon fuu, dooka ka mbinndanmi on jo'oni e laatii kesa. Goonga dooka kaan vanngii nder Almasiifu, ka vannginaama nder mooɗon onon boo. Gam niɓre e dilla, jayngol goongawol fuɗɗii yaynaago.
To goɗɗo vi'ii nder jayngol woni, ammaa e wanyi banndum, ndeen kam nder niɓre o woni faa jo'oni.
Giɗɗo banndum nder jayngol jooɗii, o laatataako daliila fergere goɗɗo boo.
Ganyɗo banndum nder niɓre jooɗii, nder niɓre boo o yahata, o anndaa to o fa'i, gam niɓre vumnii mo.
Ɓikkon, mi vinndanii on gam hakkeeji mooɗon nja'afaama barkaa Almasiifu.
Baabaaji, mi vinndanii on gam eɗon anndi goonɗo ila fuɗɗam. Kaye'en, mi vinndanii on gam on njaalake *Kalluɗo.

Ɓikkon, mi vinndanii on gam eɗon anndi *Baabiraawo. Baabaaji, mi vinndanii on gam eɗon anndi goonɗo ila fuɗɗam. Kaye'en, mi vinndanii on gam on ngoodi semmbee, voliinde Allah e jooɗii nder mooɗon, kadimaa on njaalake Kalluɗo.
To' on ngiɗ duuniyaaru, e ko woni nder ma'aru fuu. Gam giɗɗo duuniyaaru waawataa yiɗgo *Baabiraawo.
Ko woni nder duuniyaaru, waato giɗaaɗi ɓanndu e giɗaaɗi gite e mantoraago ko woodi, ɗum fuu ɗum ivoyaay to Baabiraawo, to duuniyaaru ɗum ivi.
Duuniyaaru e giɗaaɗi kalluɗi gonɗi nder ma'aru fuu no ngutoto, ammaa baɗoowo ko Allah yiɗi no tabbitey faa abadaa.
Ɓikkon am, timmoode ɓadake. On nanii *ganyo Almasiifu no warey. Too, jo'oni wanywanyɓe Almasiifu ɗuuɗɓe ngari. Kanjum anndinta en timmoode ɓadake.

Wanywanyɓe *Almasiifu ɓeen, nder meeɗen ɓe ivi, ndeen maa ɓe laataakino ɓe meeɗen e goonga. Gam kul ɓe laatino ɓe meeɗen e goonga, daa ɓe njooɗodotono e meeɗen, ammaa burtaaki maɓɓe hollii ɓe laataaki ɓe meeɗen.
Onon boo, Almasiifu hokkii on *Ruhu Ceniiɗo, kanjum waɗi on fuu annduɗon goonga.
Wanaa gam on anndaa goonga mbinndanmi on, ammaa gam eɗon anndi ka. Kadimaa eɗon anndi fewre fuu ivataa nder goonga.
Kadi, moye woni pevoowo? Oon caliiɗo Yeesu woni Almasiifu, kanko woni pevoowo. Caliiɗo Allah *Baabiraawo e *Ɓiɗɗo boo, kam woni ganyo-Almasiifu.
Koo moye salii Ɓiɗɗo waldaa e Baabiraawo, ammaa caaydinɗo Ɓiɗɗo e wondi e Baabiraawo.
Ti'inee jogaago ko nanɗon ila arande nder ɓerɗe mooɗon. To bolle ɗe nanɗon ila arande e njooɗii nder ɓerɗe mooɗon, ndeen onon boo, on njooɗoto nder kawtal e Ɓiɗɗo e Baabiraawo fuu.
Raa *alkawal ngal Almasiifu waɗani en, waato yonki ɗum faa abadaa.
Ɗuum ko mbinndanmi on, mi vinndii ɗum dow majjinooɓe on.

Onon boo, Ruhu Ceniiɗo mo Almasiifu hokki on, e jooɗii nder mooɗon. Gam ma'ajum on ndaarataa ekkitinoowo feere, gam Ruhu ma'ako e ekkitina on koo ɗume. Ko o ekkitinta on boo, no goonga, naa no fewre. Sey njooɗooɗon nder kawtal e Almasiifu, noon no Ruhu ma'ako ekkitiniri on.
Jo'oni ɓikkon am, njooɗee nder kawtal e *Almasiifu, ndeen en kulataa nyannde nde o vanngata, en cemtataa boo nyannde bittoyki ma'ako.
To on anndi Almasiifu no goongaajo, anndee boo kuwoowo goonga fuu laatake ɓiɗɗo Allah.
Ndaaree manngu yiɗde nde *Baabiraawo yiɗi en, faa en noddaama ɓiɓɓe Allah. Noon boo laatiiɗen. Ndu'u duuniyaaru anndaa en, gam ndu anndaa Baabiraawo.
Yiɗaaɓe am, jo'oni en laatii ɓiɓɓe Allah. Ko laatoytooɗen vannginaaka tawo. Ammaa eɗen anndi to *Almasiifu vanngii, en nanndey e ma'ako, gam en ngi'ey mo, noon no o va'i.
Desɗo tammunde muuɗum to ma'ako fuu, sey laaɓna ɓernde muuɗum noon no Almasiifu laaɓri.
Baɗɗo hakke fuu, voofii *Dooka Allah, gam waɗgo hakke woni voofgo Dooka Allah.
Eɗon anndi Almasiifu vanngii faa itta hakkeeji meeɗen, gam kanko, hakke meemaay mo sam.
Jooɗiiɗo nder Almasiifu fuu tokkataa waɗgo hakke. Baɗoowo hakke yi'ataa mo, anndataa mo boo.
Ɓikkon am, ti'inee to' goɗɗo estu on ! Goongaajo woni kuwoowo goonga, kama no Almasiifu laatorii goongaajo.
Baɗoowo hakke fuu no ɓii *Ceyɗaan, gam Ceyɗaan e waɗa hakke ila fuɗɗam. Kanjum waɗi *Ɓiɗɗo Allah wari, gam halkugo kuuɗe Ceyɗaan.
Laatiiɗo ɓii Allah fuu yahataa yeeso e waɗgo hakke, gam Ruhu mo Allah waɗi nder ɓernde ma'ako oon e jooɗii nder ma'ako. O waawataa o tokka waɗgo hakke, gam emo laatii ɓii Allah.
Mo huwataa goonga, e mo yiɗaa banndum fuu laataaki ɓiɓɓe Allah, kanjum senndindirta ɓiɓɓe Allah e ɓiɓɓe Ceyɗaan.
Habaru ɗum nanɗon ila fuɗɗam woni ngiɗngiɗtiren.
To' en laato kama Kaayinu tokkuɗo *Ceyɗaan, faa o wari minyiiko. Gam ɗume o wari mo? Kaayinu warii mo gam kuuɗe muuɗum no kalluɗe, ammaa kuuɗe minyiiko no goongaaje.
Banndiraaɓe am, to duuniyaaru wanyii on, to' ɗum haayno on.
Enen kam, yiɗde nde ngiɗɗen banndiraaɓe meeɗen e holla daahir en kuultii maayde, en nattii nder yonki. Mo yiɗaa banndum fuu e nder baawɗe maayde tawo.
Ganyɗo banndum fuu waɗii war-hoore. Eɗon anndi baɗoowo war-hoore walaa yonki ɗum faa abadaa.
Raa no anndirɗen ko woni yiɗde: *Almasiifu hokkii yonki muuɗum gam meeɗen. Gam ma'ajum enen boo, e haani kokken yonkiiji meeɗen gam banndiraaɓe meeɗen.
To goɗɗo diskuɗo yi'ii banndum e nder ciya, ammaa hokkoraay mo, noye o vi'irata yiɗde Allah e nder ma'ako?
Ɓikkon am, to' yiɗde meeɗen laato nde konnduɗe tan, ammaa ngiɗremma yiɗde goongaare vanngeynde nder kuuɗe booɗɗe.
Yiɗaaɓe am, kul ɓerɗe meeɗen peldaay en hakke, en kulataa daraago yeeso Allah.
En keɓey ko toriiɗen mo fuu, gam en tokkii dookaaji ma'ako, eɗen kuwa ko veli mo.
Dooka ma'ako woni goonɗingo Ɓiyiiko Yeesu Almasiifu, e yiɗyiɗtirgo noon no o vi'i en.
Tokkuɗo dookaaji Allah e jooɗii nder Allah, Allah boo e jooɗii nder ma'ako. *Ruhu Ceniiɗo mo o hokki en, kam hollata en Allah e jooɗii nder meeɗen.

Yiɗaaɓe am, to' on ngoonɗin koo moye biiɗo e woodi *Ruhu Allah, ammaa ngodee mo, kul ɗum goonga Ruhu Allah e nder ma'ako, koo walaa nder ma'ako. Gam annabo'en fevooɓe ɗuuɗɓe cankitake nder duuniyaaru.
Biiɗo Yeesu *Almasiifu warii laatake neɗɗo, oon kanyum woodi Ruhu Allah.
Ammaa mo saaydiniraay Yeesu noon fuu, Ruhu Allah walaa nder muuɗum. Ruhu gonɗo nder ma'ako ivoyii gada ganyo Almasiifu. On nanii habaru garol ganyo-Almasiifu. Jo'oni emo nder duuniyaaru.
Ɓikkon am, onon on yimɓe Allah, on njaalake fevooɓe ɓeen, gam Ruhu gonɗo nder mooɗon ɓuri ruhu gonɗo nder duuniyaaru semmbee.
Fevooɓe ɓeen, ɗum ɓe duuniyaaru. Haala maɓɓe ɗum ka duuniyaaru, gam ma'ajum, duuniyaaru e yewanoo ɓe.
Enen en yimɓe Allah, annduɗo Allah fuu no yewanto en. Mo laataaki neɗɗo Allah boo yewantaako en. Kama noon cenndindirten Ruhu goonga e ruhu fewre.
Yiɗaaɓe am, ngiɗngiɗtiremma gam yiɗde to Allah ivoyi. Goonɗo yiɗde e laatii ɓiɗɗo Allah, e anndi Allah boo.
Mo walaa yiɗde anndaa Allah, gam Allah e hoore muuɗum o yiɗde.
Raa no Allah holliri en yiɗde muuɗum: o liloyii Ɓiyiiko Bajjo nder duuniyaaru, gam keɓren yonki gada e ma'ako.
Raa no yiɗde Allah va'i: naa enen ngiɗi Allah, ammaa kanko yiɗi en. Nder yiɗde ma'ako o liloyii Ɓiyiiko faa hokka yonki muuɗum sadaka gam hakkeeji meeɗen nja'afee.
Yiɗaaɓe am, to noon Allah yiɗiri en, e haani enen boo ngiɗngiɗtiren kama noon.
Walaa meeɗɗo yi'igo Allah sam. To en ngiɗngiɗtirii, Allah no jooɗoto nder meeɗen, faa yiɗde ma'ako heeva nder meeɗen.
Allah hokkii en Ruhu muuɗum. Noon anndirɗen en njooɗii nder ma'ako, kanko boo emo jooɗii nder meeɗen.
Min ngi'i *Baabiraawo liloyii Ɓiyum gam o hisna duuniyaaru, emin caaydina ɗum boo.
Caaydiiɗo Yeesu woni *Ɓiɗɗo Allah fuu, Allah no jooɗoto nder ma'ako, kanko boo emo jooɗii nder Allah.
Enen, en anndi yiɗde nde Allah yiɗi en, en ngoonɗinii nde. Allah o yiɗde. Jooɗiiɗo nder yiɗde fuu, nder Allah o jooɗii, Allah boo e jooɗii nder ma'ako.
To yiɗde Allah heevii nder ɓerɗe meeɗen, en kulataa *nyannde-darngal. Gam kama no *Almasiifu jooɗorii nder duuniyaaru, noon enen boo njooɗoriiɗen nder ma'aru.
Kulol walaa nder yiɗde, gam yiɗde goongaare no laggey kulol. Kulol e hawti e ceri'a, kulɗo boo, yiɗde Allah heevaay nder muuɗum.
Enen, en ngoodi yiɗde, gam Allah aarti yiɗgo en.
To goɗɗo vi'ii e yiɗi Allah, ammaa e wanyi banndum, o pevoowo. Gam mo yiɗaay banndum mo yi'ata, waawataa yiɗgo Allah mo meeɗaay yi'igo.
Raa dooka ka keɓɗen to Almasiifu: giɗɗo Allah fuu, sey yiɗa banndum boo.
Koo moye goonɗini Yeesu woni *Almasiifu, o laatake ɓii Allah. Giɗɗo baaba fuu, no yiɗey ɓiyiiko boo.
Raa ko anndinta en en ngiɗi ɓiɓɓe Allah: ngiɗen Allah, tokken dookaaji ma'ako.
Yiɗgo Allah woni tokkugo dookaaji ma'ako. Donngal dookaaji ma'ako boo, teddantaa en,
gam laatiiɗo ɓii Allah fuu, no jaaloto duuniyaaru. Gada e goonɗinki meeɗen njaalortooɗen duuniyaaru.
Moye jaalotoo duuniyaaru? Sey goonɗinɗo Yeesu woni *Ɓiɗɗo Allah.
Yeesu *Almasiifu kam wardi e ndiyam e ƴiiƴam. Wanaa ndiyam tan o wardi, ammaa o wardii e ndiyam e ƴiiƴam fuu. *Ruhu Ceniiɗo boo saaydinii ku'uje ɗeen ɗum goonga, gam Ruhu woni goonga.
Ku'uje tati e caaydina Yeesu woni Almasiifu,
kanje ngoni: Ruhu e ndiyam e ƴiiƴam. Caaydaaku ma'aje boo no go'otum.
En ɗoon njaɓa caaydaaku yimɓe, ammaa caaydaaku Allah e ɓuri semmbee, waato caaydaaku ngu o saaydini dow Ɓiyiiko.
Goonɗinɗo *Ɓiɗɗo Allah fuu heɓii caaydaaku nguun nder ɓernde muuɗum. Mo goonɗinaay Allah boo, laatinii Allah pevoowo, gam o jaɓaay caaydaaku ngu Allah saaydini dow Ɓiyum.
Raa caaydaaku nguun: Allah hokkii en yonki ɗum faa abadaa, yonki ɗuum o hokkirii en ɗum gada e Ɓiyiiko.
Gonduɗo e Ɓiɗɗo Allah fuu e woodi yonki ɗuum. Mo waldaa e ma'ako boo, walaa yonki ɗuum.
Mi vinndanii on ɗum, onon goonɗinɓe *Ɓiɗɗo Allah, gam tabbitinon on ngoodi yonki ɗum faa abadaa.
En tabbitinii o naney ko toriiɗen mo fuu, ko foti deydey e no o yiɗi.
Nde laatii emo nana do'aaje meeɗen, en tabbitinii en keɓey ko toriiɗen mo fuu.

To neɗɗo yi'ii banndum e waɗa hakke ɗum yaharataa mo e maayde, sey o toranoo mo Allah, Allah boo no hokkey mo yonki. E woodi hakke jahareyɗum e maayde. Mi vi'aay torooɗon Allah gam baɗoowo iri hakke ɗuum.
Kuuɗe kalluɗe fuu no hakke, ammaa wanaa hakke fuu yaharata neɗɗo e maayde.
Eɗen anndi laatiiɓe ɓiɓɓe Allah fuu tokkataa waɗgo hakke. Ɓiɗɗo Allah e reeni ɓe, gam to' *Ceyɗaan heɓ baawɗe dow maɓɓe.
Eɗen anndi en yimɓe Allah, koo nde laatii yimɓe duuniyaaru e nder junngo Ceyɗaan.

Eɗen anndi boo, Ɓiɗɗo Allah warii hokkii en fahamu anndugo Allah goongaajo. Jo'oni en laatii hawtuɓe e Goongaajo oon gada e Ɓiyiiko Yeesu *Almasiifu. Kanko woni Allah goongaajo, kanko woni yonki ɗum faa abadaa.
Ɓikkon am, ngoɗɗee gumkiiji !
Miin ndottiijo *ikiliisiya vinndi ngo'ol ɗereewol yahago to Inna wuro cuɓaaɗo Allah, e ɓiɓɓe muuɗum ɓe ngiɗmi e yiɗde goongaare. Wanaa miin tan yiɗi on, ammaa annduɓe goonga fuu e ngiɗi on,
ko waɗi wanaa miin tan yiɗi on, gam goonga e jooɗii nder ɓerɗe meeɗen, ka jooɗodoto e meeɗen boo faa abadaa.
Barkaa e yurmeende e jam ivoyɗum to Allah *Baabiraawo e Ɓiyum Yeesu *Almasiifu laatano en, faa njooɗooɗen nder goonga e yiɗde.
Mi nanii belɗum korey nde tawmi e woodi ɓiɓɓe maaɗa tokkuɓe goonga noon no *Baabiraawo vi'i mbaɗen.
Jo'oni, Inna wuro giɗaaɗo, emi toro maa ngiɗngiɗtiree. Ko mbinndanmaami wanaa ɗum dooka kesa, ɗum dooka ka ngoonnooɗen ila arande.
Yiɗde goongaare woni tokkugo dookaaji Allah. Kanka woni dooka ka nanɗon ila arande, waato njooɗooɗon nder yiɗde.
Majjinooɓe yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe cankitake nder duuniyaaru. Ɓe calake saaydingo Yeesu *Almasiifu warii laatake neɗɗo. Ekkitinirɗo noon fuu o majjinoowo, o ganyo Almasiifu.
Ndeenee ko'e mooɗon gam to' on majjin nafuuda kuugal meeɗen, faa keɓon biya mooɗon fuu.
Mo jooɗaaki nder ekkitinol Almasiifu, ammaa ɓesdi goɗɗum dow ma'agol, waldaa e Allah. Jooɗiiɗo nder ekkitinol ngool fuu e wondi e Baabiraawo e *Ɓiɗɗo boo.
To goɗɗo warii e wa'ajina on ekkitinol feere, to' on njaɓɓo mo nder gure mooɗon, to' on kinnu mo boo.
Gam kinnuɗo mo fuu, hawtii e ma'ako nder kuugal ma'ako kallungal.
Emi woodi ko ngiɗmi vi'igo on ɗuuɗɗum, ammaa mi yiɗaa vinndango on ɗum e ɗereewol. Emi yiɗi wargo to mooɗon, mboliden honnduko e honnduko, gam velvelo meeɗen heeva.
Ɓiɓɓe bannda debbo mo Allah suɓi e kinnu maa.
Miin ndottiijo *ikiliisiya vinndi ɗereewol ngo'ol yahago to higoo am Gaayus, mo ngiɗmi e goonga.
Giɗaaɗo am, emi waɗa do'aare gam maaɗa, faa tawee a jooɗii jam nder koo ɗume fuu, waato a jamo nder ruhu e ɓanndu.
Nde woɓɓe banndiraaɓe ngari, ngeccii yam no tokkirɗaa goonga, e no kuutinirɗaa ka, ɗum velii yam korey.
Nango ɓikkon am e tokki goonga, kam ɓuri velgo yam.
Giɗaaɗo am Gaayus, kuuɗe booɗɗe ɗe kuwanɗaa banndiraaɓe goonɗinɓe, ɓe annduɗaa e ɓe a anndaa fuu, eɗe kolla a koolniiɗo.
Yimɓe ɓeen ngarii nder *ikiliisiya, ɓe ngeccake yiɗde nde kolluɗaa ɓe. Yah yeeso e vallugo iri yimɓe ɓeen nder jahaale maɓɓe, fodde ko velata Allah.
Gam nde ɓe mbaɗata jahaangal maɓɓe dow wa'ajingo innde *Almasiifu, ɓe ndaaraay ballal e yimɓe ɓe ngoonɗinaay.
Gam ma'ajum enen goonɗinɓe e haani njaɓɓooɗen iri yimɓe ɓeen, gam laatooɗen huudooɓe e maɓɓe nder anndingo goonga Allah.
Mi vinndanii *ikiliisiya ngonka to maaɗa ɗereewol, ammaa Diyooterefes jaɓaay bolle am sam, gam emo yiɗi laataago aardiiɗo dow mooɗon.

Gam ma'ajum, to mi warii mi vannginey ko o waɗata, waato peve e bolle kalluɗe ɗe o volvi dow amin. Naa kanjum tan o waɗata: o jaɓɓataako banndiraaɓe hoɗɓe, kadimaa yiɗɓe jaɓɓaago ɓe maa, emo haɗa ɗum'en, o vurtina ɗum'en nder ikiliisiya.
Giɗaaɗo am Gaayus, ta'a yemmin waɗgo halleende, ammaa huu ko vooɗi. Baɗoowo ko vooɗi fuu, no neɗɗo Allah, ammaa baɗoowo ko halli anndaa Allah.
Demeetiriyus hollii o neɗɗo goongaajo, goonga boo e saaydina mo. Yimɓe fuu e caaydina ko vooɗi dow ma'ako. Minon boo, emin caaydanoo mo, eɗa anndi boo caaydaaku amin no goonga.
Ko ngiɗmi vi'igo ma e ɗuuɗi, ammaa mi yiɗaa vinndugo ɗum dow ɗereewol.
Emi yiɗi yi'igo ma ko ɓadii, gam mboliden honnduko e honnduko, to ɗum heɓake.
Jam wondu e maaɗa. Yiɗaaɓe maaɗa wonɓe ɗo'o e kinnu maa. Hinnu higooɓe amin wonɓe ɗoon fuu, go'oto-go'oto maɓɓe.
Ngo'ol ɗereewol ivii to am, miin Yahuuda maccuɗo Yeesu *Almasiifu, mi minyiraawo Yaakuubu. Emi hinna on, onon noddaaɓe Allah, ɓe Allah *Baabiraawo meeɗen yiɗi, ɓe Yeesu Almasiifu reeni.
Allah ɗuɗɗinan on yurmeende muuɗum e jam muuɗum e yiɗde muuɗum !

Banndiraaɓe am yiɗaaɓe, emi yiɗnoo vinndango on korey dow kisndam kawtuɗam en, en fuu. Jo'oni mi yi'ii ɗum doole mi vinndana on, gam mi semmbiɗina ɓerɗe mooɗon faa kaɓanon haɓre goonɗinki nde Allah halfini seniiɓe muuɗum nde wo'ore heƴeynde yimɓe jaamanuuji fuu.

Gam halluɓe nattii nder kawtal mooɗon e suuɗeefi. Eɓe ngilloo wuurgo barkaa Allah, gam ɓe keɓa laawol waɗgo halleende, ɓe calake Yeesu Almasiifu laamiiɗo meeɗen e Jawmiraawo meeɗen. Halkere halluɓe ɓeen vinndaama nder *Deftere Seniinde ila ko neeɓi.
Jo'oni, emi yiɗi hiimtingo on ko annduɗon: koo nde Jawmiraawo hisnunoo yimɓe *Isiraa'iila nder lesdi *Misira, ɓaawo ɗoon o halkii woɓɓe maɓɓe, gam ɓe ngoonɗinaay mo.

Kiimtee boo woɓɓe nder malaa'ika'en huultuɓe keerol baawɗe ɗe Allah hokki ɗum'en, ɓe ngoorii jo'onde maɓɓe. Gam ma'ajum Jawmiraawo haɓɓiri ɓe geƴƴelle ɗe faa abada, o omndi ɓe nder niɓre, faa yahago *nyannde-darngal nde o sernanta ɓe.

Kiimtee yimɓe Sodoma e Gomora e ci'e piliiɗe ɗum'en. Kamɓe boo, ɓe mbaɗii kama no malaa'ika'en ɓeen mbaɗi, ɓe tokkii suunooji ɓalli maɓɓe, ɓe mbaɗii koo iri nguye njeenu. Ɓe kalkiraama yiite tabbitnge, gam faa ɓe laatoo misaalu halketeeɓe e yiite nge faa abadaa.
Noon boo, ekkitinooɓe fevooɓe ɓeen e ngoodi koyɗi jahareyɗi ɓe e nyiddingo ɓalli maɓɓe, eɓe njavoo baawɗe mawɓe fuu, eɓe kuɗa mawɓe asama.
Koo Miikaa'iilu mawɗo malaa'ika'en oon, huɗraay *Ceyɗaan noon, nde ɓe ngeddotirnoo dow ɓanndu *Muusa ɓaawo maayde ma'ako. O feldaay mo haalaaji naawɗi. Ko o vi'i mo woni: « Jawmiraawo sernane. »
Ammaa yimɓe ɓeen e kuɗa ku'uje ɗe ɓe anndaa. Anndal ngal ɓe ngoodi iri ngal diiwe ladde, kam halkata ɓe.
Kayco maɓɓe ! Ɓe tokkii laawol Kaayinu barɗo minyum. Ɓe mbaɗii ko'e maɓɓe e fewre gam heɓgo ceede, kama no Balaama waɗno. Ɓe kalkey kama no Koora turtanɗo Muusa halkiri.

Gonki yimɓe ɓeen nder mooɗon e nyiddina kawtal yiɗde mooɗon wakkaci nyaamdoton. Kamɓe ɓe nyaamtarɓe, yiɗanɓe ko'e mu''en tan. Ɓe nanndii e duule ɗe ngalaa ndiyam ɗe henndu laggata, ɓe nanndii e leɗɗe ɗe ndimataa koo wakkaci dimgol ma'aje, ɗoofaaɗe, baatɗe fu-fuu.
Eɓe cankita kuuɗe maɓɓe cemtiniiɗe kama no ɓoggi ndiyam maayo meccirta guufɗe e powle ma'ago. Ɓe nanndii e koode jiilotooɗe. Allah resanii ɓe niɓre ɓurnde niɓɓugo, nde ɓe mburtataako ɗum faa abadaa.
Enok laatiiɗo nder jaamaniiru joveeɗiɗaɓru nder danygol Aadamu waɗii annabaaku maɓɓe ila ko neeɓi, o vi'i: « Raa Jawmiraawo ɗoon warda e malaa'ika'en muuɗum seniiɓe dubuuje dubuuje
gam o sernana yimɓe duuniyaaru fuu, o halka halluɓe gam kuuɗe mu''en kalluɗe, e haalaaji kalluɗi ɗi ɓe mbolvi dow ma'ako. »
Yimɓe ɓeen ɓe nyaamtotooɓe, voytirooɓe woɓɓe, eɓe tokki suunooji maɓɓe kalluɗi, eɓe mantoroo ko'e maɓɓe, eɓe mana woɓɓe boo gam ɓe keɓa ko ɓe ngiɗi.
Ammaa onon banndiraaɓe am yiɗaaɓe, kiimtee haalaaji ɗi lilaaɓe Jawmiraawo meeɗen Yeesu *Almasiifu mbi'inoo on.
Ɓe mbi'i: « Nder wakkaci cakitotooɗum yimɓe tokkuɓe giɗaaɗi mu''en kalluɗi no ngarey, njaltinira on. »
Kamɓe ngoni senndooɓe yimɓe, eɓe tokki nyumooji duuniyaaru tan, ɓe ngalaa *Ruhu Allah.
Ammaa onon banndiraaɓe am yiɗaaɓe, cemmbiɗee nder goonɗinki mooɗon ceniiki, toree Allah nder baawɗe *Ruhu Ceniiɗo.
Tabbitee nder yiɗde Allah, mbaɗee tammunde mooɗon dow Jawmiraawo meeɗen Yeesu Almasiifu. Nder yurmeende ma'ako o hokkey on yonki ɗum faa abadaa.
Njurminanee waɗooɓe cekkaa,
mburtinee woɓɓe nder yiite, kisnee ɓe. Njurminanee woɓɓe boo, ammaa kakkilee gam to' on ndaaɓo hakke maɓɓe.
Allah e waawi reengo on gada e fergere, faa o yottina on nder teddungal ma'ako, on ngalaa feloore on keevi velvelo.
Kanko woni Allah go'oto kisnirɗo en gada e Yeesu *Almasiifu Jawmiraawo meeɗen. Teddungal e manngu e laamu e baawɗe laatanoo mo, ila ndeenno e jo'oni e faa abadaa abadin. Aamiin !
Nde'e Deftere e saawi wahayu ɗum Allah holli Yeesu Almasiifu, gam holla maccuɓe muuɗum ko ɓadii wargo. Yeesu lilii malaa'ikaajo muuɗum to maccuɗo muuɗum Yahayya, gam o yeccoo mo fii ɗuum.
Yahayya boo saaydake koo ɗume ko yi'i ɗum voliinde Allah, e goongaaji ɗi Yeesu holli mo.
Barkaa no laatanto janngeyɗo nde'e deftere annabaaku. Barkaa no laatanto nanɓe ko vinndaa nder nde'e deftere tokki ɗum. Gam wakkaci fii ɗuum vanngata ɓadake.
Miin Yahayya, emi vinndana goonɗinɓe wonɓe ci'e joveeɗiɗi gonɗe nder lesdi Aasiya. Allah gonɗo ndeenno e jo'oni e ɗo'o yeeso, e ruhuuji joveeɗiɗi gonɗi yeeso jooɗorgal laamu ma'ako,

e Yeesu *Almasiifu caayduujo koolaaɗo mbarkiɗina on, kokka on jam. Yeesu o arano e ummitaago nder maayɓe, o laamiiɗo laamiiɓe duuniyaaru. Kanko yiɗi en, o rimɗini en e hakkeeji meeɗen gada e ƴiiƴam ma'ako.
O laatinii en yimɓe ma'ako e *aardiiɓe diina huwanooɓe Allah Baaba ma'ako. Teddungal e baawɗe laatanoo mo faa abadaa. Aamiin.
« Rah, emo wara nder duule, koo moye no yi'ey mo, faa maa e warɓe mo. Yimɓe duuniyaaru fuu no mboyey gam bittoyki ma'ako ! » Goonga, ɗum waɗey. Aamiin.
Allah Jawmu baawɗe vi'i: « Miin woni Alfaa e Omeega, waato fuɗɗoode e timmoode. » « Miin woni ndeenno e jo'oni e ɗo'o yeeso. »
