Miin Yahayya banndii on, kawtuɗo e mooɗon torraaji e laamu Yeesu *Almasiifu, munyduɗo e mooɗon munyal ma'ako, mi yaharaama lesdi ngonndi caka ndiyam, mbi'eteendi Patamos. Mi yaharaama toon gam mi wa'ajinii voliinde Allah, mi hokkii habaru Yeesu.
Nyannde alat, *Ruhu Allah jippoyii dow am, ɓaawo am nanmi woɗnde voliinde semmbiɗnde, kama duudaango luwal.
Voliinde ndeen e vi'a: — Ko ngiiɗaa, vinndu ɗum nder deftere, lildaa nde *ikiliisiyaaji gonɗi nder ci'e joveeɗiɗi, waato Efesu e Samirna e Pergame e Tiyaatira e Sardis e Filadelfiya e Lawdikiya.
Sey ngaylitiimi gam mi yi'a bolvaneyɗo yam. E gaylitaaki am, sey ngi'imi fitilaaji joveeɗiɗi ɗi jiinaariya.
Caka fitilaaji ɗiin, ngi'imi goɗɗo kama *Ɓii-Neɗɗo e ɓornii kolte juutɗe faa e teppe, emo taadii taadorde jiinaariya e wabaare ma'ako.
Hoore ma'ako e gaasa ma'ako e ranni tar kama hottollo, tar kama nyaalal, gite ma'ako boo kama ɗemngal yiite.
Kosɗe ma'ako e ɗelkitoo kama njamndi mboɗeeri ngoggaandi, ndi ɗum defi nder yiite vayildu, voliinde ma'ako kama iido nyaardu ndiyam ɗuuɗɗam.
Emo jogii koode joveeɗiɗi e junngo ma'ako nyaamo, kaafahi belki ki mbeldiiji ɗiɗi e vurtoyoo nder honnduko ma'ako. Yeeso ma'ako e ranni tar kama naange caka nyalawma.
Nde ngi'imoomi, sey ndo''iimi yeeso ma'ako kama maayɗo. Ammaa o yowani yam junngo ma'ako nyaamo. O vi'i: — Ta'a hul. Miin woni arano, miin woni cakitiiɗo,
miin woni mo yonki ! Ndeenno mi maayii, ammaa jo'oni emi woodi yonki ɗum faa abadaa abadin, emi woodi baawɗe dow maayde e Laahira.
Gam ma'ajum, vinndu ko ngiiɗaa, ko waɗata jo'oni, e ko waɗata ɗo'o yeeso.

Ammaa jo'oni, raa ma'ana sirri koode joveeɗiɗi ɗe ngiiɗaa nder junngo am nyaamo, e fitilaaji jiinaariya joveeɗiɗi ɗi ngiiɗaa: koode joveeɗiɗi ɗeen ngoni malaa'ika'en ikiliisiyaaji gonɗi ci'e joveeɗiɗi, fitilaaji joveeɗiɗi boo ɗum ikiliisiyaaji joveeɗiɗi.
— Vinndan malaa'ikaajo *ikiliisiya ngonka si'ire Efesu vi'igo: Raa lilal gada to jogiiɗo koode joveeɗiɗi e junngo muuɗum nyaamo, jahoowo caka fitilaaji jiinaariya joveeɗiɗi:
« Emi anndi kuuɗe maaɗa e ti'inaare maaɗa e munyal maaɗa nder torraaji. Emi anndi a munyantaa halluɓe. Kadimaa a godake vi'ooɓe ko'e mu''en no *lilaaɓe, ammaa ɓe laataaki lilaaɓe, a tawii ɓe fevooɓe.
« Emi anndi a woodi munyal, a nattii torraaji kalluɗi gam am, e noon fuu a somaay.
Ammaa raa ko peldeymaami: a woorii yiɗde maaɗa nde ngoonnoɗaa aran.
Hiimta gada toye ndo''iɗaa. Tuub, waɗ ko mbaɗeynoɗaa ndeenno. To naa noon, mi warey, mi itta fitila maaɗa to ka resino, to nii a tuubaay.
Ammaa a woodi fii booɗɗum go'otum ɗum mbaɗataa, a wanyii kuuɗe Nikola'en, noon no nganyrumi ɗe.
« Mo nofru nanooru fuu, sey nana ko *Ruhu Allah vi'ata ikiliisiyaaji. Jaaliiɗo fuu, mi woorey ɗum nyaama ɓikkon lekki yonki gonki nder aljanna. »
— Vinndan malaa'ikaajo *ikiliisiya ngonka si'ire Samirna vi'igo: Raa ko arano e cakitiiɗo, maaynooɗo ummitii, vi'i:
« Emi anndi torraa maaɗa e cooyndam maaɗa, ammaa e noon fuu a diskuɗo. Emi anndi haala kalluka ka yimɓe mbolvata dow maaɗa. Yimɓe ɓeen e mbi'a no *Yahuudu'en, ammaa naa ɗum noon, ɓe yimɓe *Ceyɗaan.

Ta'a hul torraa ka njarataa ɗo'o yeeso. Rah, Ibiliisa siryake waɗgo woɓɓe mooɗon nder kaso, gam ɗum jarraboo on, on mbaɗey balɗe sappo on njara torraa kalluka. Ammaa koo to ɗum warey on, njogee ko kooliiɗon. Miin boo mi hokkete yonki, ki laatanomaa giifol jaalorgal.
« Mo nofru nanooru fuu, sey nana ko *Ruhu Allah vi'ata ikiliisiyaaji. Jaaliiɗo fuu, maayde ɗiɗaɓre meemataa ɗum. »
— Vinndan malaa'ikaajo *ikiliisiya ngonka si'ire Pergame, vi'igo: Raa ko jogiiɗo kaafahi ki mbeldiiji ɗiɗi vi'i:

« Emi anndi to njooɗiɗaa, eɗa jooɗii to *Ceyɗaan laamoto. E noon fuu, eɗa jogii innde am, a wooraay goonɗingo yam, koo wakkaci ɗum Antipas caayduujo am koolaaɗo waraa nder maaɗa, yaayre to Ceyɗaan jooɗii.

« Ammaa e woodi fii seɗɗa ɗum peldeymaami. Nder maaɗa e woodi woɓɓe tokkuɓe ekkitinol Balaama. Kanko ekkitini Balak no ferginirta *Isiraa'iila'en, ɓe nyaama ko hirsanaa gumkiiji fewre, ɓe mbaɗa njeenu.
Noon boo a woodi woɓɓe tokkuɓe ekkitinol Nikola'en.
Jo'oni tuub ! To naa noon, mi warey to maaɗa naa ko neeɓi, mi warda ɓe e kaafahi burtoytooki honnduko am.

« Mo nofru nanooru fuu, sey nana ko *Ruhu Allah vi'ata ikiliisiyaaji. Jaaliiɗo fuu, mi hokkey ɗum nyaamdu *manna suuɗiindu. Kadimaa mi hokkey mo haayre raneere nde innde hesre vinndaa dow muuɗum. Walaa annduɗo innde ndeen, sey kokkaaɗo haayre ndeen. »
— Vinndan malaa'ikaajo *ikiliisiya ngonka si'ire Tiyaatira, vi'igo: Raa ko *Ɓiɗɗo Allah mo gite muuɗum njalbirta kama ɗemngal yiite, mo kosɗe muuɗum njalbirta kama njamndi mboɗeeri ngoggaandi, vi'i:
« Emi anndi kuuɗe maaɗa, e yiɗde maaɗa, e hoolnaare maaɗa, e ti'inaare maaɗa, e ballal ngal mbaɗantaa woɓɓe. Emi anndi kuuɗe maaɗa ɗe jo'oni ɓurii ɗe ndeenno.
« Ammaa raa ko peldeymaami: eɗa munyana Jejabel, debbo bi'eyɗo hoore muuɗum no *annabiijo. Emo majjina maccuɓe am, emo ekkitina ɓe waɗgo njeenu e nyaamgo teewu cakkanaangu gumkiiji.
Mi hokkii mo wakkaci gam o tuuba e njeenu ngu o waɗata, ammaa o salake tuubgo.
Gam ma'ajum mi nyawney mo nyawu kallungu. Ɓe o wa'adata njeenu boo, to ngooraay waɗgo iri kuuɗe ɗeen, mi torrey ɓe torraa kalluka.
Mi warey tokkuɓe mo. Ndeen ikiliisiyaaji fuu no anndey miin woni annduɗo nyumooji yimɓe, e etoowo ko woni nder ɓerɗe maɓɓe. Mi biyoto koo moye mooɗon deydey e kuugal muuɗum.
« Ammaa onon goonɗinɓe horiiɓe ɓe si'ire Tiyaatira, ɓe tokkaay ekkitinol ngool, ɓe tokkaay ko woɓɓe mbi'ata: sirri Ceyɗaan lugguɗum, emi vi'a on: mi yowantaa on goɗngal donngal.
Njogee ko ngoonɗon booɗɗum, faa mi vittoya.
Jaaliiɗo, baɗeyɗo ko mbi'imi faa yahago timmoode, mi hokkey mo laamu dow leƴƴi duuniyaaru.
O laamoranto ɓe e sawru njamndi, o fusa ɓe kama gaheeje loɓokke.
Kadimaa mi hokkey mo hoodere fajiri.
Mo nofru nanooru fuu, sey nana ko *Ruhu Allah vi'ata ikiliisiyaaji. »

— Vinndan malaa'ikaajo *ikiliisiya ngonka si'ire Sardis, vi'igo: Raa ko jogiiɗo ruhuuji Allah joveeɗiɗi e koode joveeɗiɗi vi'ata: « Emi anndi kuugal maaɗa, eɗum yi'a kama a woodi yonki, ammaa a maayɗo.
Umma daraa ! Vo'in ko horani maa, sabu ɗum ɓadake waatgo, gam mi yi'ii kuuɗe maaɗa keevaay yeeso Allah am.
Gam ma'ajum, hiimta ko nanɗaa e ko ekkitineɗaa, tokku ɗum, tuub gada e hakkeeji maaɗa. Kul a ummaaki, mi vittoyey nder wakkaci ɗum a tammaaki kama gujjo. Kadimaa a anndataa wakkaci ɗum ngaraneymaami.
Ammaa faa jo'oni e woodi yimɓe maaɗa seɗɗa nder si'ire Sardis, ɓe tuninaay ko'e mu''en e waɗgo hakke. Ɓe ɓornoto kolte daneeeje, ɓe njahada e am, gam ɓe potii waɗgo noon.
« Jaaliiɗo fuu no ɓornoto kolte daneeje, kadimaa mi molmataa innde ma'ako nder Deftere yonki. Mi vi'ey kanko ɗum mo am, yeeso Baaba am e yeeso malaa'ika'en muuɗum.
Mo nofru nanooru fuu, sey nana ko *Ruhu Allah vi'ata ikiliisiyaaji. »

— Vinndan malaa'ikaajo *ikiliisiya ngonka si'ire Filadelfiya vi'igo: Raa lilal gada to oon ceniiɗo, goongaajo, jogiiɗo omtirgel *Dawda. To o omtii dammugal, walaa omndeyɗo ngal, to o omndii ngal, walaa omteyɗo ngal.
« Emi anndi kuuɗe maaɗa. Rah, mi ɗalanii ma dammugal e omtii, walaa baaweyɗo omndugo ngal. Emi anndi a semmbiɗaa, ammaa e noon fuu a tokkii ko mbi'imi, a salaaki vi'igo a goonɗinɗo yam.
Ɓen ɗoon wonɓe nder yimɓe *Ceyɗaan, vi'ooɓe no *Yahuudu'en, ammaa ɓe pevey, mi waɗey ɓe ngara ɓe ndiccoo yeeso maaɗa, ndeen ɓe annda emi yiɗ maa.
Gam a yoofaay munyal ngal mbi'imi mbaɗaa e ɓernde semmbiɗnde, miin boo mi hisnete e torraa ngaraneyka duuniyaaru, gam godaago yimɓe ma'aru fuu.
Emi wara naa ko neeɓi. Joga goonɗinki maaɗa booɗɗum, gam to' goɗɗo te'ete laada jaalorgal maaɗa.

« Jaaliiɗo fuu, mi laatiney ɗum danngaral *Wuro Allah am Seniingo, o fuɗɗitataa vurtaago wuro ngoon. Mi vinndey innde Allah am dow ma'ako e innde si'ire muuɗum *Urusaliima hesre jippoytoonde gada to Allah am. Kadimaa mi vinndey innde am hesre dow ma'ako.
Mo nofru nanooru fuu, sey nana ko *Ruhu Allah vi'ata ikiliisiyaaji. »
— Vinndan malaa'ikaajo *ikiliisiya ngonka si'ire Lawdikiya, vi'igo: Raa lilal gada to oon bi'eteeɗo Aamiin, caayduujo goongaajo, koolaaɗo, mo Allah tagiri koo ɗume gada e muuɗum:
« Emi anndi kuuɗe maaɗa, a feewaa a wulaa. Vi'eeno a laatino peewɗo koo gulɗo !
Ammaa gam a laatii caka-caka, a wulaa a feewaa, mi tuutete.
Eɗa vi'a: Mi diskuɗo, emi woodi jawdi, walaa ko ndullumi. Ammaa a anndaa a tampuɗo, a jurminiiɗo, a cooyɗo, a bumɗo, a suhuraaki.
Gam ma'ajum emi hokku maa caawara: sood jiinaariya laɓɓiniraandi yiite to am, gam ndiskaa, sood kolte daneeje cuhuroɗaa, gam cuddaa semteende maaɗa, sood nebbam molmanaa gite maaɗa, gam keɓaa ngi'a.
Ɓe ngiɗmi peleymi, kamɓe lelteymi. Gam ma'ajum, yawɗa tuub.
Rammi darii e dammugal, emi silminoo. Koo moye nani voliinde am, omti dammugal, mi nattey mi nyaamda e ma'ako, kanko boo o nyaamdey e am.
« Jaaliiɗo fuu no laamodoto e am nder laamu am, noon no keɓrumi jaalorgal laamodiimi e Baaba am nder laamu muuɗum.
Mo nofru nanooru fuu, sey nana ko *Ruhu Allah vi'ata ikiliisiyaaji ! »
Ɓaawo ma'ajum mi raari, sey ngi'imi goɗngal dammugal e omtii toon dow. Voliinde nde nannoomi arande nanndunde e duudaango luwal vi'i: — Ƴeentoy ɗo'o, mi hollu maa ko waɗata ɗo'o yeeso.
Ɗoon e ɗoon *Ruhu Allah jippoyii dow am, sey ngi'imi jooɗorgal laamu toon dow, goɗɗo e jooɗii dow ma'agal.
Jooɗiiɗo oon e ɗelkitoo kama haayre yaspa, emo vo'oji kama haayre sardis. Timotimoongal ɗelkitotoongal kama haayre imiraadi e filii jooɗorgal ngaal.
Ha'ade jooɗorgal ngaal e woodi goɗɗe jooɗorɗe aciriin e nayi (24), eɗe pilii ngal. Woɓɓe ndotti'en aciriin e nayo (24) e njooɗii dow ma'aje, eɓe ɓornii kolte daneeje, eɓe ngiifii giifi jiinaariya.
Maƴƴe e hooloo, palmaali mbaɗi ga vurtoyaago e jooɗorgal ngaal. Kadimaa fitilaaji joveeɗiɗi e kuɓɓi yeeso ma'agal, fitilaaji ɗiin ngoni ruhuuji Allah joveeɗiɗi.

Yeeso jooɗorgal ngaal e woodi goɗɗum nannduɗum e maayo ɗelkitotoongo kama daarorgal. Kadimaa e woodi goɗɗe tagle nayi ɗe yonki, ɗe gite koo toye, ɓaawo e yeeso, eɗe pilii jooɗorgal ngaal koo nduye vuttudu.
Tagaadi arandi e nanndi e mawndu, ɗiɗaɓri e nanndi e ngaari, tataɓri e woodi yeeso kama ngo neɗɗo, nayaɓri e nanndi e dutal piirngal.

Ɗen ɗoon tagle nayi ɗe yonki, koo ndiye e woodi biyeeli joveego'o. Eɗe ngoodi gite e ɓanndu koo toye. Jemma e nyalawma ɗe ngoorataa yimgo, eɗe mbi'a: « Ceniiɗo, ceniiɗo, ceniiɗo, Allah Jawmiraawo Jawmu Baawɗe, kanko woni ndeenno e jo'oni e ɗo'o yeeso ! »
Koo ndeye nde tagle ɗe yonki ngimi gimol maaltugo e teddingo e yettugo oon jooɗiiɗo dow jooɗorgal, mo yonki faa abadaa,
sey ndotti'en aciriin e nayo (24) ɓeen ndiccoo yeeso jooɗiiɗo dow jooɗorgal ngaal, ɓe maalta oon mo yonki faa abadaa, ɓe ndesa giifi maɓɓe yeeso jooɗorgal ngaal, eɓe mbi'a:
« Yaa Jawmiraawo Allah amin, a fotii mawnineego, darajja e teddungal e baawɗe fuu, aan jeyi ɗum, gam aan tagii koo ɗume, e yiɗde maaɗa ɗum tagaa, ɗum jooɗii. »
Vuttudu junngo nyaamo jooɗiiɗo dow jooɗorgal laamu, mi yi'ii woɗnde deftere vinndaande nder e yaasi, nde omndaa nde takkaa takkanɗe joveeɗiɗi.
Ndeen ngi'imi goɗɗo malaa'ikaajo cemmbiɗɗo, o towni voliinde o vi'i: — Moye foti takkitgo takkanɗe nde'e deftere, omta nde?
Ammaa ɗum heɓaay koo go'oto potɗo omtugo deftere ndeen, koo raara nder ma'are, koo toon dow, koo nder duuniyaaru, koo nder maayɓe.
Mi voyii bojji naawɗi, gam ɗum heɓaay potɗo omtugo deftere ndeen, hakko raara nder ma'are.
Sey go'oto nder ndotti'en ɓeen vi'i yam: — Woor voygo. Raa mawndu lenyol Yahuuda asngol Dawda heɓii jaalorgal, o takkitey takkanɗe joveeɗiɗi ɗeen, o omta deftere ndeen.

Ndeen ngi'imi ngoɗndi *Njawdiri e darii ha'ade jooɗorgal ngaal. Tagle nayi ɗe yonki e ndotti'en ɓeen e pilii ndi. *Njawdiri ndiin kama ndi hirsanooma. Endi woodi luwe joveeɗiɗi e gite joveeɗiɗi, kanje ngoni ruhuuji Allah joveeɗiɗi lilaaɗi nder duuniyaaru fuu.
Njawdiri ndiin yahi jaɓi deftere ndeen e junngo nyaamo jooɗiiɗo dow jooɗorgal oon.

Nde ndi jaɓi deftere ndeen, tagle nayi ɗe yonki ɗeen e ndotti'en aciriin e nayo (24) ndiccii yeeso ma'ari. Koo moye maɓɓe e jogii moolooru e tummude jiinaariya heeɓnde urdi mbelndi, kayri woni do'aaje yimɓe Allah.

Ɓe ngimi gimol kesol eɓe mbi'a: « A fotii hooygo Deftere ndeen takkitaa takkanɗe ma'are, gam a waranooma, gada e ƴiiƴam maaɗa coottaniɗaa Allah yimɓe gada e koo ngole lenyol, e koo ngale ɗemngal, e koo ɓeye yimɓe, e koo ndiye lesdi.
A laatinii ɓe laamiiɓe e *aardiiɓe diina, gam ɓe kuwana Allah meeɗen,* ɓe laamanoo duuniyaaru. »
Ɓaawo ɗoon mi raari, mi nanii bolle malaa'ika'en ɗuuɗɓe, ɗuuɗal maɓɓe walaa keerol. Eɓe pilii jooɗorgal ngaal e tagle ɗe yonki e ndotti'en ɓeen.
Malaa'ika'en e ngima e semmbee, e mbi'a: « Njawdiri mbaranoondi ndiin, ndi fotii heɓgo baawɗe, e risku, e hikima, e semmbee, e teddungal, e darajja, e maalteego ! »

Ndeen nanmi koo ɗeye tagle gonɗe toon dow, e gonɗe nder duuniyaaru, e lees lesdi, e nder ndiyam, e ko woni nder ma'ajum fuu e yima e vi'a: « Maaltoore, e darajja, e teddungal, e baawɗe laatanoo Jooɗiiɗo dow jooɗorgal ngaal, kam e Njawdiri faa abadaa ! »
Tagle nayi ɗe yonki ɗeen mbi'i: — Aamiin ! Sey ndotti'en ɓeen ndiccii cujjidani Jawmiraawo.
Ndeen ngi'imi *Njawdiri ndiin takkitii go'o nder takkanɗe joveeɗiɗi ɗeen. Sey nanmi go'o nder tagle nayi ɗe yonki ɗeen noddii e semmbee kama hoolo falmaango, vi'i: — Waroy !
Nde ndaarmi, sey ngi'imi puccu ndaneewu ! Gonɗo dow ma'agu e jogii bakaahi, o hokkaa giifol. O jaaliiɗo, o vurtii gam o ɓesda jaalaago.
Nde Njawdiri ndiin takkiti takkannde ɗiɗaɓre, sey nanmi tagaadi ndi yonki ɗiɗaɓri vi'i: — Waroy !
Sey puccu mboɗeewu coloy vurtoyii. Gonɗo dow ma'agu vi'aa itta jam nder duuniyaaru, gam yimɓe mbarmbartira. O hokkaa kaafahi makki.
Nde Njawdiri ndiin takkiti takkannde tataɓre, sey nanmi tagaadi tataɓri ndi yonki vi'i: — Waroy ! Nde ndaarmi, sey ngi'imi puccu ɓaleewu ! Gonɗo dow ma'agu e jogii etruɗum e junngo.

Sey nanmi goɗɗum kama voliinde e vurtoyoo hakkunde tagle nayi ɗe yonki ɗeen, ende vi'a: — Etergel alkamaari go'otel no soodete ceede kuugal nyanndeere wo'ore. Eterkon gawri taton no coodete ceede kuugal nyanndeere wo'ore. Ammaa ta'a vonnu nebbam jaytunje koo *innaboojam.
Nde Njawdiri ndiin takkiti takkannde nayaɓre, mi nanii ngo'ori nder tagle nayi ɗe yonki vi'i: — Waroy !

Ndeen ngi'imi puccu puru. Innde gonɗo dow ma'agu Maayde, Laahira e tokkiri mo ɓaawo. Ɓe kokkaa baawɗe dow feccere wo'ore nder cende nayi ɗe duuniyaaru, gam ɓe mbarda ɓe kaafaaje e veelo hallungo e nyawuuji e diiwe ladde.
Nde Njawdiri ndiin takkiti takkannde jovaɓre, mi yi'ii yonkiiji ɓe ɗum wari gam ɗowtanaago voliinde Allah e wa'ajingo nde e goonga. Eɗi lees hirsirde.
Ɓe ƴefti voliinde e semmbee, ɓe mbi'i: — Yaa Jawmiraawo Jawmu baawɗe, ceniiɗo, goongaajo, sey ndeye cernanaa duuniyaaru, mba'atanoɗaa min, gam barki ki ɓe mbari min?
Sey koo moye maɓɓe hokkaa koltal daneewal, ɓe mbi'aa ɓe poofta seɗɗa, faa nde ɗum hebbiti wargo goonɗinɓe horiiɓe, higooɓe kuugal maɓɓe, ɓe ɗum wardata noon no ɗum wardi ɓe.
Nde Njawdiri ndiin takkiti takkannde joveego'oore, sey ɗum waɗi dimmbaaki lesdi makki. Naange ɓalwi kurum kama ƴulɓe. Lewru vo'oji coloy kama ƴiiƴam.
Koode boo caamoyi, noon no ɓikkon ƴibbe caamrata to henndu semmbiɗndu dimmbii ɗe.
Dow taggii noon no ɗum taggirta daago. Lesɗe gonɗe caka ndiyam e baamle fuu ɗoofaa to ngoni.
Ndeen laamiiɓe duuniyaaru e aardiiɓe e mawɓe soojeeji e riskuɓe e woonɓe baawɗe e maccuɓe e rimɓe cuuɗii nder luurooji e lees kaaƴe nder baamle.
Ɓe mbi'i baamle e kaaƴe ɗeen: — Njanee dow amin, cuuɗon min e huunƴere jooɗiiɗo dow jooɗorgal laamu, kam e Njawdiri.
Gam nyannde huunƴere maɓɓe hallunde warii. Moye waawata daɗgo?
Ɓaawo ma'ajum ngi'imi malaa'ika'en nayo e ndarii buttulli duuniyaaru nayi. Eɓe paddii keni duuniyaaru nayi, gam to' ɗi mbis dow lesdi, koo dow maayo, koo dow koo kiye lekki.

Sey kadimaa ngi'imi goɗɗo malaa'ikaajo e vurtoyoo gada fu'una, emo jogii ba'aruɗum caayda Allah mo yonki. O towni voliinde, o volvani malaa'ika'en nayo ɓeen, ɓe Allah hokki baawɗe bonnugo duuniyaaru e maayo,
o vi'i: — To' on mbonnu duuniyaaru, koo maayo, koo leɗɗe. Ndeentee tawo faa min mbaɗana maccuɓe Allah meeɗen caayda e tihiɗe mu''en.
Sey nanmi ɗuuɗal waɗanaaɓe caayda ɓeen yaharii yimɓe dubuuje hemre e arba'iin e nayo (144 000). Ɓe fuu nder leƴƴi Isiraa'iila sappo e ɗiɗi ɓe ivi:
lenyol Yahuuda yimɓe dubuuje sappo e ɗiɗo (12 000), lenyol Ruuben yimɓe dubuuje sappo e ɗiɗo (12 000), lenyol Gaad yimɓe dubuuje sappo e ɗiɗo (12 000),
lenyol Aaser yimɓe dubuuje sappo e ɗiɗo (12 000), lenyol Naftalim yimɓe dubuuje sappo e ɗiɗo (12 000), lenyol Manasa yimɓe dubuuje sappo e ɗiɗo (12 000),
lenyol Simiyon yimɓe dubuuje sappo e ɗiɗo (12 000), lenyol Leewi yimɓe dubuuje sappo e ɗiɗo (12 000), lenyol Isaakar yimɓe dubuuje sappo e ɗiɗo (12 000),
lenyol Jaabulon yimɓe dubuuje sappo e ɗiɗo (12 000), lenyol Yusufu yimɓe dubuuje sappo e ɗiɗo (12 000), lenyol Bennyamin yimɓe dubuuje sappo e ɗiɗo (12 000).

Ɓaawo ma'ajum, mi raari, mi yi'ii yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe ɓe limataako. Yimɓe ɓeen ivii gada koo ndiye lesdi, e koo ngole lenyol, e koo ɓeye yimɓe, e koo ngale ɗemngal. Ɓe fuu eɓe ndarii yeeso jooɗorgal laamu, kam e *Njawdiri, eɓe ɓornii kolte daneeje tar, eɓe njogii lison dabiinooje e juuɗe maɓɓe.
Ɓe ilini e semmbee, ɓe mbi'i: — Kisndam ivii to Allah meeɗen jooɗiiɗo dow jooɗorgal laamu e Njawdiri !
Malaa'ika'en fuu e mawɓe e tagle nayi goonɗe yonki e ndarii pilii jooɗorgal laamu ngaal. Ɓe fuu ɓe ndiccii ɓe cujjidani Allah.
Ɓe mbi'i: — Aamiin ! Maaltoore e teddungal e hikima e yettoore e manngu e baawɗe e semmbee laatanoo Allah meeɗen faa abadaa ! Aamiin.
Sey go'oto nder mawɓe ɓeen ƴami yam, vi'i: — Ɓe'e yimɓe ɓorniiɓe kolte daneeje, ɗum ɓeye? Toye ɓe ivi?
Sey mbi'imoomi: — Moodibbo, aan anndi. O vi'i yam: — Kamɓe ngoni ivoyɓe nder torraa kalluka. Ɓe lohonirii kolte maɓɓe ƴiiƴam Njawdiri, ɗe ndanni tar.
Kanjum waɗi ɓe ndarii yeeso jooɗorgal laamu Allah. Eɓe kuwana mo jemma e nyalawma nder Wuro ma'ako. Jooɗiiɗo dow jooɗorgal laamu oon no reeney ɓe.
Ɓe ɓesdataa nango veelo, ɓe ɓesdataa ɗomɗugo. Naange koo gulɗum fuɗɗitataa fiigo ɓe sam.
Gam Njawdiri ngonndi vuttudu jooɗorgal laamu no laatoto gaynaako maɓɓe. Kadimaa ndi yaharey ɓe to ndiyam yonki ɓulata. Allah boo no mooytey gonɗi maɓɓe fuu.
Nde *Njawdiri ndiin takkiti takkannde joveeɗiɗaɓre, sey ko woni nder asama fuu de''iti faro mintiiji talaatiin (30).
Ndeen ngi'imi malaa'ika'en njoveeɗiɗo dariiɓe yeeso Allah kokkaama luwe joveeɗiɗi.

Goɗɗo malaa'ikaajo wari darii yeeso to ɗum wulata urdi mbelndi, emo jogii tummude jiinaariya nde ɗum wulata urdi nder muuɗum. Ɗum hokki mo urdi ɗuuɗndi, gam o hawrita ndi e do'aaje yimɓe Allah, o sakka ndi dow wuldude urdi nde jiinaariya wonnde yeeso jooɗorgal laamu.
Sey cuurga urdi ndiin ummii gada nder tummude nde o jogii, ndi hawriti e do'aaje seniiɓe, ka yahi yeeso Allah.
Malaa'ikaajo oon hooƴi tummude urdi ndeen, o hebbini nde yiite to ɗum wulata urdi mbelndi, o sankiti nge dow duuniyaaru. Ndeen palmaali palmi, hoolooji kooli, maƴƴe maƴƴi, lesdi dimmbii.
Ndeen malaa'ika'en njoveeɗiɗo jogiiɓe luwe joveeɗiɗi ɓeen ciryii duudgo ɗe.

Malaa'ikaajo arano duudi luwal muuɗum, sey malemalleeje e yiite jillindirnge e ƴiiƴam ndufoyaa dow duuniyaaru. Yiite ngeen nyaami feccere wo'ore nder cende tati ɗe duuniyaaru. Nge nyaami feccere wo'ore nder cende tati ɗe leɗɗe duuniyaaru e fuɗngooji.
Nde malaa'ikaajo ɗiɗaɓo duudi luwal muuɗum, sey ɗum feri goɗɗum nder maayo nannduɗum e vaamnde mawnde, e ɗum huɓɓi yiite. Feccere wo'ore nder cende tati ɗe maayo ngoon laatii ƴiiƴam.
Feccere wo'ore nder cende tati ɗe diiwe maayo ngoon mbaati kadimaa feccere wo'ore nder cende tati ɗe akale ndiyam gonɗe ɗoon kalkii.

Nde malaa'ikaajo tataɓo duudi luwal muuɗum, sey woɗnde hoodere yanoyi gada dow, ende nyaama yiite kama moorol ngol ɗum juumtorto, nde yani dow feccere wo'ore nder cende tati ɗe celi maayo e to ndiyam ɓuldoyta.
Innde hoodere ndeen « Kaaɗɗum ». Nde haaɗni feccere wo'ore nder cende tati ɗe ndiyam. Ɗuuɗɓe yarɓe ndiyam ɗaam maayi, gam kaaɗɗum ma'ajam.

Nde malaa'ikaajo nayaɓo duudi luwal muuɗum, sey ɗum fiyi feccere wo'ore nder cende tati ɗe naange e lewru e koode, faa feccere wo'ore nder cende tati ɗe jayngol naange e lewru e koode niɓɓi. Jemma e nyalawma boo majjini feccere wo'ore nder tati nde jayngol mu''en.
Ɓaawo ma'ajum, ngi'imi dutal e fiiri toon dow, sey nanmi e ngal vi'a e semmbee: — On mboni ! On mboni ! On mboni, onon jooɗiiɓe nder duuniyaaru to malaa'ika'en tato horiiɓe nduudii luwe mu''en.
Nde malaa'ikaajo njovaɓo duudi luwal muuɗum, sey ngi'imi hoodere ivoyii dow, nde yani nder duuniyaaru. Ɗum hokki nde omtirgel dammugal ngaska lugguka ka walaa keerol.
Nde hoodere ndeen omti ngaska kaan, sey ngoɗka cuurga ɓaleeha vurtoyii kama cuurga ngulu, ka ɓalini naange e henndu kurum.
Baɓɓatti mburtii nder cuurga kaan, ɗi cankitii nder duuniyaaru. Ɗi kokkaa baawɗe torrugo kama jahe.
Ɗum vi'i ɗi to' ɗi mbonnu geene koo leɗɗe koo goɗɗi fuɗngooji, sey nii yimɓe ɓe ngalaa caayda Allah dow tihiɗe mu''en tan.
Ɗi ngooraa ɗi torra yimɓe ɓeen torraa kalluka faa lebbi jovi, ammaa to' ɗi mbar ɓe. Naawɗum ŋatki ma'aji e laatii kama naawɗum ŋatki jahe.
Nder balɗe ɗeen, yimɓe no ngilloto maayde, ammaa ɓe keɓataa nde, ɓe ngiɗey maaygo, ammaa maayde no nyaarey ɓe.
Baɓɓatti ɗiin e nanndi e pucci ciryaniiɗi konu. Dow ko'e ma'aji e woodi goɗɗum ko nanndi e giifi jiinaariya, geese ma'aji e nanndi e ɗe yimɓe.
Gaasa ma'aji e nanndi e ka debbo, nyiiƴe ma'aji e nanndi e ɗe mawndu.
Eɗi ɓornii goɗɗum nannduɗum e toggohon njamndi e gabaaje ma'aji, sonnyo biyeeli ma'aji e nanndi e sonnyo pucci kaɓɓanaaɗi amalenke konu, eɗi nyaara ummanii konu.
Eɗi ngoodi ɓokkorɗe piɗooje kama ɗe jahe. Ɓokkorɗe ɗeen e ngoodi baawɗe nawnugo yimɓe faa lebbi jovi.
Eɗi ngoodi laamiiɗo laamantooɗo ɗi, kanko woni malaa'ikaajo ngaska lugguka ka walaa keerol. Innde ma'ako nder *ibraaninkoore woni Abadon, nder *helenankoore boo Apooliyon, waato Kalkoowo.
Torraaji kalluɗi arani ngutake. Horii torraaji kalluɗi ɗiɗi gareyɗi.
Nde malaa'ikaajo njoveego'oojo duudi luwal muuɗum, sey nanmi voliinde e vurtoyoo nder luwe nayi gonɗe buttuli to ɗum wulata urdi mbelndi nde jiinaariya, wonnde yeeso Allah.
Voliinde ndeen vi'i malaa'ikaajo oon: — Yoof ɓen ɗoon malaa'ika'en nayo haɓɓaaɓe e regorde maayo Eferaatis manngo !
Sey ɗum yoofi malaa'ika'en nayo ɓeen, ɓe ɗum siryii gam nde'e hitaande e ndu'u lewru e nde'e nyanndeere e ɗu'um wakkaci, gam ɓe mbara feccere wo'ore nder cende tati ɗe yimɓe duuniyaaru.
Mi nanii ɗuuɗal soojeeji waɗɗiiɓe pucci waɗii miliyooji keme ɗiɗi.

Nder wahayu ɗuum mi yi'ii pucci e waɗɗiiɓe ɗi, eɓe cuddiri gabaaje maɓɓe toggohon njamndi, mbo'ojukon coloy kama yiite, mbulambulahon, nareeriihon. Koo nguye puccu e woodi hoore kama nde mawndu, kadimaa yiite e cuurga e noorngal e mburtoyoo nder konnduɗe ma'aji.
Feccere wo'ore nder cende tati ɗe duuniyaaru mbardaa torraaji kalluɗi tati ɗiin, waato yiite e cuurga e noorngal burtoytooɗum nder konnduɗe ma'aji.
Baawɗe ma'aji nder konnduɗe e ɓokkorɗe ngoni. Ɓokkorɗe ma'aji e ngoodi ko'e kama ɗe bo'ole, e ma'aje ɗi nawnirta yimɓe.

Yimɓe horiiɓe ɓe torraaji ɗiin mbaraay, ɓe tuubaay ɓe ngooraay ko ɓe mbaɗi e juuɗe maɓɓe. Ɓe ngooraay sujjidango *ginnaaji e gumkiiji ɗi ɗum wa'ari jiinaariya koo ajurfaari koo njamndi mboɗeeri koo haayre koo lekki. Ɗi fuu ɗi ngi'ataa, ɗi nanataa, ɗi njahataa.
Kadimaa ɓe ngooraay waɗgo war-hoore e raarnugo e njeenu e nguyka maɓɓe.

Ɓaawo ma'ajum, ngi'imi goɗɗo malaa'ikaajo cemmbiɗɗo e jippoyoo gada dow, emo vahanii duule. Timotimoongal e taarii dow hoore ma'ako, yeeso ma'ako e jalbitoo kama naange, kosɗe ma'ako nanndii e danngalle kuɓɓuɗe yiite.
Emo jogii goɗngel deftel omtiingel e junngo ma'ako. O yaaɓi kosngal ma'ako nyaamal dow maayo, nanal boo dow lesdi.
O volvi e semmbee kama ƴuttaango mawndu. Nde o volvi, sey palmaali joveeɗiɗi no'otii e hoolo semmbiɗngo.
Nde palmaali joveeɗiɗi ɗiin kooli, sey nesmi vinndugo, ammaa sey nanmi woɗnde voliinde gada dow, nde vi'i: — Ta'a vinndu ko palmaali joveeɗiɗi ɗiin mbi'i, suuɗ ɗum !
Ndeen malaa'ikaajo mo ngi'imi e darii dow lesdi e dow maayo ƴefti junngo muuɗum nyaamo dow.
O hunorii e innde Allah poofeyɗo faa abadaa, tagɗo dow e lees e maayo e ko woni nder ma'ago fuu. O vi'i: — Wakkaci horaaki kadin !
To malaa'ikaajo njoveeɗiɗaɓo duudii luwal muuɗum, Allah no hebbiney sirri muuɗum, noon no o vi'inoo maccuɓe ma'ako *annabo'en.
Ndeen ɓesdumi nango voliinde nde nannoomi gada dow, nde ɓesdi volvango yam, nde vi'i: — Yah, njaɓaa ngel ɗoon deftel omtiingel e junngo malaa'ikaajo dariiɗo dow maayo e lesdi.
Sey njahami to malaa'ikaajo oon, mbi'imoomi o hokka yam deftel ngeel. Sey o vi'i yam: — Jaɓ ngel nyaam, ngel veley nder honnduko maaɗa kama njuumri, ammaa ngel haaɗey nder reedu maaɗa.
Sey njaɓmi ngel e junngo malaa'ikaajo oon nyaammi. Ngel laatii belngel nder honnduko am kama njuumri, ammaa ɓaawo mi moɗii ngel, ngel laatii kaaɗngel nder reedu am.
Sey ɗum ɓesdi vi'igo yam: — Doole ɓesdaa waɗgo annabaaku dow yimɓe e leƴƴi e ɗemɗe feere-feere e laamiiɓe ɗuuɗɓe.
Ndeen ɗum hokki yam ƴommbal potnirgal nanndungal e sawru, ɗum vi'i yam: — Umma, yah fotnu *Wuro Allah Seniingo e to ɗum wulata urdi, limaa sujjidanooɓe Allah wonɓe nder ma'ago.
Ammaa ta'a fotnu fiiliire wuro ngoon, woor nde, gam nde yoofanaama *leƴƴi ɗi laataaki Yahuudu'en. Ɓe njaaɓey si'ire seniinde e semmbee faa lebbi arba'iin e ɗiɗi (42).
Mi hokkey caaydu'en am ɗiɗo ɓorniiɓe kolte pahatu kuugal wa'ajingo voliinde am, faa balɗe dubuu e keme ɗiɗi e settiin (1 260).
Caaydu'en ɗiɗo ɓeen ngoni leɗɗe *jaytunje ɗiɗi e fitilaaji ɗiɗi dariiɗum yeeso jawmu duuniyaaru.
Giɗɗo hallango ɓe fuu, yiite no vurtoyto nder konnduɗe maɓɓe nge halka wanywanyɓe maɓɓe. Noon giɗɗo hallango ɓe fuu wardete.

Eɓe ngoodi baawɗe haɗgo iyoonde toɓa nder balɗe ɗe ɓe nga'ajinta voliinde Jawmiraawo. Kadimaa eɓe ngoodi baawɗe wartirgo ndiyam ƴiiƴam. Eɓe ngoodi boo baawɗe jippinango duuniyaaru koo iri kaye torraa kalluka nde ɓe ngiɗi fuu.
Ɓaawo ɓe keynii ga'ajinki maɓɓe, ngoɗnga ndiiwa kulniinga no vurtoto nder ngaska lugguka ka walaa keerol, nga haɓa e maɓɓe, nga jaaloo ɓe, nga wara ɓe.
Ɓalli maɓɓe ngooree dow laawol si'ire mawnde to Jawmiraawo maɓɓe waraa dow *gaafagal. Si'ire ndeen e soomree Sodoma e lesdi *Misira.
Yimɓe gada koo ndiye lesdi e koo ɗiye leƴƴi e koo ɗeye ɗemɗe no ngarey ndaara ɓalli ɗiin, faa balɗe tati e feccere, ɓe kaɗa ɗi uveego.
Yimɓe duuniyaaru fuu no naney belɗum, ɓe mbaɗa juulɗe, ɓe kokkindira caahuuji, gam annabo'en ɗiɗo torrunooɓe duuniyaaru ɓeen maayii.
Ammaa ɓaawo balɗe tati e feccere ɗeen, sey poofɗe yonki ivoyɗe to Allah natti ɓe, ɓe ummii ɓe ndarii. Kulol manngol nanngi koo moye giiɗo ɓe.
Ndeen *annabo'en ɗiɗo ɓeen nani woɗnde voliinde semmbiɗnde gada dow e vi'a ɓe: — Ƴeeŋoyee ɗo'o ! Ɓe ƴeenyi asama nder ruuldere, wanywanyɓe maɓɓe e ndarii ndaara.
Ɗoon e ɗoon lesdi dimmbii e semmbee, sey feccere wo'ore nder cende sappo ɗe si'ire ndeen yibbii, yimɓe dubuuje njoveeɗiɗo kalki. Kulol manngol nanngi horiiɓe, ɓe mawnini Allah mo dow.
Halkere ɗiɗaɓre ƴaɓɓake. Halkere tataɓre e wara naa ko neeɓii.

Malaa'ikaajo njoveeɗiɗaɓo duudi luwal muuɗum, sey ɗum nani woɗnde voliinde semmbiɗnde gada dow e vi'a: — Laamu duuniyaaru fuu laatake ngu Jawmiraawo meeɗen e Almasiifu muuɗum. O laamoto faa abadaa abadin.
Ndotti'en aciriin e nayo (24) jooɗiiɓe dow jooɗorɗe laamu mu''en yeeso Allah ndiccii yeeso ma'ako, ɓe cujjidani mo.
Eɓe mbi'a: « Yaa Allah Jawmiraawo, Jawmu baawɗe, aan woni jo'oni, aan woni ndeenno ! Min ngettii ma, gam a huutinirii baawɗe maaɗa mawɗe a jo''inii laamu maaɗa.

Leƴƴi ɗi anndaa ma kuunƴi, ammaa huunƴere maaɗa warii. Wakkaci sernango maayɓe warii, wakkaci biyaago *annabo'en maccuɓe maaɗa, e seniiɓe, e hulooɓe innde maaɗa, mawɓe e famarɓe. Wakkaci waɗii nde kalkataa halkooɓe duuniyaaru. »
Ndeen *Wuro Allah Seniingo wonngo dow omtii, akootiiwa alkawal yi'aa nder ma'ago. Sey maƴƴe maƴƴi, palmaali e diggaali e dimmbaaki lesdi mbaɗi, malemalleeje mawɗe toɓi.
Goɗɗum kaayniiɗum kulniiɗum vanngi toon dow. Goɗɗo debbo e vahanii naange darii dow lewru. Emo yiifii giifol ngol koode sappo e ɗiɗi.
O gaamɗo, emo diccii o danyey, emo voya gam naawɗum ŋatawre.
Kadimaa goɗɗum kaayniiɗum kulniiɗum vanngi toon dow. Ɗum ngoɗnga mbo'oga mboɗeewa, nga ko'e joveeɗiɗi e luwe sappo, hoore fuu e giifol muuɗum.

Ɓokkorde ma'aga vuuvi feccere wo'ore nder cende tati ɗe koode, nga rufoyi ɗe dow duuniyaaru. Nga wari nga darii yeeso on ɗoon debbo dicciiɗo danya, gam nga nyaama ɓinngel ma'ako ɗoon to o danyii ngel.
Ndeen o danyi ɓiɗɗo gorko laamorantooɗo duuniyaaru e sawru njamndi. Ammaa ɓiɗɗo oon piiftaa yaharaa to Allah e jooɗorgal laamu muuɗum.
Debbo oon nyaari, natti ladde yahi woɗnde yaayre to Allah siryanii mo. Toon o maraa faa balɗe dubuu e keme ɗiɗi e settiin (1 260).
Sey konu ummii toon dow. Miikaa'iilu e malaa'ika'en muuɗum konkontiri e mbo'oga ngaan e malaa'ika'en ma'aga.
Ammaa nga jaalaa, nga tuufoyaa gada toon dow, kanga e malaa'ika'en ma'aga.
Nga feroyaa nder duuniyaaru. Mbo'oga ngaan e woonnoo ila ndeenno, kanga vi'etee Ibiliisa koo *Ceyɗaan majjinoowo duuniyaaru. Nga feraa nder duuniyaaru kanga e malaa'ika'en ma'aga fuu.

Ndeen nanmi woɗnde voliinde semmbiɗnde gada dow e vi'a: « Jo'oni kisndam, e semmbee, e *laamu Allah meeɗen, e baawɗe Almasiifu ma'ako ngarii. Gam gullotooɗo banndiraaɓe meeɗen yeeso Allah jemma e nyalawma tuufaama gada dow.
Ɓe keɓi jaalorgal dow ma'ako gada e ƴiiƴam *Njawdiri e haala Allah ka ɓe nga'ajini. Ɓe ngiɗaay hisnugo yonkiiji maɓɓe e maayde.

Gam ma'ajum, aan asama e jooɗiiɓe toon, nanee belɗum ! Ammaa onon wonɓe nder duuniyaaru e ko woni nder maayo, on mboni ! Gam *Ceyɗaan jipponoyake on nder huunƴere kama o fusa, gam emo anndi wakkaci ma'ako ɓadake timmugo. »
Nde mbo'oga ngaan annditi tuufaama nder duuniyaaru, sey nga fuɗɗi yillaago debbo oon danyɗo ɓiɗɗo gorko.
Ammaa debbo oon hokkaa biyeeli ɗiɗi ɗi dutal manngal, gam o fiira o yaha nder ladde yaayre nde ɗum siryanii mo. Toon ɗum marata mo faa duuɓi tati e lebbi joveego'o.
Sey mbo'oga ngaan tuuti ndiyam ɗuuɗɗam, ɗam ili ɓaawo debbo oon kama maayo, gam ɗam hooƴa mo.
Ammaa lesdi valli debbo oon, ndi omti honnduko ma'ari, ndi yardi ndiyam ɗam mbo'oga ngaan tuuti.
Sey mbo'oga ngaan huunƴani debbo oon, nga ummoyii nga hona lenyol ma'ako, waato ɓeen ɗowtaniiɓe dookaaji Allah e bolle Yeesu.
Mbo'oga ngaan darii dow njaareendi regorde maayo.
Ndeen ngi'imi ngoɗndi ndiiwri e vurtoyoo nder maayo, endi woodi ko'e joveeɗiɗi e luwe sappo. Koo ngale luwal e woodi giifol, koo ndeye hoore boo e woodi innde huɗeynde Allah.

Ndiiwri ndi ngi'imi ndiin e nanndi e kelu, endi woodi kosɗe mawɗe ɗe gaasa, e peɗeeli juutɗi kama ɗi ndiiwri ladde mbi'eteendi uurs. Honnduko ma'ari e nanndi e ko mawndu. Mbo'oga hokki ndiiwri ndiin semmbee muuɗum e jooɗorgal laamu muuɗum e baawɗe mawɗe.
Hoore wo'ore nder ko'e ndiiwri ndiin e woodi nawnannde waaweynde wargo ndi. Ammaa nawnannde ndeen hoyii. Ɗum haaynii yimɓe duuniyaaru, ɓe tokki ndi.
Ɓe cujjidani mbo'oga ngaan, gam nga hokkii ndiiwri ndiin baawɗe ma'aga. Kadimaa ɓe cujjidani ndiiwri ndiin, ɓe mbi'i: — Moye foti e ndi'i ndiiwri? Moye waawi haɓgo e ma'ari?
Ndiiwri ndiin hokkaa baawɗe volvugo bolle manta, e huɗgo Jawmiraawo, ndi wooraa ndi laamoo faa lebbi arba'iin e ɗiɗi (42).
Ndi fuɗɗi huɗgo Allah e innde muuɗum, e to o jooɗotoo, e jooɗiiɓe toon dow fuu.
Ndi wooraa ndi hona yimɓe Allah, ndi heɓa jaalorgal dow maɓɓe. Ndi hokkaa baawɗe dow koo ngole lenyol, e yimɓe, e ɗemɗe, e lesɗe.
Jooɗiiɓe nder duuniyaaru fuu no cujjidaney ndi. Kamɓe ngoni ɓe inɗe mu''en mbinndaaka nder deftere yonki ila fuɗɗam duuniyaaru, nde *Njawdiri mbaraandi.
Mo nofru nanooru fuu, sey nana !
Mo ɗum hiitii haɓɓee yaharee maccungaaku, haɓɓee yaharee, mo ɗum hiitii wardee kaafahi, o wardee ki. Gam ma'ajum, sey yimɓe Allah ti'inoo jogaago munyal e goonɗinki.
Ndeen ngi'imi ndiiwri feere e vurtoyoo nder lesdi. Endi woodi luwe ɗiɗi kama ɗe njawdiri, endi volva kama mbo'oga.
Ndi huutiri baawɗe iri ɗe ndiiwri arandi, ndi huutiniri ɗe yeeso arandi ndiin. Ndi waɗi duuniyaaru e wonɓe nder ma'aru fuu cujjidana ndiiwri arandi, ndi nawnannde muuɗum hoyi.
Ndiiwri ɗiɗaɓri ndiin waɗi alaamaaji kaayniiɗi ɗuuɗɗi, faa maa ndi waɗi yiite rufoyi nder duuniyaaru gada dow, yeeso gite koo moye.

Ndi majjinirii yimɓe duuniyaaru e kuuɗe kaayniiɗe ɗe ndi hokkaa huugo yeeso ndiiwri arandi. Ndiiwri ɗiɗaɓri ndiin vi'i yimɓe maha ngumkiwa nanndunga e ndiiwri arandi nawniranoondi kaafahi faa nesi waatgo, e noon fuu endi foofa.
Ndi hokkaa baawɗe faa ndi waɗi yonki nder ngumkiwa ngaan. Ngumkiwa ngaan fuɗɗi volvugo, nga waɗi ɗum wara caliiɗo sujjidango nga fuu.
Ndiiwri ndiin dooli yimɓe fuu, mawɗo e pamaro, diskuɗo e cooyɗo, maccuɗo e dimo, ɓe mbaɗanee caayda e junngo nyaamo, koo e tihinde.
Ndi waɗii ɗum, gam to' goɗɗo sooda koo soorra, kul walaa caayda kaan, waato innde ndiiwri arandi, koo lammba ma'ari.
Ɗo'o e yiɗi hakkiilo. Goonɗo fahamu fuu e waawi vurtingo ma'ana lammba ndiiwri ndiin, gam ɗum lammba innde neɗɗo. Lammba kaan woni keme joveego'o e settiin e joveego'o (666).
Ndeen ndaarmi ngi'imi *Njawdiri e darii dow vaamnde *Siyoona, endi wondi e yimɓe dubuuje hemre e arba'iin e nayo (144 000). Innde ma'ari e innde Baaba ma'ari e vinndii dow tihiɗe maɓɓe.
Sey nanmi woɗnde voliinde semmbiɗnde gada dow, kama iido maayo manngo, kama riggaango semmbiɗngo. Voliinde ndeen e nanndi e sunnyere piiki moolooji.

Eɓe ngima gimol kesol yeeso jooɗorgal laamu e yeeso tagle nayi ɗe yonki, e yeeso ndotti'en. Walaa baaweyɗo ekkitaago gimol ngool, to naa yimɓe dubuuje hemre e arba'iin e nayo (144 000) ɓeen tan, ɓe ɗum soottii e duuniyaaru.

Kamɓe ngoni waɗɓe jo'onde laaɓnde, gam ɓe meeɗaay waaldugo e rewɓe, eɓe tokki Njawdiri ndiin to ndi fa'i fuu. Kamɓe ngoni soottaaɓe nder yimɓe duuniyaaru, gam ɓe laatoo kokkal aranal to Allah e Njawdiri ndiin.
Fewre meeɗaay vurtaago nder konnduɗe maɓɓe, ɓe ngalaa feloore.
Ndeen ngi'imi goɗɗo malaa'ikaajo e fiira toon dow, emo jogii *Habaru Belɗum tabbiteyɗum, gam o wa'ajina yimɓe duuniyaaru, e koo ngole lenyol, e koo ɓeye yimɓe, e koo ngale ɗemngal, e koo ndiye lesdi.
O towni voliinde e semmbee o vi'i: — Kulee Allah, mawninee mo ! Gam wakkaci o sernanta duuniyaaru waɗii. Mawninee tagɗo dow e lesdi e maayo e ɓulduɗe ndiyam.
Malaa'ikaajo ɗiɗaɓo tokki arano, e vi'a: — Si'ire Babiila yibbii ! Si'ire Babiila mawnde yibbii ! Nde yarnii leƴƴi duuniyaaru *innaboojam njeenu ma'are nyaaɗɗam.
Malaa'ikaajo tataɓo tokki aramɓe ɗiɗo ɓeen, e vi'a e semmbee: — Cujjidanɗo ndiiwri arandi e ngumkiwa nanndunga e ma'ari, jaɓi caayda ma'ari e junngo muuɗum koo e tihinde muuɗum,
no yarey *innaboojam huunƴere Allah ɗam gillaaka, ɗam o waɗi nder horde huunƴere ma'ako. O torrirte yiite e ƴibiriitu yeeso malaa'ika'en seniiɓe e *Njawdiri.
Cuurga yiite nge ɗum torrirta ɓe no ummoto dow faa abadaa. Ɓeen sujjidanɓe ndiiwri ndiin e ngumkiwa nanndunga e ma'ari, mbaɗanaa caayda innde ma'ari fuu, ɓe ustantaake torraa jemma e nyalawma.
Gam ma'ajum, yimɓe Allah tokkuɓe ko o vi'i, ngoonɗini Yeesu, sey mbaɗa munyal.

Ndeen ɓesdumi nango woɗnde voliinde gada dow e vi'a: — Vinndu ɗu'um: Gada jo'oni maayɓe e tokki Jawmiraawo no keɓey barkaa. Ruhu Allah vi'i: — Goonga, ɓe pooftey e torraa maɓɓe, gam laada kuugal maɓɓe no tokkey ɓe.
Ndeen ngi'imi ruuldere raneere, goɗɗo kama *Ɓii-Neɗɗo e jooɗii dow ma'are, emo yiifii giifol jiinaariya, emo jogii lawjeeru velndu e junngo ma'ako.

Sey goɗɗo malaa'ikaajo vurtoyii nder *Wuro Allah Seniingo, o volvani oon jooɗiiɗo dow ruulde e semmbee, o vi'i: — Foortu lawjeeru maaɗa, puɗɗaa taygo, gam wakkaci tayre waɗii. Duuniyaaru ɓenndii, ndu fotii taƴeego.
Sey jooɗiiɗo dow ruuldere oon foorti lawjeeru muuɗum, o taƴi duuniyaaru fuu.
Malaa'ikaajo feere vurtoyii nder Wuro Allah Seniingo wonngo toon dow. Kanko maa emo jogii lawjeeru velndu.

Ndeen goɗɗo malaa'ikaajo deeneyɗo yiite nge ɗum wuldata urdi mbelndi vurtoyii. O volvani malaa'ikaajo jogiiɗo lawjeeru velndu e voliinde semmbiɗnde o vi'i: — Foortu lawjeeru maaɗa taƴaa *innabooje duuniyaaru, gam ɓikkon ma'aje ɓenndii.
Malaa'ikaajo oon foorti lawjeeru muuɗum nder duuniyaaru, o taƴi ɓikkon innabooje, o feri kon nder ɓiɗɗirde huunƴere Allah.
Ɗum yaaɓi kon nder ɓiɗɗirde yaasi si'ire. Ƴiiƴam waɗi ga iloygo nder ɓiɗɗirde ndeen, faa ɗam yahari kiloomeetirji keme ɗiɗi e tasa'iin e joveego'o (296). Luggeenga ma'ajam waɗi meetir go'o e feccere.
Ɓaawo ma'ajum ngi'imi ngoɗka alaama makka kaayniika toon dow. Mi yi'ii malaa'ika'en njoveeɗiɗo jogiiɓe torraaji joveeɗiɗi cakitiiɗi kalluɗi. Kanji ngoni timmoode huunƴere Allah.

Ndeen ngi'imi goɗɗum kama maayo daarorɗe gillindirngo e yiite. Kadimaa mi yi'ii heɓɓe jaalorgal dow ndiiwri arandi ndiin e ngumkiwa nanndunga e ma'ari e lammba innde ma'ari. Eɓe ndarii regorde maayo daarorɗe ngoon, eɓe njogii moolooji ɗi Allah hokki ɓe.

Eɓe ngima gimol *Muusa maccuɗo Allah e gimol *Njawdiri, eɓe mbi'a: « Yaa Allah Jawmiraawo, Laamiiɗo Laamlaamɓe, kuuɗe maaɗa no mawɗe, kaayniiɗe. Laabi maaɗa no aadaliiji, goongaaji ! Aan woni laamiiɗo leƴƴi.
Moye woni hulataa ma, ya Jawmiraawo? Moye salotoo mawningo innde maaɗa? Gam aan tan woni ceniiɗo. Yimɓe duuniyaaru fuu no ngarey cujjidan maa, gam ɓe ngi'ii no kuuɗe maaɗa laatorii aadaliije. »
Ɓaawo ma'ajum mi yi'ii *yaayre ɓurnde senaago nder *Wuro Seniingo wonngo toon dow e omtii.
Malaa'ika'en njoveeɗiɗo jogiiɓe torraaji kalluɗi ɓeen mburtoyii nder wuro ngoon, eɓe ɓornii kolte ɗelemɗe, booɗɗe, ɗelkitooɗe, eɓe taadii taadorɗe jiinaariya e gabaaje maɓɓe.
Ndeen go'otum nder tagle nayi ɗe yonki ɗeen hokki malaa'ika'en njoveeɗiɗo ɓeen tummuɗe joveeɗiɗi ɗe jiinaariya, eɗe keevi huunƴere Allah mo yonki faa abadaa abadin.
Sey cuurga teddungal Allah e baawɗe muuɗum heevi wuro ngoon. Walaa baawɗo nattugo ngo, sey to torraaji joveeɗiɗi ɗiin ɗi malaa'ika'en njoveeɗiɗo ɓeen timmii.
Ndeen nanmi woɗnde voliinde semmbiɗnde gada nder *Wuro Seniingo wonngo toon dow, e vi'a malaa'ika'en njoveeɗiɗo ɓeen: — Njahee ndufanon duuniyaaru tummuɗe joveeɗiɗi ɗe huunƴere Allah !
Malaa'ikaajo arano yahi rufi ko woni nder tummude muuɗum dow lesdi. Sey goɗɗe putte naawɗe kalluɗe mburtonoyii ɓeen woonɓe caayda ndiiwri arandi e sujjidanɓe ngumkiwa nanndunga e ma'ari.
Malaa'ikaajo ɗiɗaɓo maa rufi ko woni e tummude muuɗum nder maayo. Sey ndiyam maayo ngoon laatii kama ƴiiƴam maayɗo. Koo ɗume ko woodi yonki gonɗum nder maayo ngoon waati.
Sey malaa'ikaajo tataɓo rufi ko woni e tummude muuɗum nder ilaali e ɓulduɗe ndiyam, ɗum fuu ɗum laatii ƴiiƴam.
Ndeen nanmi malaa'ikaajo deeneyɗo ndiyam e vi'a: — Yaa Ceniiɗo, aan woni ndeenno, aan woni jo'oni. Aan a aadaliijo nder ceri'a maaɗa.
A hokkii halluɓe ɓeen ƴiiƴam ɓe njara. Noon ɓe kaandi, gam ɓe ndufii ƴiiƴam yimɓe maaɗa e *annabo'en maaɗa.
Sey nanmi voliinde gada to ɗum wulata urdi mbelndi, e vi'a: — Goonga, Allah Jawmiraawo jawmu baawɗe ! A wa'ara ceri'a goonga e aadilaaku !
Ndeen malaa'ikaajo nayaɓo rufi ko woni e tummude muuɗum dow naange. Sey nge wooraa nge sumra yimɓe e gulɗum ma'age.
Naawɗum naange hallunge ngeen sumi yimɓe, faa ɓe kuɗi innde Allah mo baawɗe sabu torraaji joveeɗiɗi ɗiin. E noon fuu ɓe tuubaay, ɓe mawninaay mo.
Malaa'ikaajo njovaɓo maa rufi ko woni e tummude muuɗum dow jooɗorgal laamu ndiiwri arandi ndiin, sey niɓre omndi koo toye to ndi laamoto. Yimɓe ŋati ɗemɗe mu''en, sabu naawɗum.
Ɓe kuɗi Allah mo dow sabu naawɗum putte kalluɗe keɓɗe ɓe. Ammaa e noon fuu ɓe tuubaay gada e kuuɗe maɓɓe kalluɗe.
Malaa'ikaajo njoveego'ojo rufi ko woni e tummude muuɗum nder maayo Eferaatis manngo. Maayo ngoon ɓeeɓi, ngo yo'ori, gam siryanaago laamiiɓe fu'una laawol.

Sey ngi'imi goɗɗi *ginnaaji kalluɗi tati nannduɗi e paaɓi. Go'otol e vurtoyoo nder honnduko mbo'oga, go'otol boo e vurtoyoo nder honnduko ndiiwri ɗiɗaɓri, go'otol e vurtoyoo nder honnduko annabiijo fewre.
Kanji ngoni ginnaaji baɗooji kuuɗe kaayniiɗe, jaheyɗi to laamiiɓe duuniyaaru, ɗi kawrita ɓe, gam konu *nyannde-darngal nde Allah jawmu baawɗe.
Kiimtee ko Yeesu vi'inoo, o vi'i: — Rah, mi warey kama gujjo ! Barkaa no laatanto baalɗo e reentii, e ɓornii kolte muuɗum, gam to' o dillu o suhuraaki o semta yeeso yimɓe.
Ginnaaji ɗiin kawriti laamiiɓe ɓeen yaayre vi'eteende Armagedon nder ɗemngal *ibraaninkoore.
Ndeen malaa'ikaajo njoveeɗiɗaɓo rufi ko woni e tummude muuɗum nder henndu. Sey woɗnde voliinde semmbiɗnde vurtoyii to jooɗorgal laamu nder *Wuro Seniingo wonngo toon dow, ende vi'a: — Ɗum heƴii !
Sey ɗum waɗi maƴƴe e diggaali e palmaali e dimmbaaki lesdi kalluki, iri ki ɗum meeɗaay waɗgo gada yimɓe tagaa e duuniyaaru.
Si'ire Babiila mawnde senndii cende tati, ci'e duuniyaaru ngibbii. Sey Allah hiimtii si'ire Babiila mawnde, o yarni nde horde *innaboojam huunƴere ma'ako hallunde.
Koo ndiye lesdi ngonndi caka ndiyam nuci, baamle mawɗe majji.
Malemalleeje teddirɗe kilooji arba'iin (40) mbaɗi ga yanoygo dow yimɓe, faa ɓe kuɗi Allah sabu torraa malemalleeje ɗeen, gam ka hallii korey.
Sey go'oto nder malaa'ika'en njoveeɗiɗo jogiiɓe tummuɗe joveeɗiɗi ɗeen wari vi'i yam: — War mi hollu maa no Allah halkirta on ɗoon jeenoowo inndinɗo, waato si'ire mawnde wonnde ha'ade ilaali.
Laamiiɓe duuniyaaru mba'adii e ma'ako njeenu. Njeenu ngu yimɓe duuniyaaru mba'adi e ma'ako yiiltii ɓe.

Nder wahayu ɗuum, malaa'ikaajo oon hooƴi yam yahari yam nder ladde. Toon ngi'imi goɗɗo debbo e jooɗii dow ngoɗndi ndiiwri mboɗeeri coloy, ɓanndu ma'ari fuu e heevi inɗe kuɗooje Allah, endi woodi ko'e joveeɗiɗi e luwe sappo.

Debbo oon e ɓornii kolte bo'ojiteyɗe e boɗeeje coloy, emo sinngitorii koɗi jiinaariya e koɗi ba'araaɗi kaaƴe dime feere-feere. Emo jogii horde jiinaariya e junngo ma'ako, ende heevi *innaboojam karamɗam, waato njeenu ma'ako nefniingu.
E tihinde ma'ako ɗum vinndi innde nde ma'ana cuuɗiika: « Babiila mawnde, inna kaaruwa'en, inna koo ɗume nefniiɗum duuniyaaru. »
Mi yi'ii debbo oon e yiiltii, sabu ƴiiƴam yimɓe Allah ɗam o yari, e ƴiiƴam waraaɓe gam jogaago bolle Yeesu. Nde ngi'imoomi mi haayɗinii korey.
Ammaa malaa'ikaajo oon ƴami yam vi'i: — Ko jeyi kaayɗintaa? Mi yeccete ma'ana sirri debbo oon, e sirri ndiiwri ndi o waɗɗii, ndi ko'e joveeɗiɗi e luwe sappo.

Ndiiwri ndi ngiiɗaa, ndeenno endi woodi, jo'oni ndi walaa. Ndi ɓadake vurtaago nder ngaska lugguka ka walaa keerol, ndi yaha to ndi halketee. Yimɓe jooɗiiɓe nder duuniyaaru, ɓe ɗum vinndaay inɗe mu''en nder deftere yonki ila fuɗɗam duuniyaaru, no kaayɗiney yi'igo ndiiwri ndiin. Gam ndeenno e ndi woodi, jo'oni ndi walaa, ammaa ndi vittoyey.
Ɗu'um e holla doole neɗɗo tawree hikima e fahamu. Ko'e joveeɗiɗi ɗeen ɗum ƴoole joveeɗiɗi ɗe debbo oon jooɗii dow muuɗum,
kanje boo ngoni laamiiɓe njoveeɗiɗo. Njovo maɓɓe maayi, njoveego'oojo e laamii jo'oni, njoveeɗiɗaɓo boo waraay tawo. To o warii o laamoto wakkaci seɗɗa tan.
Ndiiwri ngoonnoondi, jo'oni boo ndi walaa, kayri woni go'oto nder laamiiɓe njoveeɗiɗo. Ndi laatoto boo laamiiɗo njoveetataɓo, ammaa timmoode ma'ari ɗum halkere.
Luwe sappo ɗe ngiiɗaa ɗeen, ɗum laamiiɓe sappo ɓe puɗɗaay laamaago tawo, ammaa ɗum hokkey ɓe baawɗe laamodaago e ndiiwri ndiin wakkaci seɗɗa.
Laamiiɓe sappo ɓeen fuu, nyumo maɓɓe no wo'oto, kadimaa ɓe kokkey ndiiwri ndiin baawɗe maɓɓe e teddungal maɓɓe.
Ɓe konkontirey e *Njawdiri, ammaa Njawdiri ndiin no heɓey jaalorgal dow maɓɓe, gam kayri woni Jawmiraawo Jawmiraaɓe, Laamiiɗo Laamlaamɓe. Ndi jaaloto ɓe, kayri e ɓeen noddaaɓe suɓaaɓe hoolaaɓe.
Malaa'ikaajo oon vi'i yam: — Ɗam ɗoon ndiyam ɗam ngiiɗaa to debbo jeenoowo oon jooɗii, ɗum leƴƴi e yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe e yimɓe lesɗe feere-feere e ɗemɗe.
Ɗen ɗoon luwe sappo ɗe ngiiɗaa boo, kanje e ndiiwri ndiin ɗe nganyey debbo oon, ɗe te'eta ko o woodi fuu, ɗe ɓorta mo, ɗe nyaama teewu ma'ako, ɗe ngula mo e yiite.
Gam Allah ɗowi ɓerɗe maɓɓe, faa ɓe kuwa ko o yiɗi, ɓe laatoto ɓe nyumo wo'oto, ɓe kokka ndiiwri ndiin laamu maɓɓe, faa ɗum hebbina ko Allah vi'i.
Debbo mo ngiiɗaa oon, kanko woni si'ire mawnde laamaniinde laamiiɓe duuniyaaru.
Ɓaawo ma'ajum mi yi'ii goɗɗo malaa'ikaajo mo baawɗe mawɗe e jippoyoo gada dow. Teddungal ma'ako yaynanii duuniyaaru fuu.
O noddi e semmbee, o vi'i: « Nde do''ake ! Si'ire Babiila mawnde do''ake ! Nde laatake jooɗorde *ginnaaji, e suuɗorde ginnaaji kalluɗi, e hawritirde koo ɗiye colli nefniiɗi karamɗi,
Gam leƴƴi duuniyaaru fuu njarii *innaboojam njeenu ma'are, Laamiiɓe duuniyaaru boo mba'adii e ma'are njeenu. Waɗooɓe luumaaku nder duuniyaaru ndiskirii velvelo ma'are ƴaɓɓitiingo. »
Ndeen nanmi woɗnde voliinde gada dow e vi'a: « Mburtee nder ma'are, onon yimɓe am, gam to' on kawtu e hakkeeji ma'are, to' torraa kalluka keɓeyka nde heɓ on.
Sabu hakkeeji ma'are njowndindirii faa ɗi kewtii asama. Allah yeggitaay kalluɗum ɗum nde waɗi.
Mbaɗanee nde noon no nde waɗani woɓɓe. Ko nde waɗi, mbaɗanee nde ɗum nde ɗiɗi. Kaaɗɗum ɗum nde su'utannoo woɓɓe, cu'utanee nde ɗum nde ɗiɗi nder tummude ma'are.

Torree nde, mboynee nde, deydey e no nde mawniniri hoore ma'are e nanki belɗum ɗum nde nani. Gam ende vi'a hoore ma'are: Emi jooɗii, mi laamiiɗo Miin, naa mi debbo mo gorko muuɗum maayi. Mi nattataa waannaare sam.
Gam ma'ajum torraa kalluka no yooftanto nde nder nyanndeere wo'ore: maayde e waannaare e veelo hallungo. Kadimaa nde wulee e yiite, gam Allah Jawmiraawo cernaneyɗo nde no cemmbiɗɗo. »
Laamiiɓe duuniyaaru hawtuɓe e ma'are njeenu e velvelo no mbaɗey ga voygo e ngulla gam ma'are, to ɓe ngi'ii cuurga yiite nyaameynge nde.
Ɓe ndaroto to woɗɗi, gam eɓe kula to' torraa ka nde yarata hewtu ɓe. Ɓe mbi'a: — A voni ! A voni ! Aan Babiila si'ire mawnde, semmbiɗnde ! Nder wakkaci seɗɗa, torraa kalluka yananii ma.
Waɗooɓe luumaaku nder duuniyaaru no mboyey pahatana nde, gam walaa luumoojo coodeyɗo goɗɗum to maɓɓe kadin.

Walaa coodeyɗo jiinaariya maɓɓe, e ajurfaari maɓɓe, e kaaƴe maɓɓe dime, e lu'ulu'uuji maɓɓe, e kolte ɗelemɗe laaɓɗe ɗelkitotooɗe, e kolte ɗelemɗe dime bi'eteeɗe « siliki », e kolte bo'ojiteyɗe, e kolte boɗeeje coloy, e koo iri ɗeye leɗɗe uurooje, e koo ɗume cehaaɗum e nyiiƴe nyiibi, e leɗɗe dime, e njamndi mboɗeeri, e ɗum jamɗe, e kaaƴe daneeje dime,

e sinamon, e conndi borkoono mbelndi, e urdi mbelndi nguleteendi, e nebbam mbi'eteeɗam « *miir », e urdi mbelndi nguleteendi mbi'eteendi « firankinsen », e *innaboojam, e nebbam, e conndi alkamaari, e alkamaari, e na'i, e baali, e be'i, e pucci, e mootaaji pucci, e maccuɓe, e yonkiiji mu''en.
Waɗooɓe luumo mbi'i nde: — Ku'uje ɗe ngiɗɗaa heɓgo fuu majjorii ma, risku maaɗa e sinngaaji maaɗa fuu majjii, a fuɗɗitataa keɓaa ɗum.
Luumooɓe heɓɓe risku gam wa'adugo luumaaku e ma'are, no ndaroto to woɗɗi, gam eɓe kula to' torraa ka nde yarata hewtu ɓe. Ɓe mboyey bojji naawɗi, ɓe pahata,

eɓe mbi'a: — A voni ! A voni ! Aan si'ire mawnde, ɓorninoonde kolte ɗelemɗe, laaɓɗe, ɗelkitotooɗe, e kolte bo'ojiteyɗe, e kolte boɗeeje coloy, sinngitoriinde e ko wa'araa jiinaariya, e kaaƴe dime, e lu'ulu'uuji !
Ammaa nder wakkaci seɗɗa, jawdi ndiin ndi fuu ndi halkii ! Darvanooɓe akale ndiyam e nattooɓe ɗe e fooɗooɓe ɗe e waɗooɓe luumaaku dow maayo fuu, ɓe ndarii to woɗɗi.
Ɓe mboyi nde ɓe ngi'i cuurga yiite nyaameynge nde, eɓe mbi'a: — Si'ire fotnoonde e nde'e manngu walaa !

Ɓe mecci mbulmbuldi dow ko'e maɓɓe, ɓe mbaɗi ga voygo, eɓe ngulla eɓe mbi'a: — A voni ! A voni ! Aan si'ire mawnde, si'ire nde ɓe akale ndiyam fuu ndiskiri e jawdi muuɗum ! Ammaa nder wakkaci seɗɗa, koo ɗume fuu halkii !
Aan asama, nan belɗum halkere ma'are ! Onon yimɓe Allah e lilaaɓe e annabo'en nanee belɗum, gam Allah sernanii nde ko nde waɗani on !
Sey goɗɗo malaa'ikaajo cemmbiɗɗo hooƴi woɗnde haayre mawnde kama haayre namrude, o feri nde nder maayo, emo vi'a: — Noon ɗum ferdata Babiila si'ire mawnde e semmbee, nde ɓesdataa yi'eego faa abadaa !

Ɗum ɓesdataa nango fiyooɓe moolooji e yimooɓe e duudooɓe duudaali e duudooɓe luwe nder ma'are. Bayloowo leɗɗe koo jamɗe koo goɗɗum feere fuɗɗitataa yi'eego nder ma'are, ɗum fuɗɗitataa nango sonnyo namarde nder ma'are !

Fitila ɓesdataa yaynaago nder ma'are. Ɗum ɓesdataa nango gimol koobgal nder ma'are. Torraaji ɗiin fuu no tawey nde, gam waɗooɓe luumaaku nder ma'are, kam ɓurnoo duuniyaaru fuu baawɗe. Nde majjinirii boo yimɓe duuniyaaru e sihiriiji ma'are !
Noon boo, ƴiiƴam *annabo'en e ɗam yimɓe Allah e ɗam yimɓe waraaɓe nder duuniyaaru fuu tawaama nder ma'are.
Ɓaawo ma'ajum mi nanii voliinde kama nde malaa'ika'en ɗuuɗɓe toon dow, eɓe ngima e semmbee eɓe mbi'a: « Haaleluuya ! Allah meeɗen jeyi kisndam e teddungal e baawɗe,
gam ceri'a ma'ako e laatii goonga e aadilaaku. O halkii on ɗoon debbo jeenoowo mawɗo, bonnirɗo duuniyaaru e njeenu muuɗum. Allah biinake mo ƴiiƴam maccuɓe muuɗum ɗam o rufi. »
Sey ɓe ɓesdi yimgo, eɓe mbi'a: « Haaleluuya ! Cuurga yiite nyaameynge si'ire ndeen e ummoo faa abadaa abadin. »
Sey ndotti'en aciriin e nayo (24) e tagle nayi ɗe yonki ndiccii cujjidani Allah jooɗiiɗo dow jooɗorgal laamu. Eɓe mbi'a: — Aamiin ! Haaleluuya !
Ndeen woɗnde voliinde ivi to jooɗorgal laamu e vi'a: — Maaltee Allah meeɗen, onon maccuɓe ma'ako, mawɗo e pamaro hulooɓe mo.
Kadimaa mi nanii goɗɗum kama olko yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe, kama hoolo nyaardu ndiyamji, kama hoolo riggaango semmbiɗngo, e vi'a: Haaleluuya ! Allah Jawmiraawo meeɗen Jawmu baawɗe e laamii !
En mbelmbeltu, nanen belɗum, mawninen mo, gam wakkaci koobgal *Njawdiri warii. Kadimaa koovaaɗo ma'ako oon siryake.
Koovaaɗo oon hokkaama koltal ɗelemngal laaɓngal ɗelkitotoongal. Koltal ngaal woni kuuɗe yimɓe Allah booɗɗe.
Sey malaa'ikaajo oon vi'i yam: — Vinndu: Barkaa no laatanto ma'atinaaɓe juulɗe koobgal *Njawdiri. Kadimaa o vi'i yam: — Ɗi'i haalaaji ɗum ɗi Allah, ɗi goongaaji.

Sey ndicciimi yeeso ma'ako gam mi sujjidana mo, ammaa o vi'i yam: — Ta'a waɗ noon ! Miin maa mi maccuɗo Allah kama maaɗa, aan e banndiraaɓe maaɗa jogiiɓe goonga ka Yeesu vanngini booɗɗum. Allah tan cujjidantaa ! Gam goonga ka Yeesu vanngini, kanka waɗi yimɓe mbaawi waɗgo annabaaku.
Ɓaawo ma'ajum ngi'imi dow e omtii, sey raa puccu ndaneewu. Baɗɗiiɗo ngu e vi'ee Koolaaɗo e Goongaajo. Emo waɗa aadilaaku nder ceri'a e konu.
Gite ma'ako e kuɓɓa kama ɗemngal yiite, emo yiifii giifi ɗuuɗɗi, innde e vinndii dow ma'ako, walaa annduɗo nde sey kanko tan.
Emo ɓornii toggoore nde ɗum soofniri ƴiiƴam, innde nde o noddirtee woni voliinde Allah.
Honooɓe asama e tokki mo dow pucci, eɓe ɓornii kolte ɗelemɗe laaɓɗe ɗelkitotooɗe.
Goɗki kaafahi belki e vurtoyoo nder honnduko ma'ako. E ma'aki o fe''irta duuniyaaru, o laamoranto ɓe sawru njamndi, o yaaɓey ɓikkon *innabooje nder ɓiɗɗirde huunƴere Allah Jawmu Baawɗe.
Raa innde vinndaande dow toggoore ma'ako e danngo ma'ako: « Laamiiɗo Laamlaamɓe, Jawmiraawo Jawmiraaɓe ».
Ndeen ngi'imi goɗɗo malaa'ikaajo e darii dow naange, o noddi colli piirooji dow fuu e voliinde semmbiɗnde, o vi'i: — Ngaree kawriton gam juulɗe Allah mawɗe,
nyaamon teewu laamiiɓe, e ngu mawɓe soojeeji, e ngu waawɓe konu, e ngu pucci, e ngu waɗɗiiɓe pucci ɗiin, e ngu yimɓe fuu, maccuɗo e dimo, mawɗo e pamaro !
Sey ngi'imi ndiiwri arandi e laamiiɓe duuniyaaru e soojeeji maɓɓe kawritii yaayre wo'ore, gam ɓe konkontira e gonɗo dow puccu oon e soojeeji muuɗum.

Sey ɗum nanngi ndiiwri ndiin e annabiijo fewre baɗɗo kaayniiɗum ɗuum yeeso ma'ari. E kaayniiɗum ɗuum o majjiniri ɓeen waɗanaaɓe caayda ndiiwri ndiin e sujjidanɓe gumki nannduɗum e ma'ari. Annabiijo fewre e ndiiwri ndiin perdaa e yonki nder maayo yiite ƴibiriitu hallunge.
Ɗum wardi soojeeji maɓɓe e kaafahi burtoytooki nder honnduko oon baɗɗiiɗo puccu. Colli nyaami teewu maɓɓe, faa ɗi kaari.
Ndeen ngi'imi malaa'ikaajo e jippoyoo gada dow, emo jogii omtirgel ngaska lugguka ka walaa keerol, emo jogii ɓoggol njamndi juutngol.
Sey o nanngi mbo'onga ngaan, waato mbo'onga nga ndeenno mbi'eteenga Ibiliisa koo *Ceyɗaan, o haɓɓiri nga ɓoggol ngool faa duuɓi dubuu (1 000).
Malaa'ikaajo oon feri nga nder ngaska lugguka kaan, o omndi ka, o takki ka, gam to' nga ɓesdu majjingo leƴƴi, faa nde duuɓi dubuu ɗiin (1 000) keevi. Ɓaawo ɗoon doole nga yoofee wakkaci seɗɗa.

Ndeen ngi'imi jooɗorɗe laamu. Jooɗiiɓe dow ma'aje kokkaama baawɗe waɗgo ceri'a. Ndeen kadimaa ngi'imi yonkiiji ittanaaɓe ko'e gam wa'ajingo habaru Yeesu e voliinde Allah. Kamɓe ngoni ɓe cujjidanaay ndin ɗoon ndiiwri arandi koo gumki nannduɗum e ma'ari, ɓe njaɓaay ɗum waɗana ɓe caayda ma'ari dow tihiɗe maɓɓe koo e juuɗe maɓɓe. Kamɓe pinti laamodii e *Almasiifu faa duuɓi dubuu.
Kanjum woni ummitaaki maayɓe arani. Maayɓe horiiɓe boo pintaay faa nde duuɓi dubuu ɗiin keevi.
Barkaa e senaare laatanto heɓɓe geɗal nder kin ɗoon ummitaaki arani. Maayde ɗiɗaɓre meemataa ɓe, ɓe laatoto huwanooɓe Allah e Almasiifu, ɓe laamodoo e ma'ako faa duuɓi dubuu.
To duuɓi dubuu ɗiin keevii, ɗum yoofey *Ceyɗaan gada to haɓɓano.
O vurtoto o majjina leƴƴi gonɗi cosɓulli duuniyaaru nayi fuu, waato Gog e Magog. O hawritey ɓe gam konu. Ɓe ɗuuɗɓe kama jaarengol maayo.
Ɓe cankitii koo toye nder duuniyaaru, ɓe pilii si'ire nde Allah yiɗi, to seniiɓe muuɗum ngoni. Ammaa yiite rufoyi gada dow, nge halki ɓe.
Ceyɗaan majjinnooɗo ɓe boo feraa nder veendu yiite e ƴibiriitu, to ndiiwri e annabiijo fewre ngoni. Toon ɗum waɗata ga hokkugo ɓe bone jemma e nyalawma, faa abadaa abadin.
Ndeen ngi'imi goɗngal jooɗorgal laamu manngal daneewal. Goɗɗo e jooɗii dow ma'agal. Dow e lees nyaari ndilli yeeso ma'ako, ɗum fuɗɗitaay yi'eego.

Sey ngi'imi maayɓe mawɗo e pamaro e ndarii yeeso jooɗorgal ngaal. Ɗum omti defte. Kadimaa ɗum omti woɗnde deftere, waato deftere yonki. Ɗum sernirani maayɓe ɓeen kuuɗe mu''en binndaaɗe nder defte ɗeen, koo moye fuu deydey e kuuɗe muuɗum.
Maayo tuutoyi maayɓe wonɓe nder muuɗum. Maayde e Laahira boo tuutoyi maayɓe mu''en. Ndeen koo moye maɓɓe sernanaa deydey e ko waɗi.
Sey Maayde e Laahira peraa nder veendu yiite. Veendu yiite nduun woni maayde ɗiɗaɓre.
Koo moye mo ɗum tawaay innde muuɗum e vinndii nder deftere yonki, no ferete nder veendu yiite nduun.
Ndeen ngi'imi asama kesum e duuniyaaru hesru, gam asama aranum e duuniyaaru arandu majji, maayo boo walaa.
Ndeen ngi'imi si'ire seniinde, waato *Urusaliima hesre, ende jippoyoo gada asama, gada to Allah, nde siryaama kama koovaaɗo cinngitiiɗo gam gorko muuɗum.

Kadimaa mi nanii woɗnde voliinde semmbiɗnde gada jooɗorgal laamu ngaal e vi'a: — Rah, jooɗorde Allah e caka ɓiɓɓe-aadama ! O jooɗodoto e maɓɓe, ɓe laatoto lenyol ma'ako. Allah e hoore muuɗum no wondey e maɓɓe, o laatoto Allah maɓɓe.
O mooytaney ɓe gonɗi maɓɓe fuu. Maayde e mettam ɓeram e bojji e torraa puɗɗitataa waɗgo, gam koo ɗume ko woonnoo ndeenno ƴaɓɓake.
Ndeen jooɗiiɗo dow jooɗorgal laamu oon vi'i: — Jo'oni emi hesɗitina koo ɗume ! Kadimaa o vi'i yam: — Vinndu haalaaji ɗiin, gam haalaaji ɗiin ɗi koolniiɗi, ɗi goongaaji.
Ndeen o vi'i yam: — Ɗum heƴii ! Miin woni Alfaa, miin woni Omeega, waato fuɗɗoode e timmoode. Ɗomɗuɗo fuu, mi hokkey ɗum ndiyam caahu, gada ɓuldude ndiyam yonki.
Jaaliiɗo fuu no heɓey ɗu'um fii: mi laatoto Allah ma'ako, kanko boo o laatoto ɓiɗɗo am.

Ammaa hulɓe, e nyaamooɓe amaana, e huwooɓe kuuɗe kalluɗe, e waɗooɓe war-hoore, e waɗooɓe njeenu, e raarnooɓe, e sujjidanooɓe gumkiiji, e fevooɓe, ɓe fuu geɗal maɓɓe woni veendu yiite e ƴibiriitu. Kanjum woni maayde ɗiɗaɓre.
Sey go'oto nder malaa'ika'en njoveeɗiɗo jogiiɓe tummuɗe joveeɗiɗi keeɓɗe torraaji cakitiiɗi wari vi'i yam: — War mi holloy maa koovaaɗo, debbo *Njawdiri.
Nder wahayu ɗuum, malaa'ikaajo oon hooƴi yam yahari yam dow woɗnde vaamnde townde korey, o holli yam *Urusaliima si'ire seniinde e jippoyoo gada asama, gada to Allah.
Darajja Allah e nder ma'are, ende ɗelkitoo kama kaaƴe dime, kama haayre yaspa laaɓnde, kama daarorgal.
Mahagol towngol e howi nde, engol woodi dammuɗe sappo e ɗiɗi. Dammugal fuu e malaa'ikaajo deeneyɗo ɗum. Inɗe leƴƴi *Isiraa'iila sappo e ɗiɗi e mbinndii dow dammuɗe ɗeen.
Koo nduye vuttudu e woodi dammuɗe tati, fu'una tati, hiirna tati, woyla tati, foombina tati.
Mahagol kowngol si'ire ndeen mahaama dow kaaƴe sappo e ɗiɗi. Dow ma'aje ɗum vinndi inɗe almaajiri'en Njawdiri sappo e ɗiɗo.
Malaa'ikaajo bolideyɗo e am oon e jogii sawru jiinaariya ndu o fotnirta si'ire ndeen e dammuɗe ma'are e mahagol kowngol nde.

Buttulli si'ire ndeen fuu e poti, njuutirka ma'are e njaajirka ma'are e poti. Sey malaa'ikaajo oon fotniri si'ire ndeen e sawru nduun, o yi'i nde waɗii estaadiya dubuuje sappo e ɗiɗi (12 000). Njuutirka ma'are e njaajirka ma'are fuu e poti.
Kadimaa o fotni mahol kowngol si'ire ndeen, towirka ma'agol waɗii piye hemre e arba'iin e nayi (144), potnol neɗɗo ngol malaa'ikaajo huutiri.
Mahagol ngool maharaama kaaƴe yaspa. Si'ire ndeen e jiinaariya dimum tan nde maharaa, ende ɗelkitoo kama daarorgal.
Kaaƴe caɓɓaaɗe lees mahol ngool cinngitiraama e kaaƴe dime feere-feere. Haayre arande yaspa, ɗiɗaɓre safaya, tataɓre agat, nayaɓre emeral,
jovaɓre onis, joveego'oore kaneeliyan, joveeɗiɗaɓre kirisolati, joveetataɓre beeril, joveenayaɓre topas, sappoore kirisofuras, sappo e go'oore jaasin, sappo e ɗiɗaɓre ameetis.
Dammuɗe sappo e ɗiɗi ɗeen ɗum lu'ulu'uuje sappo e ɗiɗi, koo ngale dammugal wa'araama e lu'u-lu'u go'otum. Kadimaa laawol si'ire ndeen e jiinaariya dimum ngol wa'araa, engol ɗelkitoo kama daarorgal.
Mi yi'aay *Wuro Allah Seniingo nder si'ire ndeen, gam Allah Jawmiraawo jawmu baawɗe e Njawdiri ndiin ngoni wuro seniingo ma'are.
Si'ire ndeen walaa bukaata jayngol naange koo ngol lewru, gam teddungal Allah yaynantoo nde. Njawdiri ndiin boo woni fitila ma'are.
Leƴƴi duuniyaaru no njahey nder jayngol si'ire ndeen. Laamiiɓe duuniyaaru boo no ngaddaney si'ire ndeen jawdi mu''en.
Dammuɗe ma'are omndataake nyalawma faa abadaa, kadimaa jemma waɗataa nder ma'are.
Jawdi e risku leƴƴi duuniyaaru no waddete nder si'ire ndeen.
Ko senaaki fuu nattataa si'ire ndeen, koo baɗeyɗo kuuɗe nefniiɗe, koo pevoowo. Sey ni ɓe ɗum vinndi inɗe mu''en nder deftere yonki nde Njawdiri tan nattata si'ire ndeen.
Ndeen malaa'ikaajo oon holli yam maayo ndiyam yonki, engo ɗelkitoo kama daarorgal, engo iloya gada jooɗorgal *laamu Allah e *Njawdiri,

engo ila caka laawol si'ire ndeen. Koo nduye vuttudu maayo ngoon e woodi lekki yonki. Lekki kiin e rima ɓikkon nde sappo e ɗiɗi nder hitaande, lewru fuu eki rima nde wo'ore. Haako ma'aki e huutiniree gam yamɗitingo leƴƴi.
Ko Allah la'ani fuu tawataake nder si'ire ndeen, ammaa jooɗorgal laamu Allah e Njawdiri no woney nder ma'are. Maccuɓe ma'ako boo no mawniney mo.
Ɓe ngi'ey yeeso ma'ako, kadimaa ɗum vinndey innde ma'ako dow tihiɗe maɓɓe.
Jemma ɓesdataa waɗgo, ɓe ngalaa bukaata jayngol fitilaaji koo ngol naange, gam Allah Jawmiraawo no laatoto jayngol maɓɓe. Ɓe laamoto faa abadaa abadin.
Sey malaa'ikaajo oon vi'i yam: — Ka'a haala ka goonga, ka tabbitka. Allah Jawmiraawo kokkuɗo *annabo'en Ruhu muuɗum liloyi malaa'ikaajo muuɗum, o holla maccuɓe ma'ako ko ɓadii wargo.
Yeesu vi'i: — Rah, emi wara naa ko neeɓi ! Barkaa no laatanto baɗeyɗo ko annabaaku nde'e deftere vi'i.
Miin Yahayya, miin nani, yi'i ɗe'e ku'uje fuu. Nde nanmi ɗe, ngi'imi ɗe, sey ndicciimi yeeso malaa'ikaajo kolluɗo yam ɗe, gam mi sujjidana mo.
Ammaa o vi'i yam: — Ta'a waɗ noon ! Miin maa mi maccuɗo Allah kama maaɗa, aan e banndiraaɓe maaɗa e annabo'en e ɗowtaniiɓe ko nde'e deftere vi'i. Allah tan cujjidantaa !
Ndeen o vi'i yam: — Ta'a suuɗ haala annabaaku nde'e deftere, gam wakkaci ɓadake nde ku'uje ɗeen fuu mbaɗata.

Kuweyɗo ko halli fuu, yaha yeeso e huugo ko halli. Kuweyɗo ko nyiddi boo, yaha yeeso e huugo ko nyiddi. Kuweyɗo ko vooɗi, yaha yeeso e huugo ko vooɗi. Ceniiɗo yaha yeeso e waɗgo jo'onde muuɗum seniinde.
Yeesu vi'i: — Rah, emi wara naa ko neeɓi ! Mi wardey e laada koo moye, deydey e kuuɗe muuɗum.
Miin woni Alfaa, miin woni Omeega, miin woni arano, miin woni cakitiiɗo, miin woni fuɗɗoode e timmoode.
Barkaa laatantoo laɓɓinɓe kolte mu''en, gam ɓe keɓey laawol nyaamgo ɓikkon lekki yonki, ɓe natta dammuɗe si'ire ndeen.
Ammaa waɗooɓe ko harmi e raarnooɓe e waɗooɓe njeenu e waɗooɓe war-hoore e sujjidanooɓe gumkiiji e fevooɓe e yiɗɓe fewre no njooɗoto yaasi si'ire ndeen.
Miin Yeesu, mi liloyii malaa'ikaajo am, gam o saaydina ɗi'i goongaaji nder *ikiliisiyaaji. Miin woni ɗaɗol *Dawda e asngol ma'ako, miin woni hoodere fajiri jalboore.
*Ruhu Allah e Koovaaɗo e mbi'a: — Waroy ! Nanɗo ɗe'e bolle fuu vi'a: — Waroy ! Ɗomɗuɗo fuu wara, giɗɗo ndiyam yonki fuu jaɓa yara caahu.
Miin Yahayya, emi vaggina koo moye nanɗo bolle annabaaku nde'e deftere. To goɗɗo ɓesdii goɗɗum dow ma'ajum, Allah no ɓesdaney mo torraaji kalluɗi binndaaɗi nder nde'e deftere.
To goɗɗo boo ittii goɗɗum nder bolle annabaaku gonɗum nder nde'e deftere, Allah no ittey geɗal ma'ako nder lekki yonki e si'ire seniinde binndaaɗum nder nde'e deftere.
Oon caaydinɗo ɗe'e ku'uje fuu e vi'a: — Goonga, emi wara naa ko neeɓi. Aamiin. Waroy Yeesu Jawmiraawo !
Barkaa Yeesu Jawmiraawo wondu e yimɓe Allah fuu. Aamiin !
